text: ntivuga ko nehemiya yakoreye umugabo wa esiteri umwami ahasuwerusi ahubwo yakoreye uwamusimbuye
iyo nzu ni nto ariko ni nini bihagije kuri twe
amaze kubona izi mbwa ngo yageze ikigali atekereza icyo yakora ngo nibwo yahise azizana mu rwanda
abana banjye batandatu umugabo wanjye n'abavandimwe banjye babiri bahise bicwa
seyoboka yavuze ko adahakana ko bariya bantu bishwe ariko ko atari we wabishe
kugira ngo iyi kipe ikomeze biyisaba kwihagararaho ntizishyurwe ibi bitego cyangwa ngo itsindwe ibindi
kuko habaga umurishyo w'ingoma wavugaga umenyesha yuko kanaka uwo ari igicibwa
ryari ryegeranye n'iryacu ntangira no kumukunda yatumaga numva nkunzwe cyane
ariko hari indirimbo ijya imfasha duhuriyeho kandi twese tuzi
nakubwiye kenshi ko ntakunda gushyirwa ku karubanda none unshyize kuri radiyo
uwo mukinnyi yabajijwe icyo yifuza ku bijyanye n'ubuzima bwe bw'imibonanompuzabitsina
ni uburyo bw'ingenzi mu itumanaho kuko bukoreshwa n'abantu hafi ya bose ku isi
yezu yabikuraga mu ijambo ry'imana ndetse no muri gahunda itajya ihagarara y'ibyaremwe
icyampa akabona intsinzi muri kimwe cya kabiri cy'icyiciro cya karindwi
dore ko usanga abashumba bashoye inka mu mazi ari mu kibumbiro
cyane cyane bakoresha uturima tw'igikoni kugira ngo bashobore kubona indyo yuzuye ku buryo buboroheye
yagize ati basaba uburenganzira maze tukazumva twasanga zidahabanye no kwibuka zidatoneka ibikomere tukabubaha
uwo munsi ni bwo bwari ubwa mbere dawidi ahaza asafu n'abavandimwe
ihuriro nyarwanda riramagana iyi mikorere ya kagame yo kugira ikibazo cye bwite ikibazo cy'abanyarwanda bose
hanze harashyushye kuburyo nshaka kumara umunsi wose munzu ifite ubukonje
yigeze nari rimwe agaragara yambaye ingutiya yaba ngufi bita mini cyangwa indende
abanyarwanda bazajye bayigeza ku bajyanama bagenwe na minisiteri y'ubucuruzi igihe icyo ari cyo cyose babagire inama
abakobwa icumi bahataniye kwinjira muri misi rwanda mu majonjora yabereye i musanze
yavuze ko ubufaransa butigeze buhagarika gukoloniza ibihugu byo muri afurika bibarirwa mu icumi
perezida w'u bufaransa yategetse ko mu gihugu haba icyunamo uwo munsi
zikoreshwa hagamijwe kwirinda ibyago cyangwa se mugihe cyo kunyuranaho ahatari mu nsisiro
kaneza na kamaliza bahuriza kukuba iki ari igikorwa gikomeye kandi kidasaba amikoro menshi
ushobora kwitoza kugera ku bumenyi ariko ntushobora kwitoza kugera ku bwenge
kagenza yabwiye igihe ko barimo bakora amashusho mbarankuru ubwo abaturage ba etiyopiya baberekaga uyu mugore
abatoza b'ikipe ya musanze bafite akazi gakomeye ko gusezerera ikipe ya mbere yo muri afurika y'epfo
ni nayo izagaragaraho indirimbo yitwa umwana w'umuhanda yasubiranyemo na aline gahongayire
nahisemo ko umugore wanjye ayiyobora kuko ari we muntu wa mbere twumvikana
niba udakina neza kurusha abandi bakinnyi undi umuntu yafata umwanya wawe
ankubita urushyi ruremereye rwirangira ahita ankubitaho urugi aransohora ararira araboroga
ubu bukwe bwabo bwabereye ku nkombe y'ikiyaga
u rwanda rwafashe ingamba zitandukanye zo kubirwanya ariko abaturage bavuga ko hakwiye kongerwa ibihano
ubugenzuzi bwakozwe n'ishami rishinzwe ibiza ryasanze umukingo n'ibishingwe byaridutse bifunga umuhanda
ati abandi bo baratunaniye bazi ko amatsinda ari ayo mu bishanga
aho ni ugukomeza kumugusha mu cyaha murabyumva nataha azakomeza kugikora
mu ntangiriro y'umwaka w amashuri bakorewe ubuvugizi bemererwa kwishyurirwa amasomo y'inyongera
abakinnyi n'abandi bagize uruhare mu guteza siporo imbere batowe hifashishijwe imbuga nkoranyambaga
uru ruhinja rutaragira icyo rumenya ni rwo mbuto yasezeranywe
mu marenga umufasha wa kagabo yabwiye kalisa ko agomba kuryumaho
goriyati yasengaga izuba ukwezi cyangwa ikindi kintu cyose mu biri ku ijuru kandi narabibujije
watanze icyifuzo ko ubonye ubufasha wakwandika igitabo gikubiyemo ubuhamya bwawe
mukakalisa yakubwiye ko imana itari umuntu ngo ibeshye cyangwa ngo yivuguruze nk'uko abantu babikora humura no kubikora izabikora
izo mbonerakure zari zivuye ahitwa ruziba zihangana n'abari mu myigaragambyo zibateramo igisasu
kuva icyo gihe imyitozo ya gisirikare ku mpande zombi  yariyongereye
ujye wibuka ko nugwa nzakubyutsa maze kuguseka
wambaye utya ugiye mu ishuri ntabwo waba wambaye neza
bose bakurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gukoresha imfunguzo z'abandi n'icy'ubujura
ni ukugira ngo haboneke ingengo y'imari ihagije izakoreshwa bikabikwa ku buryo bwiza
nehemiya ategeka abaherezabitambo gusuka ayo mazi hejuru y'inkwi
bose bari bicaye ku meza bakina amakarita
mugabo yajyanywe mu kigo cya gisirikare akorerwa iyicarubozo mbere yo kwamburwa imyenda agasigara yambaye ikariso gusa
nimwumve amagambo yabo yo kuramya ubwo baririmbaga bati uri imana y'agakiza kacu
maze iminsi imodoka yanjye yarapfuye kuko yakoze impanuka
twashatse no kuzitiza abacuruzi ngo bazikoreshe turebe ko hari icyo binjiza turababura
tereza yavuze ko bitari ngombwa ko abaturage bigaragambya nk'uko byagenze ko ahubwo hagombaga guhura impande zombi zigashaka igisubizo
bamwe baravunitse undi aracyashidakanywaho n'ubwo imvune ye yakize
abazitabira iki gikorwa bazasusurutswa n'umuririmbyi sentore wiyita rwamwiza baratira imihigo'
ntacyo ikennye kuko ari yo yahaye bose ubugingo guhumeka n'ibindi byose batunze
yavuze k'u rwanda ahamya ko rufite ubushake bwo kubahiriza uburenganzira bw'umugore
ibi byatumye abaturage bategura imyigaragambyo mu bihe bitandukanye inagwamo abantu benshi
abandi ni rugango waguye ku rugamba ari ingaragu tanzi n'undi mukobwa utaramenyekanye
muhizi yasohoye alubumu ye mu myaka ine ishize mbere gato y'uko umugabo we atorerwa kuba perezida
iyi pasiporo nyafurika izatuma abanyafurika batembera mu bihugu bigize uyu mugabane
ati hari abaturage batazi ko gusaba umuriro bikorerwa ku biro by'akagali ka gihundwe bakihutira kujya ku murenge
twaramanutse arambwira ati njye sinshobora kuguma aha ariko ntubibwire mama kuko atakwemera ko ngenda'
agatsiko gakorera cyane cyane muri somaliya niko kohereje insoresore nyinshi ngo zifashe uwo mutwe
ni umushinga umaze igihe ukorana n'ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere ubuhinzi n'ubworozi
nubundi isi yose n'u rwanda bifatanijwe n'inkingi ziri mu mpera y'aho bihurira
mbere yo kumera umurizo yabonye ubutumwa bumuburira buturutse ku mana
ndamage wo mu ishyirahamwe ry'abacuruzi ba zahabu na gasegereti niwe wahembwe nk'umucuruzi wasoze neza
imico umuntu yatojwe akiri muto niyo imugira intwari cyangwa ikigwari ku rugamba rw'ubu buzima
uyu mugabo ukomoka muri tanzaniya niwe wegukanye umwanya wa mbere
pawulo yabonaga eliya nk'umwanzi we kuko yamucyahaga kubera ibyaha yakoraga rwihishwa
uwansubiza uko nari meze igihe nari ntengamaye nyir'ububasha ari we undinze
zizaba ziri kuri alubumu ye ya gatanu ateganya gusohora muri iyi minsi
biremerera umubiri kuko bidashobora guhindurwamo amaraso cyangwa ibigize imikaya bigahinduka rero umutwaro k'umwijima
umutoza nduhirabandi yarabihinduye akuramo kakira ashyiramo murwanashyaka
nyamara iyo ngiyo uwo muzungu ashaka yaruta izo mu rwanda
gutsinda ni ikintu cyubaka umubiri n'u bwenge buri munsi uritoza na buri joro ukagira ibyo wifuza
bafasha kandi mu bijyanye n'imigenderanire kwimenyereza hamwe n'imyitozo ya gisirikare mu gutabara
guca inyuma umukunzi wawe bikuraho icyizere yakugiriraga kuko uba wangije isezerano mwagiranye
icyo kinyamakuru cyatangaje ko inzu zubakwa muri uwo mujyi zirenze izikenewe
turifuza ko baduha utwo dufaranga twacu tukikenura n'abana bakarya maze tugasubira mu kazi kabo
abwira umuhinzi ati uyu mwaka ni uwa kane ndumbya
ariko byose byashoboka igihe leta y'u rwanda yakwemera gutanga ndekezi
yahise yandika n'umuziki ahereye kuri iyo ndirimbo igitaramo kiryohera buri wese
habyarimana yavuze ko imikorere mibi y'abo bayobozi bayibwirwaga n'abaturage
agira ati twebwe turi abasirimu n'imyumvire yacu irasobanutse
ukuntu uhamagara kugirango umenye uko meze nyuma y'ijoro rinini birandyohera
bwajyanwe hirya no hino n'intumwa z'umwami zinyura mu gihugu cya efurayimu n'icya manase
yasobanuye ko uyu munyarwanda afite uburambe kuburyo sudani y'epfo yakungukiramo byinshi aramutse akoreshejwe
ubutegetsi bubajwe nuko abo bakinnyi bimutse badakoze amarushanwa
ibyo rero bizatuma mushishikarira kwitanga ngo mukurikize ubushake bw'imana musabwa n'ijambo ryayo
turabasaba kubohoka bakatubwira aho imibiri y'abazize jenoside iherereye hirya no hino tukayishyingura mu cyubahiro
ubutegetsi bwajyanye furaha bumwambutsa iteme rya rusumo ajya ingara muri tanzaniya
umurenge wa bigogwe mu karere ka nyabihu uza ku isonga mukugira abana bagwingiye
iki gitero gihuriranye n'urugendo papa faransisiko arimo muri isiraheli
leta yabo ivuga ko ibikorwa byabo bigamije kurwanya ibikorwa by'intagondwa
ibi biganiro bigamije gukemura ibibazo by'abakiriya bayo no kubasobanurira gahunda nshya bazabagezaho vuba aha
iyo utankiza izuba wansanzeho haba hacuze iki cyo ngaho igendere
yozefu wavukiye mu budage yakomeje kwambara akagofero kera karanga papa
ibyo mu rwanda byambuza kuza ino kandi kubyitegura bisaba igihe kuko ari ibintu birebire cyane
iyo usubije amaso inyuma usanga mu myaka umunani ishize harabayeho impinduka zikomeye mu ngano y'ingengo y'imari
guverineri uwamariya yerekanye ibibazo by'imikorere mibi mu bucuruzi bw'amata bwagaragaye
ndashimira polisi y'u rwanda bamfashe neza baranamvuza
iyo ari mu bihe by'ubushyuhe numva nta kintu nshaka gukora
turabivuga tubizi kuko tuzi uruhare rwanyu ko ari ntagereranywa mu kubaka iki gihugu
ni ukubashyikiriza incarubanza bakazisuzuma bakanagirwa inama y'inzira bacamo ngo bajurire
ubu muri ubwoko bw'imana mbere mwari abantu batari baragiriwe imbabazi ariko ubu mwarababariwe
mu bagize komite nyobozi hagomba kubamo nibura mirongo itatu ku ijana by'abagore
uti dore nanze guhanwa umutima wanjye ntukunda gucyahwa sinumviye ijwi ryawe ariko ndaje
atangaza ko nta muntu n'umwe kugeza ubu watanze amakuru y'aho mbanjimbere aherereye cyangwa ibyamubayeho
umugabo agomba gutekereza yitonze ku byo umugore we akeneye kandi n'umugore ni uko
uganda kandi yemeza ko ingabo zayo zagaruye umutekano muri sudani y'epfo
ati bakomeje kumpamagara bansobanurira ku buryo na nyuma y'ifunguro rya ku manywa nasanze bampamagaye bakambura
avuga ko muri iki gihe hari abana benshi bagaragaza imyitwarire idakwiye bitewe n'uburyo babayeho mu miryango yabo
uwo mushinga woherezwa muri komisiyo ihoraho bitewe n'ibyo iryo tegeko rireba
mutesi anita yibukije ko akarere ka kayonza katanze inka aka ngororero kagatanga inkwavu
tumaze gutera intambwe ifatika ibikorwa ni byinshi kandi ubushake n'ubushobozi turabifite
ariko uzi gupfa ubizi wategujwe n'isaha uri buze kwicwaho
muri hoteli gorila ntiwabona icyumba ku munsi wo kwita izina byose biba byarafashwe
gucururiza amazi i goma bihangayikisha abatuye umujyi wa gisenyi
aho iryo tangazo ryavugaga ko abarugaragaraho bose bagomba gukemura ibibazo byabo bitarenze iminsi irindwi
afurika y'epfo yamaze kohereza abazashyirwa muri iyo myanya uretse umukozi ushinzwe ibikorwa
sinshaka kubazwa ngo kiliziya gatulika ni iki
cyangwa ngo kiliziya gatulika ibahe
tumaze kwiga uko bategura indyo yuzuye n'uburyo umwana arerwa hari byinshi byahindutse
uyu murenge wa kivu uturanye na parike y'igihugu ya nyungwe uhana imbibi n'igice cy'akarere ka nyamasheke
ndibuka ko njya kubyara abaganga bambwiye ngo barabona umwana yiruka mu nda
ibi bisaba ko babanza gushaka ibyangombya byabo cyangwa se bagahitamo gusigara kandi bari bafatanyije urugendo
twagerageje gushaka umu sitari turamubura ariko ntibivuze ko gahunda yacu tuyihagarika
iyi nzu nzayituramo kuko ni impano imana yampaye
nta kindi nteganya kuyikoresha
ibi bivuze ko nzajya nkorana na we imibonano mpuza bitsina
ubuhanzi bumaze gutera intambwe mu rwanda
kandi na leta ibwitayeho
amerika si shyashya
ariko nishimiye kuba mu gihugu cy'igihangange gitanga amahirwe menshi
abitabiriye iyi nama basobanuye imbogamizi
zituma muri aka karere nta nganda nini nyinshi zihaba
aho muzakorera hose muzarangwe n'ikinyabupfura
kuko aricyo kiranga abapolisi b'urwanda burigihe
mu mutima wa kirisitu
hari haganjemo guhuza n'imana mu buryo bwuzuye
kandi habagamo amahoro nyakuri
mayirungi ni ikiyobyabwenge kandi uyifatanywe wese arabihanirwa
ndabyuka buri gitondo nkamwenyura
nishimira undi munsi ntigeze ntekereza ko nzabona
agira ati bazitemye ku murizo no mu mugongo barazikomeretsa ariko bitari cyane
mulindahabi yatangaje ko akwiye kuburana adafunze kuko asanga atasibanganya ibimeyetso
ntabwo yigeze agerageza gukosora imyumvire bari bafite ku bijyanye no kwigomwa ibiryo
jonisoni yabaye umukinnyi mwiza wo hagati mu karere ka afurika y'uburasirazuba
ugomba kubereka ko ushobora kubaho mutari kumwe
uwo munsi izo nsoresore zarwanye inshuro enye abaturage bakazikiza
babisobanuriwe hagamijwe kubamenyesha amategeko abarengera no kubasobanurira uko bakurikirana ibibazo byabo
bisa nkaho tomu yibagiwe ibyerekeye iki kibazo ariko nyuma arakora cyane
hishwe abatutsi bo muri nzahaha mu kagari ka butambamo
bicirwa ahantu hatandukanye
kugira ngo bijyane n'imihigo baba barahize yo kuzamurira abaturage imibereho myiza
ati ibihugu byinshi biri hano bishyigikiye kandi birashaka impinduka muri ako kanama
nawe arabihakana umwarimu wacu amaze kubimenya ni bwo babimubajije arabyiyemerera
mariya yaje kumenya uburyo bwo kwinjiza porogaramu y'ubuntu muri mudasobwa ye
bisaba izuba n'imvura kugirango umukororombya ubeho
nta mukororombya wabaho utagira izuba n'imvura
bwana muyobozi nkwandikiye ngirango nkusabe kuntambukiriza iyi nkuru ikubiyemo ibitekerezo byanjye bwite
muri rusange humvikanye ko yemera ko yabeshye abanyarwanda kandi ko nawe ubwe abihaze
bashoramo amafaranga bizeye kubona inyungu z'ikirenga ariko abenshi birangira bahombye
nagirango mbagezeho uyu muvugo nise inzozi ziranga zikanzonga
nzayisenga yashatse kutwumvisha
yibanda cyane ku mwanya wa bikira mariya muri ibyo bihe byose
mugabe yasabye urukiko ko rutegeka ifatirwa ry'imigabane ahamedi afite mu bigo bitatu
umukinnyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri gabo nibwo yavutse
televiziyo ya uganda yerekanye amashusho uyu mupolisi ahagarika abigaragambya anafata ibere rya turinawe
mureke dushimire imana kuko iyo ibishaka iba yaratugize imbwa tukajya tumoka nkazo
ukwiriye gucecekesha iryo jwi ryo mu mutima wawe rigushuka ukumvira umwuka w'imana ukuburira buri gihe
abagera ku bihumbi bitatu bazaba bamaze kuyahabwa mu mpera z'iki cyumweru
iyi nama irabera mu nyubako iherereye mu mujyi wa buruseli
iyi myigaragambyo ni ya gatatu ibayeho kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu
ubwo nifashishije utwo dutabo twombi cyane cyane ako ka porogaramu za leta narumiwe
guverineri munyantwali ati nkunda ingingo zanjye zose sinarota hari n'urwava ku mubiri wanjye
andika ikintu cyose uguze n'igiciro cyacyo ku mpera z'ukwezi andika amafaranga wabonye n ayo wakoresheje
twaje ku cyumweru nageze hano saa mbili ninjira mu nzu
gusa hari abishimira imyitwarire n'amafoto bamwe bita mabi ya rihana
tomu yari yicaye mu mwijima ninjiye mucyumba ncana amatara
ibi ngo nibitagira icyo bihindura azakurwa ku butegetsi hifashishijwe igisirikare
iri tandukaniro rigaragara ku mafaranga yo kwiyandikisha ayo kwiga n'ibindi bikenerwa mu burezi
imfungwa ntazo bafite ibi bigaragaza ko hakiri umubare w infungwa ziba zidafite impapuro
yakomeje agira ati ubundi abarangwa n'umuco wo kunyereza bo bafite nibyo banyereza
ati ababivuze nkeka ko wenda batubonanye bagakeka ko dukundana ariko ntabwo ari ukuri
ndetse anyoherereza ifoto kuri watsapu apfutse ku mutwe nk'umuntu wakomeretse cyane
kugira ngo inshuti zawe zose zite kuri gahunda iri mu gitabo cy'amasosiyete
ibyo kumpimbira umwenda wawe wambara utankwira ntabyo nshaka
abanyarwanda twambara imyenda yizihiye u rwanda
inama y'abaminisitiri yemeje amabwiriza ya minisitiri ashyiraho ingamba zo kurinda umutekano w'inyubako za leta
zimwe mu mpamvu yavuze harimo kutagirira icyizere abacamanza no kutakirwa kw'abatangabuhamya bashinjura
igomba kandi gukora ku buryo abagore batishoboye abapfakazi imfubyi n'abana birera baba mu ngo zabo bitabwaho
ahanini bikanaterwa n'uko aba bahanzi bashinjwa gukora umuziki wo guhimbaza imana uvanze n'uwo kwishimisha
nyuma y'izo mbyino umwe mu bakoze yubile witwa twagirayezu yavuze ijambo
sinzi niba ari ukutanyurwa kuko ibi byose nabimubajije akambwira ko ataribyo
usanzwe n'uw'amenyo bose mu kigwi cya diporome aya mashuri abaha seritifika iyo bayarangijemo
sinigeze numva ibintu nk'ibi ku muntu uwo ari we wese
hariho inzoga z'amoko menshi ndetse inyinshi muri zo ngo ni ubwa mbere uyu muhanzi yari azibonye
ubushinwa bufite igishoro kinini muri uganda ariko bumaze guhomba amafaranga menshi kubera ubujura
ibyo nibyo biduha kumvikana kuko duhuje ibibazo maze tugatabarana tukabana tugasangira tukanasa
roberi namufashije kwandika impapuro zigaragaza impamvu atagikeneye kubana n'uyu mugabo
umuririmbyi w'umunyamerika akaba n'umwe mu bagize itsinda rya pentatoni nibwo yavutse
mu mujyi wa kigali hazashyirwamo inzira zihariye za bisi zitwara ba mukerarugendo
yagize ati nimara gusaza nzahindura imyitwarire ariko ubu imyaka mfite ntabwo inyemerera kwitwara nk'umusaza
yari intangarugero atari no ku bw'ubuhanga bwe bwo kuroba gusa
ati icyo gihe nahise nsohoka ibintu babijyana ku mbaraga na n'ubu sindabibona
none rero aya ni ukuyakuramo ukaramira mugenzi wawe nawe ejo akazakuramira igihe uzaba uyakeneye
noneho abantu bose bashobora kubona neza uruhu rwanjye rwera ingingo n'amagufa
yagize ati yafashwe ubu afungiye kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ya kanjongo arimo arakorerwa idosiye
hanyuma musa n'abatambyi b'abalewi babwira abisirayeli bati ni muze dutambe
yakomeje agira ati ntacyo ndi bushinje abakinnyi banjye bibaho rimwe na rimwe
alubumu ya mbere yerekanywe mu gushyingo
urukiko rwasabye ubushinjacyaha ibindi bimenyetso ntibwabibona maze buhitamo guhagarika burundu icyo kirego
kayumba ni umuraperi uririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza imana
bibaho iyo watandukanye n'umuntu mwahoze mukundana ariko ukaba utarashobora kumuharira abandi
yavuze ko imyumvire ari kimwe mu bibangamira gahunda zo kurandura iki kibazo
yashoje ashimira abanyarwanda n'inshuti z'u rwanda zikomeje kubaba hafi
abakwirakwizaga aya mafoto bishimiye uyu mugabo cyane bamwereka kandi ko ari intwari iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu
yadusobanuriye adakikira ingorane yahuraga na zo mu mirimo ye
ati ubwo twahamagazwaga n'urukiko ngo twisobanure kuri iki kirego twarusabye kugira icyo rukora ngo afatwe
depite kankera yavuze ko ayo ari amafaranga ya leta yangijwe
abasirikare ba kinshasa bazwiho kutagira ikinyabupfura mu kazi kabo
umugore we yaramufashe atitaye ku byo yamukoreye bimushimisha yirukana inshoreke ye
jya urya imyungu amadegede ibitunguru bya puwaro ibitunguru by'ibijumba na tungurusumu
muri ibyo bihano harimo kubirukana mu kazi no gufatira impushya zabo z'inzira
icyo mbona ni uko yohani na shitani itazamwemera kuko ari umugome ukabije
abo twaguze baraje ngo dukore ihererekanya ry'ubutaka ndanga kuko bambeshye
abamarayika barinze yozefu na mariya igihe bavaga iwabo i nazareti
abamamaye mu rwanda ni sentoremico n'abandi
icyo nshaka ni uko wemera ibyaha byawe wacumuye ku uwiteka imana yawe sinzakureba igitsure kuko ndi umunyambabazi
mulisa yatandukanye na sanyu nyuma yo kumwerekana mu muryango we no kumukwa
nkaba numva ku nkengero z'imigezi nka giciye haterwaho ibiti aho bitaraterwa
yagize ati dufitanye umubano wihariye n'umubyeyi wemeye kudutwitira turamwizeye muri urwo rugendo rwose
aba baganga bazabikorera muri kaminuza yigisha iby'ubuvuzi
yanze gucumbagizwa no gucibwaho urukoma nk'insina ngufi ashyiraho demokarasi inogeye kandi ibereye abanyarwanda atitaye k'uko abandi babibona
ariko inasize ibimenyetso bifatika byerekana impinduka mu mitekerereze y'abanyafurika
nateraga imbere mu buryo bwihuse kandi bambwiye ko iyo nkomeza gukorana umwete nashoboraga no kuzaba musenyeri
mu murenge wa kimihurura mu mujyi wa kigali basigaye bamena ibishingwe bivuye mu ngo zabo mu mihanda
ntashye nasanze yarakaye cyane ndamuhamagara ngo tuganire araza ariko icyo mubajije cyose ntansubize
bamwe bemeza ko izi nka zibwa bigizwemo uruhare n'abashumba bazo
mubyara wanjye yadusanze aho twari dutuye hafi y'umupaka w'u bubiligi
ubumenyi bwacu bukomoka mu myumvire yacu
yahuje icyo yagombaga gukorera mu mujyi wa moreyale kuwa kabiri n'icyagombaga kubera i toronto kuri uyu wa gatatu
basanga ari byiza ko bahabwa igihano cy'imirimo nsimburagifungo mu rwego rwo kubagorora kuko abagihanishijwe cyabasubije ku murongo
ngo bitume buri wese yiha kurujora uko yiboneye asize iwabo bicika akaza kubonerana igihugu cy'u rwanda
jyewe nibera i bijyojyo mu giturage kibi batazi n'amajyane icyo ari cyo
barahamya ko utazatunanira kuko n'abasekuruza bawe bameneshejwe mu gihugu cyabo inshuro ebyiri
ihita ipfa kandi nta bimenyetso byihariye bitinda ibanza kugaragaza kuko utwo dukoko tugira ubumara bukomeye
kanda hano wumve ikiganiro kirambuye byumvuhore yatanze ku kwirukana kalisa
bisangwa beni nganji ni umuhanzi akaba n'umunyarwenya yamenyekanye cyane mu mukino usetsa yiseinkirigito
mpita nzamuka umuturirwa njyayo gusa mu nzira ngenda nyura ku cyumba kirinzwe cyane
uyu munsi sinabuza umuntu kubikora ahubwo navuge ibye hanyuma umwuka wera akore ibye
ibigo bitagenerwa ingengo y'imari harimo n'ibigo by'amashuri bivugwaho kudakoresha neza umutungo
ese ni ubuhe buryo n'intwaro kamali afite byo gukoresha ngo yigizeyo diyane
nuko mbona undi mumarayika aguruka aringanije ijuru mu kanya gato abamarayika benshi batangira kuvuza impanda baririmba
umunsi umwe tuzazana umwuzukuru wanjye hano tumwigishirize munsi y'iki giti
mu ijoro ryakeye twumvise urusaku rw'amasasu n'induru ku muhanda hafi y'idirishya ryacu
za kaminuza ziganjemo iz'ikoranabuhanga zizakenerwa mu nganda n'ibikorwa byo gushyiraho imiyoboro ya murandasi
bantu banjye bi kigali umuhungu wanyu yahageze ejo tuzakora ibirori birashyushye
igihe navaga mu bitaro bwa mbere nari kumwe na marayika wanjye uturutse mu ijuru
dutangire duhangayike se ntitugishoboye kubikoresha duhindure se tujye ku bindi bitatwihutisha cyane
kimonyo yasabye ibihugu bigiha umwanya abahakana bakanapfobya jenoside yakorewe abatutsi kwikosora
rihana yagize ati ntamukunzi mfite ubu ariko birambangamiye cyane
iyi banki ifasha bamwe mu bana babo kwiga kandi bibafitiye akamaro
inyungu uyu muherwe yagize yaturutse ku izamuka ry'ibiciro by'inzu mu bushinwa
mugenzi we gatarayiha selemani yunze mu rye agira atinanjye nkunda kiyovu
azavugana kandi na salifu petero beni na kanu
yavuze ko kwibuka bikwiye kuba inshingano za buri muntu uhereye ku bakirisitu
hilariya ati nzaba perezida wa bose abantoye n'abatarantoye kandi nzarwanya ibyihebe
kuba ibindi bihugu byo mu karere nabyo byakongera bikagaruka mu ruhererekane rw'imvururu birashoboka cyane
misi shimwa avuga ko yatangiye kuririmba muri korali y'abato afite imyaka itandatu
twahisemo ko aruhuka uyu munsi kugira ngo ejo azabe ameze neza
mu bandi bayobozi bazaba bari mu rwanda harimo kaberuka wigeze kuyobora banki nyafurika itsura amajyambere
hari i bintu bimwe utari uzi kuri uyu mugabo tugiye kukubwira mu magambo make
nararebye nsanga iki ari ikibazo gikwiye gutekerezwaho na buri munyarwanda
ntekereza ko ari ubwumvikane bwabo yenda ni ikintu amakoperative ajyaho inama akagishyiraho
mu gice cya kabiri umutoza mico yahinduye byinshi byongera imbaraga mu gusatira izamu
ndifuza ko wambera umukunzi kandi ndumva nshaka ko tuganira ku buryo bwihariye
harimo izina ry'umuyobozi w'akarere ka rusizi ariko ngo yayobewe izina rya minisitiri w'intebe
aho inzego z'umutekano zifashishije ibyuka biryana mu maso ngo zitatanye ikivunge cy'abigaragambyaga
ibi ni ibitangazwa n'ubushakashatsi bwashyizwe ahagaragara n'abahanga mu bijyanye n'imyororokere y'abantu
ku nshuro ya mbere nta mukandida watanzwe n'ishyaka rimenyerewe cyane mu bufaransa
insanganyamatsiko iragira iti twubake u rwanda twifuza duteza imbere imiyoborere myiza twita ku muryango
bari bazi ko atigeze yigishwa n'abanyabwenge bazwi ariko bagatangazwa n'ukuntu ari we ubasobanurira
iyi misemburo ifasha umubiri kuyaza ibinure bitera umubyibuho
ubutegetsi nabwo bushinga ibinyamakuru bigamije kubacamo ibice bishingiye ku moko n'uturere
icyo kigo kivuga kandi ko kigiye gusohora icyegeranyo cya mbere cyerekana uko ibintu byagenze
gusa ngo hari izikoreshwa igihe gito nk'izitangwa n'amabanki zizwi nka borudero
gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo bavuze bizashoboka kubera ko twumvikana n'abaturage bacu
bazaryozwe icyaha cyabo kuko umuntu uryamana n'umugore wa se biba ari amahano
gahunda y'umurimo w'ubugenzuzi igaragaza ko raporo zakozwe neza cyane
amategeko yo mu bufaransa yabuzaga erike gushakana na elizabeti wigeze kuba mukase
hanyuma yezu agiye kubasubiza arababwira igihe yigishirizaga mu rusengero ati mwa ndyarya mwe
ndetse n'umunwa w'ingona warupfutseho agatambaro keza akagenda ayisomagura ku munwa nk'uko abashakanye babigenza
umwana ni ko kuyibwira ati yego ni byo ubu ni wowe umfite
yaretse kuba umunyabwenge n'umunyampuhwe uhebuje abandi bayobozi maze arasyigingira ahinduka umuntu utwaza igitugu
icyo nakizeza abazabyira ni uko imana izanshoboza nkabagirira akamaro
mu kiganiro n'inyarwanda yavuze ku bijyanye n'iyi simukadi na terefone ashinjwa kwiba
hanyuma padiri osikari aribwiriza ahamagara dogiteri pulaside uyobora ibitaro bya gihundwe
ubu ni ubwa nyuma nsezeye ku muntu nibwiraga ko nshobora gukunda ubuzima bwanjye bwose
iryo sinywa ry'amasezerano ryari rihagarariwe na musenyeri wa diyoseze ya butare nyilicyubahiro filipo rukamba
uru rukingo rushyashya ruzaba rugurwa icya kabiri cy'amafaranga iza mbere zagurwaga
kubera ko bamwe n'akazi bakora katazwi kandi abaturage bakaba bahora bataka ubujura
misi liliyane ntiyigeze abasha kwegukana ikamba kuko ryegukanywe na nyampinga wari uhagarariye boliviya
inyandiko z'abashakashatsi zivuga ko ibimenyetso byiza bihari ari magufa yatwo gusa
mu mpera y'iki cyumweru muzayoberwa uko mwita ku nshuti zanyu nshya bitume mudatuza
imbaraga zigenda nabi ni mbi cyane kurusha intege nke zigenda nabi
yabwiye abafungwa ko adakeneye amashyi nk'ayari amaze guhabwa bamporiki nyuma y'uko abaganirije bakanyurwa
ni byiza gukandakanda aho imbwa yagufashe ukahegura byaba na ngombwa ukahasegura kugirango habyimbuke kandi ububabare bugabanuke
ibi polisi y'u rwanda yabitangarije mu karere ka kayonza umurenge wa rwinkwavu
navanze byeri na rikeri mfite umujinya gusa ufite intandaro ariko siko mpora
kandi ugomba kwitondera umubiri w'umukunzi wawe ukamenya icyo yifuza n'uburyo acyifuzamo
tomu aho mperukira kumwumva acuranga nabonye ari umuhanga mu gucuranga inanga
muri iyi myaka yasohoye indirimbo ze ku giti cye zirimo jenifa
agira ati nishimiye mitiweri bampaye kuko mfite abana barindwi n'umugore tukaba icyenda
kuko mu ntara abayobozi bafashwa na leta kugira imodoka ni batatu gusa harimo na guverineri
asanzwe azwiho ubuhanga n'uburambe mu bya sinema ni na we uyobora kwetu firime
hari bamwe mu bakinnyi bahitagamo gukina umukino umwe mu gihe abandi bayikinnye yose uko ari itatu
hakizimana kevini na rashidi ni bo bafashije haringingo faransisi kubona amanota atatu y'uwo munsi
abagize iyo korali bavuze ko kuririmba bajugunya inkweto hasi ari ikimenyetso cyo kwisubiraho
ali sudi yakomeje avuga ko ajya yifuza ko nyamirambo yamera nk'uduce tuzwi dukomeye mu myidagaduro nka vegase
benisuda ashinja ibyaha by'intambara impande zari zihanganye mu ntambara yo muri afuganisitani
yaboneyeho umwanya asaba abaturage gucika ku nzoga kuko zangiza ubuzima
murangira ati nibyo koko ni ibintu bikomeye kandi byafashe imyaka myinshi
bibiliya ivuga ko kugendana n'umuntu bikubiyemo kumukunda no kumva ari inshuti yawe magara
ibi bikaba bitandukanye n'ibyabaye kuko aba bakinnyi bajyanywe mu icumbi ry'abagenzi
ibi bituma hari inganda nyinshi zikora inzoga cyane cyane izikomeye zibifashisha zamamaza ibinyobwa byazo
amakuru ava mu buyobozi bw'u rwanda yemeza ko kabuga yafashwe
ubu bafungiye kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ya kanjongo mu gihe iperereza rigikomeza
agira ati igihe umuhamya wa yohova yansuraga aho nakoreraga akansaba ko twigana bibiliya yashakaga kuyisobanukirwa
ayo masezerano mu mateka ni ikimenyetso cy'ibyo perezida kagame yavuze byo gutsinda ariko ntiwigambe
kuri ba bana b'intama barindwi buri wese muzamuha akebo k'ifu
yari yambaye impu zidakannye kuko ariko abahanuzi b'icyo gihe bambaraga
inote ya mbere yatangiye gukoreshwa mu burayi ikozwe na banki ya suwede
abaturage bavuga ko baheruka kubona amazi igihe perezida kagame yazaga gutaha amavomero mu murenge wa murambi
karekezi yagize ati ndumva nyuma y'aha nzicara ngatekereza nkumva icyo ngomba gukora
imana idusaba kubwira abandi ineza yayo igira iti ni cyo gituma muri abagabo bo guhamya ko ari jyewe mana
ati bigaragaza intege nkeya n'uburangare twashyize mu kuragira intama dushinzwe
babikora ku manywa na n'ijoro bagasakuma bagapakira ku manywa bakajyana ibyo bajyana
ngirente yagaragaje ko kugwingira bigira ingaruka zikomeye ku bana
ese iyo bari bubikore bahana gahunda cyangwa umwe yumva bimujemo agahita abikora
ni cyo gituma nshaka kubwira ubutumwa bwiza namwe abari i roma
yaravuze ati ''ntitugomba guha icyuho abanyabyaha cyangwa ngo tureke ibihugu byacu bibe ubuhungiro bwabo
umubyeyi wa sentore yari arwariye mu bitaro bya gisirikare by'i kanombe
mu kiganiro cyatanzwe ku ruhare rw'umugore mu kubaka igihugu hagaragajwe ko abifitemo uruhare runini
hariho abantu benshi bikundira utunyamaswa tubana n'abantu mu rugo nk'imbwa n'injangwe
kuko abana bo mu murenge wa ntongwe n'uwa kinazi batangira gukorera amafaranga bakiri batoya
turakangurira abaturage bagikoresha inkwi n'amakara kubireka bagakoresha gazi kuko ihendutse kurusha amakara
amashusho yafashwe yerekana ko maduro yarebye hejuru igihe yari agejeje hagati imbwirwaruhame ye
byatewe n'uko muri uganda hari amatora kandi imodoka zitwara abagenzi zikaba zitari zemerewe gutambuka
depite bamporiki avuga ko bitangaje kubona buri gihe rwanda deyi iba
abo iyo mvura yangirije ibintu ni abaturiye umugezi wa sebeya
musemakweri avuga ko bazakomereza aho yagejeje arifasha gukomera
mu bagize ubwo bwoko harimo abantu b'abanyabwenge bita cyane ku kwiga ibijyanye n'inyenyeri
mico afite umwana witwa juliyusi yabyaranye na godanse
uretse gutandukanya amagambo yandikwa kimwe amasaku n'ubutinde binadufasha kumenya uko amagambo avugwa
hoteli ituze yegereye ikivu haruguru y'umuhanda wa kaburimbo
ibi bintu bicike n'ababikora bumve ko ari ikibazo babihagarike
kuri uyu wa kane urukiko rwavuze ko ibyo donavani yashinjwaga bimuhanaguweho
yatangaje ko ibikorwa nk'ibi bifitiye akamaro abarwayi n'iterambere ry'urwego rw'ubuvuzi mu rwanda
ageze mu rwanda ngo yasanze abana b'abavandimwe be bakiriho ndetse n'abakoraga batarirukanwe ku kazi
uzongere wumve abo bantu bavuga ngo bishe abanyarwanda
pasiteri gasare mikayeli yavuze ko umukozi w'imana wese ari n'umukozi wa leta
kigali tudeyi yakoze incamake y'amakuru yaranze ubutabera nk'imwe mu nkingi enye guverinoma y'u rwanda igenderaho
daniyeri yavuze ko nta guhindura icyemezo bafashe cyo gukorera yehova nta kindi bamubangikanyije na cyo
guhagararira inyungu z'igihugu mu kindi ni umurimo ukunze guhabwa umwenegihugu w'igihugu azihagarariyemo
yagize ati ubusanzwe nkina umupira w'amaguru nshaka kwereka buri wese ko mbishoboye
hatangijwe ubukangurambaga bwiswe impuhwe bukorerwa alise wakatiwe igifungo cya burundu
yagize atitwigeze kugira iki kibazo igihe abaturage bari batarasobanukirwa uko bategura indyo yuzuye
muri sinode iheruka hamaganwe imiryango nterankunga ihatira abantu kuboneza urubyaro bakoresheje imiti
abenshi mu bapfuye ni abagwiriwe n'inzu n'abishwe n'umwuzure
kubera iyo mpamvu leta ni yo yonyine itanga icyapfuye ngo gisanwe kugira ngo gikoreshwe
inkuru y'umwana aheruka kubyara yamenyekanye mu buryo bwashidikanyijweho kuko atakunze kumuvugaho
umuhango wo gushyingura nyakwigendera gapfizi uteye utyo
ushobora kumbwira impamvu muri buri mudugudu harimo amatorero abiri
kandi ntibivuze ko uyambaye wese aba yataye cyangwa yubahutse umuco nyarwanda
yarahiye ko atazigera akora perezida mu ntoki
ibi bituma bamwe mu barwayi babona ko barangaranywe n'ikigo nderabuzima mu by'ukuri
emabule mbituyumuremyi yasabye abanyarwanda kwitwararika kuri gahunda z'ubuvuzi bw'iyi ndwara minisiteri yabashyiriyeho
yari arimo agenda n'amaguru igihe yasabwaga kwerekana ibyagombwa nk'uko bivugwa na ansa
gabore umukinnyikazi wa filime w'umunyamerika ukomoka muri hongiriya nibwo yavutse
ni ibihe binyabiziga bitagombera ikimenyetso kibiranga iyo byambukiranya umuhanda cyangwa biwugenda ku ruhande
kazane arena ni sitade yubatse mu mujyi wa kazane mu burusiya
ubushinwa bwatangaje abategetsi bakuru ariko ntawateganyijwe uzasimbura perezida shi jinipingi
abavandimwe babiri b'abanya gana bafashwe bashinjwa ibinyoma bafungwa amezi abiri
itsinda rya sawuti sole rimaze iminsi muri amerika ryavuyeyo ryerekeza muri afurika y'epfo
bukwiye gukurikiranirwa hafi n'ubutabera bugasuzumwa hakarebwa niba bufite ireme n'agaciro
izi mashini zitinda gukonjesha amata bikaba byayangiza kuko zimara amasaha ane cyangwa atanu
kimwe na zimbabwe tugiye kurangiza ibijyanye n'amategeko maze hatangazwe ko iyo sitati ivanyweho
gatera yahise ansuhuza yinjira mu nzu arambwira ngo ni nihangane gato araje
aliyasi tala wasimbuye mohamedi nawe yishwe ari muri kajugujugu
abaganga bashyize hamwe inkunga yo kumubonera ibyo akeneye kugeza abonye inzu maze umurenge umufasha gusubira iwabo
uyu mukobwa na nyakwigendera bari inshuti magara banasangiriye mu kabari mu ijoro yapfuyemo
abahagarariye urubyiruko bavuga ko abavugabutumwa bataborohera ku ikoreshwa ry'agakingirizo
icyo gihe abakire benshi bifuzaga kugura urwo rubuga ariko zake akabyanga
bamwe mu bafashwe bari bafite impapuro z'inzira zo muri afurika y'epfo
manzi ntiyatekerezaga ko mariya azaza kare mu gitondo bityo aburana avuga ko atari ahari mu ijoro mariya yishwemo
ku buryo abakoloni b'abongereza bari baramufunze bagombye kumufungura bemera ko ashyiraho guverinoma y'agateganyo
umuntu urya nk'ibyo urya yakagombye kuba ari umukozi w'umunyembaraga
ibi bisasu byose koreya ya ruguru yabanje kubigerageza
ngwino nkugire inama kugira ngo ukize amagara yawe n'ay'umuhungu wawe salomo
fantasitike yateguye ko abakunzi n'abakiriya bayo bazahabwa ibihembo bitandukanye harimo na televiziyo nini cyane
mu mpera z'icyumweru amatorero y'i kigali yatangiraga amateraniro hakiri kare
igice cya kabiri cyaranzwe n'uko buri kipe yashakaga kubona intsinzi
uhandangire neza wenda no mu bindi bice by'u rwanda hari bene utwo dusozi
igiciro kidahanitse ni kintu gituma ugiye kurushinga ahitamo umuntu umwambika
uwo muntu wasize mu mbeho ashobora kuba ari intumwa y'imana
nkuko byagaragaye mu gice cya mbere cy'umukino abakinnyi batangiranye imbaraga
yahamije ko yigeze kubonana umwe mu bo batemberanaga umuguro w'inkweto
ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko abagore ari mirongo ine na karindwi ku ijana
ruganzu yabanje kwigarurira ibice by'akanyaru atsinda nyakarashi aza i ruhande hasigara ubungwe
ihinduka rya sitati y'umuryango w'itorero ry ubwepisikopi mu rwanda diyosezi ya shyogwe
iwacu barambwira ngo njye ndya mu rugo ibya mu gitondo nongere kurya nimugoroba ntashye
ni ukureba umuzi w'ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina ku buryo hashakwa umuti uhamye w'iki kibazo
munyihanganire ntabwo ndi umugore uteye utyo ndacyari kumwe n'umugabo wanjye
gutanga ubuhamya bw'uko imana yagukijije ni byiza ariko ugatanga ubufasha bagenzi bawe
amateka ya dewo munyakazi mu magambo make ku bijyanye no gucuranga inanga nyarwanda
mukasekuru roza avuga ko yoherejwe ku bitaro bya gitwe umwana akamupfira mu nda
se yagarutse mu ma saa sita yigaragambya akimara kwinjira mu muryango
ese inzira y'amahoro n'ibiganiro iranze none inzira y'amasasu n'intwaro z'ubumara nibyo byemejwe koko
impuguke ya minisiteri y'ubuzima ku buzima bw'imyororokere no kuboneza urubyaro
urukiko rwanzuye ko hazasuzumwa niba ukwihana umucamanza kwe gufite ishingiro hakurikijwe ibiteganywa n'amategeko
ati navuye mu rugo nzindutse nzi ko nsubirayo nkatekera abana bagiye ku ishuri
musabimana utuye mu kagari ka mubuga ati iyo abantu babanye neza byose birashoboka
gatera gashabana wunganira adelina rwigara yavuze ko uwo yunganira arengana ko ibyaha ashinjwa ataribyo
uwitwa umugabo ni uhagarara ku cyemezo yafashe ku buryo yanagipfira
yagize ati ni iby'agaciro kwemera inshingano nahamagariwe zo kuyobora umuryango wacu
bitewe n'inama ngirwa ku nkuru zitandukanye zinyuzwa aha hamwe n'iz'abandi basaba
perezida museveni wakundaga rwigema yahise afata icyemezo cyo guhagarika akajagari
nshyize imbere ibigomba gukorwa ku kazi kandi ndabaza aho nakoresha igihe kinini
yamwenyuye n'ikirahure cya byeri ikonje mu ntoki ati urabyita amafaranga
yagize ati nibiba ngombwa ko na guverinoma ihagarikwa tuzabikora twubake urwo rukuta
bamwe bavuga ko aba agomba kubyumvikanaho n'umuryango we bikarangira kuko aba afite inshingano nke
tuba dushobora gukomereka kuko ababa bambaye inkweto zifunze ari mbarwa
ndetse hari n'abamubwiye ngo ashake amashuka aze korosa umurambo wanjye
abafite amazu yo kubamo barimo baransaba kubakorera igenzura ariko biragoye kuko nsigaje iminsi mike ino aha
bizimungu wabonye iby'iyo mpanuka yagize ati uriya mugabo wari wikoreye inzoga yari yasinze
komisiyo yagenzuye ibigo byo mu turere twa gicumbi gakenke ngororero na nyabihu
muri iki gisigo ni ndoli uva mu gihugu akajya i karagwe
izindi mpamvu zagaragajwe na njyanama harimo kudakorera hamwe kw'abayobozi no kuba buri wese atiha gahunda
bakomoka muri komini giciye kibilira na satinsyi zo muri perefegitura ya gisenyi
ibi byakozwe kugira ngo atazafatwa nk'intwali ku bari bakimukunze
ati we azi impano yanjye sinshobora guca kumwana ntamuvugishije cyangwa ngo muterure
iyo umurwayi atinze kujya kwa muganga agerayo kanseri yararenze i moko ikangiza n'ibindi bice by'ibere
rayila odinga arahamagarira abarwanashyaka be gukaza imyigaragambyo kubera kudakunda igihugu
abashakashatsi b'abanyamerika bagaragaza ko ibitera indwara ya kanseri ari byinshi muri iki gihe
aba basore bambaye amapantaro abahambiriye cyane y'umweru mu gusoza barabyinnye
birasekwa umugabo ahera atyo naho wa musazi rwugamo nyarwaya aramuvuza arakira aranamukiza
nyuma hemezwa abanyura imbere y'akanama nkemurampaka buri mukobwa agahitamo ururimi ashaka kubazwamo
obi yumvise yishimye bidasanzwe kuko nta kintu na kimwe yari yarigeze atsinda
hari uwiga neza undi agahora asibira kuko agera mu ishuri akitekerereza ibindi ni uko agatsindwa
nyuma yo gukatirwa gufungwa by'agateganyo diyane na adelina rwigara bajururiye icyemezo cy'urukiko
ibi bizafasha ko ishema ry'u rwanda rikomeza kugaragara n'ibendera ry'igihugu rikazamurwa
amatafari n'amabuye mu ngo nabyo bizagabanywa kuko hakenewe ibyatsi n'ibiti bifata amazi
bimwe muri ibyo bikaba ari uko abana bose bavuka barindwa kwandura virusi itera sida
ese ubundi amafaranga nzamwita na rubega patirike bari bagenewe yari angahe
benshi mu nshuti zanjye bambwirako nshatse nashyingiranwa n'uriya mwana kugirango niheshe agaciro ariko simbyemera
abarigize na bo banyuzagamo bakerekana ubuhanga bwabo mu kuririmba karahanyuze n'izigezweho
imwe mu ndyo bavuga ko bitabaza ni igisura by'amaburakindi bikanemezwa n'abana
hari inzira yo gusubirishamo ku mpamvu z'akarengane urubanza rwaciwe ku rwego rwa nyuma
abahatanira ikamba rya nyampinga w'u rwanda bamaze icyumweru mu mwiherero ariko ntibarahura ngo baganire banashyigikirane
fondasiyo rutayisire igizwe n'umuryango w'uwari umuyobozi w'ivuriro ry'amatungo magufi
u rugezi rwo kwa basebya ba nyirantwari ruri muri ibyo biyaga
ibi byatumye inyarwanda ishakisha nimero z'uyu muzungu ngo abazwe byinshi mu byo atangaza
indyo yuzuye igizwe n'ibyubaka umubiri ibiwurinda indwara n'ibiwutera imbaraga
iki gitaramo cyashojwe na raga di washimishije abantu mu ndirimbo ze zakanyujijeho nka ndigida
turampu ati tuzabikora mu buryo bwiza kandi bwubahiriza uburenganzira bwa muntu tom yambajije niba nshobora kujyana n'abasiganwa ku igare ku wa gatandatu
kunywa shisha byiganje mu bihugu by'abarabu ariko na tanzaniya ifite imico yabo
hashize iminsi ataboneka kuri televiziyo
ni byiza kurya indyo yuzuye ifite amavuta make ikize kubyubaka umubiri irimo imboga n'ibinyampeke
kandi kuri icyo gitambaro ushyireho ikimenyetso cy'umweru kigaragaza ko yiyeguriye imana
nyamuheshera yumvise ko nkana yari umuhigi arishima kuko na we yabikundaga
ndibaza ukuntu narose ndimo niruka nahagiye ariko ntazi ikirimo kinyirukankana bikanyobera
nzakora ibishoboka byose menyereze barumuna banjye kandi mbafashe kwiteza imbere
ikirugu ni ikimenyetso cy'ivuka yezu ryizihizwa n'abakirisitu kuri noheli
iyo ndirimbo yamenyekanye mu cyumweru gishize ihita ihererekanwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga
yitanga kabiri mu kwezi kugira ngo abigishe bibiliya
ati icyo ntakwiriye kubabwira ni intsinzi y'urupfu kuko nanjye waramye nzapfa
indwara n'ibindi bibazo by'intambara n'amakimbirane babicyemuraga bifashishije umuco kandi bakanyurwa
aryoherwa n'ubuzima iyo yicaye agafata inkono y'itabi agatumagura
bari kunzeezwa n'uko ncitse umwanzi nabaye umusaraba wigereka ku yindi
bizimana yagize ati kubarokora ntibyari byoroshye kuko uyu murenge warimo abacengezi benshi
yavuzweho gukundana na debora kugeza aho abibazwa n'inyarwanda
kuri uyu wa gatatu abarwayi batanu b'umwijima bahawe umuti uwukiza burundu
twagiramungu ni umugabo kandi bamwe bibwira ko afite ibyo yakorera abanyarwanda
ngeze mu gisirikare nabaye nabyo byaramfashije mu buhanzi bwanjye
byaradutangaje kubona hari abakuwemo bafite abaterankunga abandi bagasigaramo ntabo bafite
habineza yanasabye guverinoma ya nigeriya kwemeza amasezerano ku mpande zombi ajyanye n'ingendo z'indege
aririmba injyana zitandukanye harimo rege
intati ni umuntu uhemukira mugenzi we
hari ibyangombwa tutashoboraga guha abakiriya bacu mu gihe cy'imvura twagombaga gutegereza izuba rikava
ivuga ko ubushakashatsi butandukanye bugaragaza imikorere y'amabanki yo muri afurika
yashimye ingamba u rwanda rwihaye zo kurwanya ubukene no gusaranganya ubukungu bw'igihugu
nkunda ko ari umwimerere kandi itunganyirizwa mu rwanda
abo mu mahanga bakareba intambwe igihugu cyateye kimwe n'amahirwe bagira mu ishoramari
uyu mugore yezu yavuganaga na we yari yaje kuvoma
inkongi yatangiye saa kumi n'imwe z'umugoroba ku cyumweru mu ruhande rw'inyubako ruberamo imyidagaduro
jyewe sincurangira ibihumbi icumi cyangwa mirongo itanu mbikorera amafaranga menshi
kandi muri urwo rusaku humvikanaga n'amajwi y'abakirisitu bakora mirimo mitagatifu mu nsengero
yishwe jenoside igitangira kuko yarwanyaga imikorere mibi y'ubutegetsi bwa habyarimana
yavuze ko abatashye baje mumahoro ntawapfuye ariko ko hari abaguye mumashyamba bahunga
mbese mu rwanda hari itegeko rivuga ko muri buri gihugu habamo ambasade y'u rwanda
abantu bateye imbere baba bafite ibyo bahugiraho kandi byuzuzanya
yagize ati umwe ndamubwira nti nshuti turavugana akanya gato ndwaye umutwe maze turekera aho
ubundi iyi myanya tuyijyamo tumeze nk'abagiye ku rugamba tukazishima dutabarutse
biteguye kwigaragambya ejo ubwo iyo nkuge izaba imurikirwa rubanda
ndagukumbuye ariko sinshobora guhora mbigaragaza sinabibwira abantu buri gihe ariko ndagukumbuye bikabije
agira atini gake tubona utwunganira mu bibazo nkibi bibabaje
bamushinja gukoresha ububasha fite mu kwigwizaho imitungo irimo amazu n'amato bihenda
imbogamizi zishingiye ku myumvire no ku kutitabira gushaka ubushobozi mu ngeri zose tugomba kuzitsinda
yihishe mu mirambo ararokoka agize amahirwe asanga na nyina yarokotse ariko yakomerekejwe cyane
intsinzi ntabwo ari iyanyuma kandi gutsindwa ntibikuraho umurava wo gukomeza ibifite akamaro
nasabaga umugabo amafaranga yo guhaha akambwira ngo ninyasabe mabukwe bikambabaza ariko nkihangana
kugeza ubu ntariregura ku byaha byose ashinjwa n'imiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu
birakwiriye ko niba twemeza ko dukijijwe tugenzura imbuto twerera abo tubana
iyo winjiye muri gari ya moshi itwara abagenzi ubona amavarisi atondetse ku murongo
umuyobozi ushinzwe imenyekanishabikorwa muri sebamedi uwimana yatangaje ko iri rushanwa rigamije guteza imbere basiketi
hari amagambo menshi avugwa buri wese agahita yibuka yanga
igihe yirukaga inyuma y'umuhungu mubi rumwe mu nkweto ze rwaracitse
yewe ushobora kuba warakunze benshi ushingiwe ku byateganyijye muri gahunda ya guverinoma yakozwe
mu gihugu cya uganda abanyeshuri biga muri kaminuza bafashwe barimo basambana
twamaze kubona abafatanyabikorwa n'imirimo izakomeza vuba uretse ko hari ibigitunganywa
ubwuzuzanye bw'inzego zinyuranye nibwo bwatumye muri uyu mwaka bikunda
umuganda rusange wakorewe mu gishanga cya bishenyi gihuriweho n'umurenge wa runda n'uwa rugarika
iri tsinda ryemeza ko mu ngingo zirimo zerekanwa harimo n'imibiri y'imfungwa z'abashinwa zishwe
abakobwa batukiwe muri gari ya moshi bibajije ukuntu abantu bashobora kumera gutyo
ni uburyo buzatuma indirimbo zanjye zijya ku isoko mpuzamahanga kandi n'abanyarwanda bakazikunda
uko niko ijwi ry'umuntu rigera mu matwi y'imana kwinginga kwe kukakirwa mu ngoro yo mw'ijuru
tangira ubutabazi bw'ibanze mu kubungabunga umutima n'ibihaha
icyo ukwiriye kuzirikana ni ukudakora ibyo ukunnyuzura yari yiteze
ubutegetsi cyangwa abategetsi batarengera cyangwa batita kubo bayobora baba ari abacanshuro
iyo ni nayo yabaye intandaro y'ibibazo yagiranye n'ubutegetsi kugeza igihe apfiriye amarabira
wowe ubona nta cyo bivuze kandi bibiliya ibitwizeza
iyi mvura yaguye ku gicamunsi yasambuye ibyumba bibiri birimo abarwayi
abamarayika bayoboraga yozefu kugira ngo ubuzima bwa yezu budahungabana
akanama gashinzwe amahoro ku isi kavuga ko ubu abanya sudani y'epfo benshi batangiye guhunga
iyi ngorane ije yiyongera ku zindi abaganga basanganywe mu kuvura iyo ndwara
akandi gashya kabereye muri ubu bukwe ni uko kalebu na sabine babyinnye kakahava
ibi ni ukugira ngo ifashe abanyarwandwa kwiga igihe baboneye umwanya
bizimana yabwiye kigali tudayi ko hari icyizere ko ibi bibazo bigiye gukemuka
kandi bampaye indurwe nk'ibyo kurya ngize inyota bampa divayi irura
bazanye impfizi y'intama barayitamba maze imbaraga za ya sekurume y'ihene ziburizwamo
gusa ngo gushora imari muri yesu ntibijya bihomba
bivugwa ko hazanwaga abatutsi benshi ngo bicwe ariko kugeza ubu imibiri yabo ntiraboneka
obama yatangarije mugenzi we wa koreya y'epfo ko amerika yiteguye gufasha igihe izaba ikenewe
yanafashe gahunda yo gupima abinjira mu rwanda banyuze ku kibuga cy'indege i kanombe
yasinye itegeko rihagarika ivangura rishingiye ku ruhu mu nzego zose muri amerika
avuga ko nta yindi mpamvu yatumye ajya kwiga gukora inkweto uretse kuba yarabikundaga kuva akiri umwana
agira ati urubyiruko abize n'abatarize bakeneye kumenya bihagije ubuzima bw'imyororokere
binjiye mu rusengero batuje maze bumva amajwi y'abagabo abagore n'abana basingiza imana
kabeja avuga ko abayobozi b'amadini bakwiye kugabanya igitsure bashyira ku bayoboke ba bo
umuryango mpuzamahanga wemeje ubwigenge bw'ibihugu bya soloveniya na yugosilaviya
bakaba bafite intego yo kujya ku masoko hirya no hino mu gihugu
ni umushinga twifuza ko warangira vuba kandi ibihugu byose bikumva ko ikigamijwe ari inyungu zabyo
kuri uyu wa gatatu impanuka y'ikamyo yabereye muri kagali ka nyarutarama mu murenge wa byumba
nsabimana na mukamurenzi bashakanye babyaranye kane
lubosha avuga ko aba bantu bahunze ibihugu byabo bagana muri afurika y'epfo
ni mu gihe bamwe mu banyamyuga bagayirwa kutaba inyangamugayo mu kazi kabo
muri iri murikagurisha hari abasore n'inkumi birirwa babyina kugeza bwije
urutonde rw'abashakishwa rwashyikirijwe abadepite ba zambiya basuye u rwanda
yakomeje agira ati ibyo byatumye nta kundi twabigenza uretse kubirukana
ibikoresho byiza byose byari mu nsengero
uwiteka mana yanjye wumve gutakamba no gusenga k'umugaragu wawe
indirimbo yatumye bakundwa bakanamenyekana yitwa magorwa
iruhande rw'iyo mitako ahashyira ubwato bubaje kugira ngo bubonwe n'abambuka inyanja bose
hashyizweho umubitsi w'impapurompamo z'ubutaka ku rwego rw'igihugu n'ibiro bishinzwe ubutaka mu turere twose
ni ubwa mbere umuyobozi wo mu nzego zo hejuru mu bufaransa yemera ruhare rwabo ku mugaragaro
aho umuhanda wa gari ya moshi ugarukira bahasanze umuyobozi ugenzuraga amakamyo ajya mu bushinwa
beni ladeni yari yarakorewe filimi imwerekana nk'uwapfuye akazuka igihe gito mbere yo kwicwa
tereza afite igikundiro nababandi uba ubona bakonje baramukunda
ibitangazamakuru mpuzamahanga byavuze ko amasasu yumvikanye i kinshasa ariko nyuma hakagaruka ituze
ikiruhuko kinini kizajya kiba mu kwezi kwa nzeli gusa
kubera iyo mpamvu ndatsindagira bintu bibiri uburyo igifaransa cyahagaritswe mu rwanda n'amahindura yacyo
nta kintu na kimwe gituma isi iba nini cyane ku buryo yajya kure y'inshuti
umuntu aba umunyamuryango nyuma y'ijonjora kandi nibo bohererezwa igitabo
ibicuruzwa byose bifitwe n'abafaransa hano rero kubatsinda byari ibintu bigoye kuri twe
ku buryo mu minsi mike yimuwe nshuro ebyiri zose
yahinze ibihumyo kuva ari umwana kuko ariwo murimo ise yakoraga
bavuga ko kuba uruganda rutunganya icyayi rwa gatare rutinze kuzura birimo bibahombya
hashize icyumweru bamwiye ko natsinzwe ushinzwe kunshakira amakipe arimo arashaka iyindi
biragorana ko umuntu nk'uwo yajya mu kabyiniro ni iyo mpamvu twateguye iki gitaramo
hana yasengeraga mu mutima iminwa ye ikanyeganyega ariko ijwi ntirisohoke
cyane ko uyu mugore we yanze kenshi ko safi agaragaza ko bakundana
abakozi umunani nibo bapfuye i gihe uyu muhanda wakorwaga
intare nayo irye ingwe maze na njye mbarya mwese
hamwe n'abagore be batanu n'abana be icyenda na nyina kanjogera n'abo mu muryango wabo
igihembwe kibamo ibyumweru umunani byo kwigisha integanyanyigisho yagendeye kuri ibyo byumweru
abantu beshi bakunda kuryama biseguye ariko imisego yose si myiza
ntiyagendanaga n'insoresore z'inkozi z'ibibi kubera ko yarezwe neza
nubwo ibyo dukeka tutarabyemeza kuko hakegeranywa ibimenyetso  n'iperereza ku cyateye impanuka rikaba rigikomeza
umuntu na n'ubu ijuru rimuhanze amaso ngo rimukize icyaha
yavuze ko kiliziya gatolika igomba gukaza ibisabwa mu guhitamo abashaka kuba abapadiri
bimwe mu bibazo by'abacitse ku icumu ntibikemuka ku buryo burambye
ntukakire buhumyi ibije byose nibyo bizagufasha gutinda mu rukundo
uyu mugabo avuga ko iyo amenyo y'ingona agera ku igufwa byari kugorana
iyo mibare ngo ni iy'abana baba bafashwe bakajyanwa mu bigo ngororamuco
ushobora no kohereza ubutumwa bukoze mu mashusho mu amajwi n'ibindi
hashize ibyumweru bitatu nyandwi ashimutiwe mu mujyi wa muhanga none umuryango we uratabaza
iyo mishinga yiganjemo ibikorwa remezo nk'amashuri ibigo nderabuzima imidugudu amashanyarazi n'imihanda
yagumye ivuga ko izatera amerika na koreya y'epfo kuva aho ishyiriweho ibihano n'amahanga
ntabwo ari ibyo kwihanganirwa ukuntu akora irondaruhu bamwanjamye binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga
uko waba ukize kose isanduku uzahambwamo izaba ari urukiramende ntabwo izaba ari uruziga
inkuru nk'izi ziba zigamije gufasha abazisoma kugira icyo bakunguka cyane cyane urubyiruko
yari ayifite mu gihugu cya kenya no mu birwa bya morise
nta magambo biba byarateye ngo ni uko umuntu unyuze mu murima w'impeke uw'imbuto cyangwa ku muzabibu
itangazamakuru ryo muri leta zunze ubumwe za amerika ryatangaje ko beyonse yibarutse
ayinkamiye yahise ageza ikibazo cye kuri sitasiyo ya polisi y'i gihundwe
aribo biyerurutsaga bagahisha ko batinya icyaha hamwe n'umuco wabarangaga w'ishyaka ryo guhesha imana icyubahiro bakabirutisha ibindi byose
hari ubwo imana ibareka bakiyumvamo amahoro icyakora igahoza ijisho ku migenzereze yabo
buri gihe mba mparanira gukora ikintu kidasanzwe kibonwa kandi kinakoranye ubwenge ntawe niganye
uvuye iburyo mushimiyimana niyonzima na ngomirakiza igihe bishyushyaga
iyi gahunda ngo iri mu rwego rwo guteza imbere kugenda n'amaguru no guhuza imihanda
bwana petero yavuze ko yari asigaye yumva yaratereranywe na leta y'ubufaransa
yakomeje agira ati ibimenyetso bihari birakomeye kandi biragaragaza ibyaha bikomeye byo kurya ruswa mu mikino
ubundi bagatozwa imyuga n'ubumenyingiro bizabafasha kwigirira akamaro nibasezererwa muri iki kigo
mushiki wanjye ati nkwiye gukuramo inda kuko nkiri muto cyane sinabyara
nibwo bukungu butamungwa imana yaduhishuriye muri uriya mwana watuvukiye i betelehemu
yavuze ko simba yarekuwe mu cyumweru gishize mu ibanga aho yari afungiye
maze ibikeri byuzura mu gihugu cyose igihugu cyose gikwira umunuko kugera ibwami kwa farawo ariko ntibyatumye abarekura
kugeza ubu umuhungu muto afungiye kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ya kanjongo
ntagozera yatanze ikiganiro gisobanura imvo n'imvano ya jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu rwanda
uyu munsi mu gihugu hose hatangijwe icyumweru cyahariwe ibikorwa bya polisi
inteko nshingamategeko y'ubwongereza n'ubufaransa zitegerejweho kugira icyo zivuga ku bitero biherutse
iteme rya sarajevo ririmo rirubakwa mu mujyi wa bariselone muri esipanye
reba amashusho y'indirimbo nshya bafatanyije na nolesi yitwa baramponda
izi nzirakarengane z'abasirikare bakagombye gukorera igihugu n'imiryango yabo none bakomeje kwicwa bazira ibitekerezo byabo
urenga inzu ebyiri uvuye ku giti cy'ipamba kizwi cyane
ndetse n'aho bigeze kugira ngo biterwe inkunga bityo bizakomeze kugirira abanyarwanda akamaro
umukobwa wamenyekenye ku kabyiniriro ka biju yerekanye amafoto agaragaza amabere ye
ntimute umwanya mukemura ibibazo bitari ngombwa cyangwa muvuga amagambo atabafitiye akamaro
bavugaga ko igihe kigeze ngo batere ingabo mu bitugu turampu ariko we abyumva nko kumwibasira
icyambere ni imyumvire ishingiye ku muco nyarwanda hagakurikiraho imyemerere y'amadini cyangwa amatorero
sinshaka kwicuza ibyaha ku munyabyaha nkanjye ngo ni uko yambaye ikanzu cyangwa yize ishuri runaka
haravugwa ikibazo cy'ibitabo byanditse mu nyandiko z'abatabona bikiri bike mu gihugu
indege yo mu bwoko bwa antonovu yakorewe mu gihugu cy'u burusiya
icyakora gitoli uyobora akagali ka kagasa mu murenge wa gahanga avuga ko ikibazo gishingiye ku myumvire
nk'uko ibyiciro byabo byari bimeze abe ariko bagenda
umucukuzi w'ishwagara ntiyemerewe gukora indi mirimo itari iyo
kwiyicisha inzara ni kimwe mu bigaragaza ko umuntu atishimiye ikintu runaka
abo bayobozi b'amadini n'abayoboke babo bazi ko aribo barimbuye inyokomuntu
kuribwa umutwe bishobora guterwa n'impumuro ikabije cyane ku bantu bakunda kuwurwara
iragena ati twaje gufasha abakecuru b'incike tubereka urukundo nk'uko barutureze
ugendana n'abanyabwenge na we ukaba umunyabwenge wagendana n'abapfapfa ukaba we
muvandimwe ngushimiye ko uri inshuti nziza kandi kwifurije isabukuru nziza
karangwa yakoresheje telephone ye afata amashusho y'urwibutso y'iki gitaramo cy'akataraboneka
madamu mukayiranga yatangaje ko arangije amashuri yisumbuye mu ishami ry'ibinyabuzima n'ubutabire
batanze ibiribwa muri perefegitura zari zishonje ari zo butare na gikongoro
umuryango w'abibumbye wavuze ko ingendo z'indege zajyanaga imfashanyo muri yemeni zabaye zihagaritswe
hari abavuga ko abanyamakuru birukankira kuba impunzi kandi bitoroshye kuba mu buhungiro
iyo habayeho impamvu yongera ibyago byo kurwara kanseri y'ibere iriyongera
harimo barindwi baturuka muri nigeriya batandatu baturuka muri romaniya na bane bo muri alibaniya
inkuru ya peter benenson yise abanyururu bibagiranye yanditswe mu binyamakuru binyuranye hirya no hino ku isi
ariko imfura yigira inama yo kugira ubuntu ikamenya ko ari jye yehova ubeza
ubu sinshobora kubona icyemezo cy'amavuko kubera amakimbirane ari mu muryango mvukamo
ko aha hantu hadatuwe turavana hehe imigati ihaza abantu bangana batya
gusa nubwo izi mpunzi zivuga gutya umuyobozi w'ibitaro bya kirehe siko abibona
ni imyenda itwikira umusatsi igice cya ruguru n'icyo hepfo
muri iki gitaramo hazerakanwa ibyino gakondo n'imikino yo kwishimisha iranga iki gihugu
agira ati sinari nzi ko ntwite batatu kuko ntigeze njya kwa muganga kubera kutagira mituweri
ati ubu ndasezeye kuri iki gice cy'ubuzima bwanjye ariko ntegereje ibizakurikiraho
izi ndushyi ninde waziteye umwaku
cyakora mugeze aho nshaka rwose nimukomereze aho
mama yari ameze nk'umupolisi yahoraga anshakishaho amakosa iyo yampaga imirimo yarangenzuraga
imibare yerekana ko buri kwezi hakorwa inyemezabuguzi zigera kuri miliyoni ebyiri
kanenze abategetsi ba zimbabwe batangaje ko bifashishije abasirikare mu guhosha imyigaragambyo
nanone dawidi yahamagaje sadoki na abiyatari b'abatambyi na uriyeli
ari hamwe na perezida w'u bufaransa basangira banaganira
kazitunga yavuganye na mariya mu gifaransa ariko agasubiza mu cyongereza
iyo ubonye umuntu akora ibibujijwe ukamukingira ikibaba ushaka indonke iyo iba ari ruswa
ari nabo bazajya berekanwa kuri televiziyo zinyuranye zo mu bihugu byo muri aka karere
ati  naganiriye n'abagore bagenzi banjye bangira inama yo kujya ndya igitoki kirimo ubunyobwa n'intoryi
gusa ngo nta muntu waguye muri iyi mpanuka kandi n'icyayiteye ntikiramenyekana
igihe cyose bazaba batarasohoza ibyo imana ntizemera imirimo bayikorera
uru rubyiruko rushimangira ko rusobanukiwe ko gutegura indyo yuzuye bidasaba ubushobozi buhambaye
na bo bashaka kwivumbura ku gitsure cy'ababyeyi babahozaho ijisho
wumva umeze ute iyo ukandagije inkweto zawe ku ijosi ry'abaturage bawe
abantu bane baguye mu mvururu zabaye hagati y'abapolisi n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bari mu myigaragambyo
igihembo cy'umushoramari w'indashyikirwa cyatangijwe kugira ngo abashoramari bahange udushya
bazakiranwa urugwiro kandi kwakira neza abatugana tubigire intego
itahiwacu uzwi ku izina rya melodi ni mwene ntibihangana na muteteri
icyumba sage yapfiriyemo cyaranukaga cyane kuburyo kucyinjiramo byasabaga gupfuka amazuru
iyi ni incamake isobanura ibikorwa by'ingenzi byaranze uyu mwaka
abo bana bavuga ko baje mu mujyi wa kigali gushaka ikibatunga
muri gahunda iri joro turaza kumva mahoro aganira n'umuhanzi mariya
kubarusha ubukire cyangwa umuntu akaba ari ku rwego rurenze urw'abandi
ndetse uwavuga ko ayoboye abakobwa bagenzi be mu bikorwa n'ibigwi mu muziki ntiyaba abeshye
bavuga ko uretse no kwicwa ngo abantu basambanywa ku nguvu abandi bagashimutwa
baturuka mu karere ka nyamasheke ariko ngo nta kazi kazwi bakorera mu mujyi wa nyamagabe
nyuma yo kuyashyikirizwa yashimiye eyateli rwanda yamufashije kugera ku ntego yari afite kuva kera
ni uko bigaragara ko za mpinduka zitamena amaraso za padiri nahimana zigomba kuba ziri hafi
kuba rero twaje tungana gutya ni uko harimo inyungu
hashize amezi ageze muri amerika ntara tangira gukumbura iwabo
hari kandi kongera imbaraga ku bihugu by'afurika mu ruhando rw'ibikize ku isi
kayonza ruhango na kirehe nitwo turere tuza ku isonga mugutanga ubwisungane mu kwivuza
kuburyo habonetse amahirwe yo gukina filime zo ku rwego mpuzamahanga nakwitabira amajonjora y'abakinnyi
kuko mu kwezi kw'amahundo ari bwo uhoraho imana yawe yakwimuye mu misiri ari nijoro
ati uko twongera imbaraga mu gukemura ibi bibazo niko abantu bakomeza kubigaragaza
iyo rero ushimira uwo mwashakanye ku buryo buhoraho ni ikimenyetso cy'uko mubanye munezerewe
umuyobozi w'akarere ka gakenke ushinzwe iterambere ry'ubukungu ni niyonsenga
nimu gihe bari batangiye kwishimira ko umuvandimwe wabo yazanzamutse ibi byose biri mu mpamvu zo kurinda abakozi bacu ikibi
yungamo ati ese wancyuye ukazagaruza ibyo mu muryango
kuko hazajya hakorwa ubushakashatsi bwimbitse kugira ngo haboneke imbuto nziza n'izindi nyongeramusaruro
ibi ntibyigeze biva mu mutwe wa ronalido kuko azi neza ko perezi atamufata nk'umwe mu bakinnyi bakomeye yaguze
gusa umwana yari atwite baramumubyaje kandi kugeza n'ubu nimuzima
yagize ati iyo ntekereje ibyambayeho nkibuka uburyo marume yankundaga numva isi indangiriyeho
iyo wibwiye ko byose wabimenye urukundo rwanyu rutangira kuzamo agatotsi
nafunguye igipangu nta bwoba rwose nkandagira nkumva ndahamije
yagize ati jye uwayinyibye yari anciye ugutwi kubera imbaraga yakoresheje ayinshikuza kuko nagendaga nyivugiraho
ariko tubashishikariza kubireka kandi hari ababivuyeho kuko babonye ko ntacyo bimaze
muri ako karere bashyize imbere isuku no kurwanya imirire mibi
kwishyuza abantu kugira ngo ubahanurire ni ukugerageza ukwizera kwabo
aba bakinnyi batatu barimo barumvikana n'ikipe haruna niyonzima akinamo
anashinjwa ko yarindaga bariyeri ziciweho abatutsi bari batuye muri ako gace
gushishikara kugira ngo umwaka utaha buri munyarwanda yumve ko agomba gutabarira urwatubyaye
si ibyifuzo nkeneye ahubwo ni kumva ko ntari jyenyine
mfite umwanya wo gusubiza ubutumwa nabonye mu byumweru bitatu bishize
gaperi yavuze ko batunganyije aho bakorera ku buryo nta rusaku rusohoka
ashobora kongera gutsindwa nyuma yo gusibira kuko impamvu nyakuri zitaba zitaweho maze bikamudindiza
ntabwo ari indyarya kuko iyo afite icyo ashaka kukubwira ntaca ikibungo
yishimira ko mu muryango we bafite amahoro n'umutuzo kandi ntasesagura umutungo
nyakarundi yagize ati dufite imiti ikoreshwa ku ruhu ahafite ikibazo
si ubwa mbere abategetsi b'u bufaransa babuza imbwa kumoka
icyubahiro cyabo cyari hafi gushira bagatatana nk'uko umukungugu utumurwa n'umuyaga
uturwa tumwe na tumwe twubatseho amahotel abereye ijisho
abaregwa basabye kuburana badafunze kuko ibyaha bashinjwa batabikoze
umusore abona inomero yanjye ya telefoni akanyoherereza ubutumwa bw'urukundo
amafaranga y'urugendo avugwa mu gika cya mbere cy'iyi ngingo ntahabwa abayobozi bakuru
tukajya tujyana kuri sitade nka sitade ya kigali nabwo sinumve yogeza
yari afungiye muri gereza ashinjwa icyaha cyo gukubita
ikindi n'uko ahantu nk'aha hahurira abantu benshi baje kubyina cyangwa kwunywa inzoga hatabura abadukenera
bwa mbere iserukiramuco rya sinema rya kane mu bufaransa ryaratangijwe
byatumye niheba ntegereza umunsi wo gupfa
utwo turemajambo twitwa ngo iki
bandebereho ni umusaza ufite urukundo n'ubwitange
ni nayo yabaye imvano y'inkomoko y'imiryango migari y'abanyarwanda
abantu bakunda injyana ya coga ndabashimira kuko batahwemye kunshyigikira
ngira ngo mwabonye ko mu mukino ubanza ntacyo yaturushaga twarakinnye iratsinda
bakareba ibigenda n'ibitagenda maze bakumvikana na leta y'u rwanda bagashyiraho gahunda z'ibiganiro
abarebye umukino u rwanda rwakinnye na uganda n'uwo rwatsinzwemo na kenya
mbanenande yahamwe n'ibyaha byo kwica no gushishikariza kwica abatutsi mu yahoze ari perefegitura ya kibuye
uburyo uririmba ntushobora kumva uburyo utuma umutima wanjye utera cyane
ikosa rikomeye salomo yakoze ni ukwibwira ko akomeye ku buryo atahirikwa n'abapagani yifatanyije nabo
ndetse yamutumyeho bamwe mu bayobozi b'iyi kipe baganira akanya gato nyuma y'umukino
ambasaderi karitanyi yatanze impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u rwanda muri irelande
abacukura amabuye y'agaciro ni ba nyirabayazana mu kwanduza amazi y'imigezi
ivumburwa rya tv ryazanye impinduka mubuzima bwacu bwa buri munsi
barokokeye jenoside i gihundwe mu karere ka rusizi we n'umuhungu we
abwira mulisa ati ngwino ubambwirire mu kinyarwanda jye ntibanyumva
ibintu byose biramushimisha ariko nifuza kubona inkweto akora
gusa iyo yihese bikabije ingaruka zivukamo ni uko n'inyonjo iba itagishoboye kuvurwa
yaririmbye injyana zinyuranye
i nyamagabe yaririmbye zimwe mu ndirimbo za nolesi ari nako avuza vuvuzera
cyangwa se nawe mukobwa niba ufite umukunzi akaba hari ibyo agukorera ukumva urishimye watwunganira
uretse kuyoga bamwe baranayavoma bakayanywa bavuga ko asukura mu nda akanavura impyiko
abadepite babajije impamvu icyo kigo gishinzwe imiyoborere kirebererwa n'imitwe ya politiki
namenye ko bamwe mu banyeshuri ari impfubyi abandi bakava mu miryango ikennye
ngo mujye mu gihugu cyiza yehova imana yanyu agiye kubaha ho umurage
ibyamamare byambariye umugeni w'inshuti zabo magara
bityo rero imico yacu igomba kuba inzu imana ituramo
mu bice by'akarere ka bugesera hari ahantu hatandukanye haba indaya
ku giciro cyagenwe igare ry intambara baritumizaga muri egiputa ku biceri by'ifeza magana atanu
ati twumvaga twaragerage kubana neza na buri wese tukumva aho tugeze tutari dukwiye gukorerwa ibintu nka biriya
monsengo yasabye abategetsi guhagarika kwica abaturage nk'uko yabivuze mu magambo ye
ashize amanga yasubije ibibazo yabajijwe n'umunyamakuru wa inyarwanda
cyangwa wabutakaje kubera indwara impanuka intambara cyangwa izindi mpamvu
uyu mugore yagize ati narariraga cyane nkamwinginga ngo arekere aho ariko ntiyigeze angirira mpuhwe
namenye ko u rwanda ruzitabira iryo irushanwa
agira ati no mu nyamanswa tubona ko isake ari yo yirukankana inkokokazi
basobanurirwa ko intwari ishyirwa mu cyiciro harebwe uburyo yitangiye abandi
kandi ubu mfite  ingamba nshya zo kuririmba kuko mpugutse
baherutse gutangaza ko batakiri inshuti nubwo babyaranye
ariko nzi neza ko bitewe nuko muganga yambwiye n'icyo yantegetse ntegereje igisubizo cyiza
mu bitaramo bakora baririmba indirimbo mama munyana
abatavuga rumwe na leta bashinja perezida kabila gukora uko ashoboye ngo agume ku butegetsi
iri tegeko rishya ryongeraho na jenoside zose zahanwe n'inkiko zo mu bufaransa ndetse n'inkiko mpuzamahanga
havugwaga ko mu byo ashinjwa harimo no gucuranga indirimbo z'abanyarwanda kandi zibujijwe i burundi
ni uku bizimana yari yambaye mu gitaramo cya mbere yaririmbyemo i burayi
bityo abatuye mu murenge wa huye barasaba inzego bireba gukomeza umukwabu no kubafasha guhashya ayo mabandi
nahuye n'itsinda ry'abahanzi ryitwa akitive bansaba kuririmbana nabo
komisiyo yasanze hari ibiteganywa n'itegeko ku bijyanye no kujonjora
ikibazo cy'ikwirakwizwa ry'intwaro zizakoreshwa mu bwicanyi cyari gihangayikishije benshi nkuko twabigaragaje
aho basabwe kuba abanyamwuga no gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rya murandasi kuko byabungura ubumenyi
reba amafoto yaciye ibintu ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye
aha niho yakuye ubushobozi bwo kujya gukora ubusitani ahandi abifashijwemo n'uwari umukoresha we
ati iyo utanga ubutumwa mu ikinamico bwumvikana kurusha gusoma imbwirwaruhame
umwami salomo yandikiye ab'ibisekuru byakurikiyeho abamenyesha amateka yaranze imyaka yapfushije ubusa
icyo kimpoteri giherereye mu mudugudu wa kabagendera kimaze igihe kitubakiye
ariko ntibyagira icyo bitanga ageza n'aho avuga ko u rwanda rwuzuye
arisanzura ariko rimwe na rimwe ntagaragaza ibitekerezo bye kuko agira amakenga
igerageza ryakorewe ku inyamaswa
ryerekanye ko bishobora gutera kanseri z ubwoko bwose
abaririmbyi bateranye amacupa n'ibirahure mu kabari
abazajya muri iyo myigaragambyo barateganya kuzagenda bitwaje ibitabo bya bibiriya imisaraba n'amashapure
kuko ari na yo abafasha mu dukorwa duto duto tubafasha kuzamura imiryango yabo
agira ati twabasabye guhagarika ibikorwa by'iri torero kuko inyubako rikoreramo zitujuje ibisabwa n'amategeko agenga imyubakire
ntibavuga kanyonjo gatosho na gatuza ahubwo bavuga umuntu ufite ubumuga bw'inyonjo
agacishamo akabeshya ko intore ze zikora za mudasobwa
bivuze ko intero ya mpayimana ari ukutavuga rumwe na leta ariko bidasenya
aba bagabo bombi bakoreshejwe muri gahunda zo gushinja u bufaransa mu bihe bitandukanye
nk'uko abanditsi babivuga ni ukubaka abanyarwanda no kurwanya abapfobya bakanahakana jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
barabaragiza amarira bo batarira ahubwo batwara imicuzo n'impozamarira ba nyagupfa bibereye mu gahinda gusaaaa
iyi niyo myambarire itaravuzweho rumwe muri kigali fashoni iheruka kuba
gerageza gutanga inshoza y'insigamigani
imvugo igira iti utabusya abwita ubumera twabonye ko ari umugani mugufi
ni uko umwami w'abayisirayeli na we atera abagenderaga ku mafarasi n'amagare
ugabanye indyo irimo amavuta menshi n'isukari nyinshi wibande ku mbuto n'imboga
yarageraga abantu bakava kuri radiyo rwanda bagakurikira iyo kinamico ntibabe bacyumvise inyigisho zo kuri radio y'igihugu cyacu
cyakomeje kivuga ko azagaragara muri iyi filimi nta twongera bwiza yishyizeho
ibihugu bikennye kurusha ibindi nibyo bibonekamo cyane imiti itemerewe gukoreshwa
abaforomo benshi bo muri kenya bigaragambije kubera kutumvikana na guverinoma ku mishahara
usabyimana gelasi watorewe kuyobora komite nshya yavuze ko ibyo basabwe byose bazabikurikiza
perezida wa komisiyo y'igihugu y'amatora avuga ko nta tegeko rivuga ko umukandida atumirwa n'inteko itora
kuri sitade yahoze yitwa kamarampaka hari hahungiye abatutsi bagera ku bihumbi bitanu
aya matora agamije kuvana igihugu mu bihe by'imvururu kimazemo imyaka itatu
ubu aracyashakishwa kuko twamenye ko ari uwo mu karere ka burera
kanyankore yirukanwe amaze guhamagara abakinnyi bazitabira umukino wa gana
afite inzu ihenze i makinde anafite inzu itunganya umuziki ikomeye
bigeze nyuma ya sa sita narazamutse nsubira mu rusisiro
ubwo rero sinavuga ko nciye umuco mu banyarwanda kuko ndimo ndashaka amafaranga
bamwe mu baturage baturiye ako kabari batabaje polisi bavuga ko batewe n'abantu bitwaje intwaro
mu mpamvu ubushinjacyaha bwajuriye harimo ko hari itegeko abacamanza batakoresheje kandi ubushinjacyaha bwararishingiyeho burega ingabire
ingoro ndangamurage mu bufaransa yafunguwe ku mugaragaro mu mujyi wa pari icyo yiyemeje gukora aragikora ntabwo yakwemerera ikintu ngo uzagombe kumwibutsa cyangwa kumwishyuza
ubu banampaye akazi sinirirwa nta umwanya muri iyi mpeshyi
tugomba kwikubita ku rutare tugashenjagurwa na rwo mbere yo kuzamurwa muri kirisitu
kandi bikatwibagiza imirimo yacu ya buri munsi turangiza twarushye
ati ese ariya mafaranga ko ari menshi sha nzayakorera pe
ahubwo turasaba ko yavanwa byihuse ku rutonde rw'intwari z'u rwanda
ikigega nyafurika gitsura amajyambere cyatanze impano ya miliyoni icumi
akomeza avuga ko atajya ahangana cyangwa ngo aregere inkiko kubera guhagarikwa azira akarengane
niyo mpamvu rero muri iki gice cya kabiri nabahitiyemo amagambo yakoreshwaga ku mwami
nk'u rwanda leta z'ibihugu zisabwa gufata uburezi nk inkingi y'iterambere rirambye
ikindi cy'umwihariko ni uko ari cyo gihugu cyinjiye bwa nyuma muri aka karere
abantu batabarika banyuraga mu nzira nyabagendwa zo mu bwami bwa salomo ntibamenyeshejwe yehova
ndabasuhuje nshuti muteze amatwi radiyo uyu ni umwanya w'ikiganiro imvo n'imvano
ibi barabivuga mu gihe bamaze igihe batabona nigitonyanga mu mavomero
nkwifurije umwaka mushya muhire wibuka inkuru nziza zabaye mu buzima bwawe
hashyirwaho itsinda rishinzwe kugenzura uko imihigo ishyirwa mu bikorwa
ibyo rero byanteye kwibaza ndushaho gusesengura ngo numve igisobanuro nyacyo cy'ijambo rye
nyirasafari ufite abana babiri baharerewe ari incuke yishimira uburyo ryigisha n'uko rifata abana muri rusange
mubyara we azazanwa no gutwika intumbi no kwarura amagufa mu nzu
yanditse ko ayasheshe kubera ko ikigo nta mikoro gifite iby'umutekano ntiyabikomozaho
uwiteka avuze atya mu nzu ya dawidi hazavuka umwana witwa yosiya
yagize ati yari amaze imyaka myinshi atajya ku mugore we w'isezerano
yagize ati wamaganye buri wese witwaza idini agatuka ababyeyi
rwanditse ko neymar ari umukirisitu gatulika utanga amaturo n'icyacumi
ati mujye mwiga mutekereza guhanga umulimo kurusha kwishyuza ugomba kuwubaha
inyuma imwe irayiruma bikomeye iz'imbere zishaka kuyifata ijosi ihangana nazo ari nako yigobotora irimo iyirumira inyuma
ni bimwe mu bihembo samputu yahawe hirya no hino ku isi
bizimungu avuga ko afite abakinnyi bumva amabwiriza yabahaye ariko badafite uburambe
imyumvire ikiri hasi n'ubujiji bavuga ko bitera ubukene
ndi umu rasita niba mfite imyemerere ikwiye mbese ndi uwo nkwiriye kuba we
kandi itagize icyo ibura isaba gukorerwa n'ibiremwa byayo kubera icyubahiro biyifitiye
gukira indwara yo mu mutwe ntibyoroshye uko biri kwose
abahanuzi ba bayali bari basenze basakuza kandi bavuga amagambo aterekeranye
avuga ko ubwo yabigeragezaga yambuwe n'utwo yarafite akisubirira aho yabaga
iyi ni imwe mu ndirimbo zigize album yanjye ya gatatu nzasohora mu mpera z'umwaka
yaravuze atiiki gikorwa cyo gufunga insengero nk'izi kirakorerwa mu gihugu hose
bikaba ari bimwe mu ntwaro zo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina
naho se icyigeze kugushyimisha kurusha ibindi ni iki  ese ni nde wakigukoreye
iyi ndirimbo fite amajwi yatunganyirijwe muri kina iyobowe na ishimwe
ngo arashaka ko akurikiranwa akabazwa ku byerekeye urupfu rwa karamage
hari igihe navaga mu ishuri ngataha nkaba namara igihembwe ntarigarutsemo
umunyamideli ni umwe mu bari bitabiriye iki gitaramo
ati bamwe bacuruza kubera ko babonye abandi babyungukiramo ariko ibi sibyo
gapfizi na we yari mu batangije urugamba rwo kubohora u rwanda
langwida wafashwe n'isasu yakomeretse bikomeye mu mayunguyungu ibumoso no mu kiganza cy'iburyo
mbese ubwo bagenje batya igiti kikiri kibisi nikimara kuma hazacura iki
mu myaka irindwi itaha umuryango inkotanyi wifuza ko u rwanda rukomeza gutera imbere
ibi bisabwa kubahirizwa mu gihe ugiye guhura n'umwamikazi
yabonye ibaruwa bamusaba gutangiza umushinga bitaga uwa manatani wo gukora intwaro z'ubumara
basabwe kuzana ikindi cyemezo cyerekana ko ubuyobozi bwemeza ko bari muri icyo cyiciro
hari iteka rya minisitiri rigena serivisi zitagomba guhungabanywa
uwo mugabo yamweretse imodoka yari yarapfuye yari mu busitani hanyuma aramubaza ati ushobora kuyikora
zifite amataliki n'aho zasinyiwe byerekana uruhare rw'abashinjwa mu byo bakurikiranyweho
harimo perefegitura ya kibungo kibuye butaregitarama n'iyahoze ari iy'umujyi wa kigali
aho mpera mvuga ko atampaza ni uko ntajya ndangiza kandi nzi uko bimera
kalisa yemereye ikinyamakuru umuryango ko ajya yumva abaturanyi ba nyakwigendera bavuga ko ntivuguruzwa yabanaga na umuhoza
umva indirimbo ebyiri ziri mu nshyashya aheruka gusohora
bafatanya n'inzego z'ibanze iz'abikorera amashuri makuru n'ayisumbuye n'amadini
ati uyu mushinga w'ubwubatsi ni umwe muri gahunda z'iterambere ikigo cyiyemeje gukora muri afurika
no mu buzima ufashe urugero rw bitaro by'indwara zo mu mutwe by'i ndera ibintu byose ubu bikoresha ikoranabuhanga
urubyiruko rwagaragajwe nk'urukwiye guhabwa umwihariko mu kubaka umunyarwanda urangwa n'ibihe isi igezemo
buterango isuku yo mu mutwe we ayitekerezaho kurusha ibindi byose
ati tuzamworohereza kubona inguzanyo tumwishingire abashe kugura moto ye byihuse
urubuto rwa wotameloni rugira amazi atuma umuntu agira imisemburo ituma ashaka gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina
mu nyamaswa zitari ingagi hari iz'inyamabere nk'inguge zo mu bwoko bw'inkima
nawe yemeje iby'iyi mpanuka ariko avuga ko kugeza ubu imibiri y'aba bagabo uko ari babiri itaraboneka
icyo gihe abakobwa bahatanye nta myitozo ihagije bakoze kugeza ku musozo w'irushanwa
bakishakira umugisha w'umwuka ubaganisha ku gukoresha uwo mwuka wera mu kwishakira indamu
inama bangiriye bambwiye ko ngomba kugabanya imirimo nkora nkaruhuka
arasaba abanyarwanda kumushyigikira mu irushanwa ryo ku rwego rw'isi rya banyampinga b'umuco
bibasaba kongera kubaka uyu munsi no mu myaka izaza
yagize ati ni umwe gusa utarimo ukora nk'ibisanzwe kubera imirimo yo kubaka
yongeyeho ati abo bakinnyi bose barasa nk'abanezerewe ariko igihe cyo kugira icyo dutangaza ntikaragera
buriya ngo singombwa cyane kubwira umugore ko ushaka ko mutera akabariro
ndasaba abakunda umuziki bose kuzaza kunshyigikira kuko nabateguriye ibintu byiza cyane
ni yo mpamvu iyi komisiyo ikwiye kureba amategeko atajyanye n'igihe akavugururwa
umutwe ni igice cy'umubiri mugomba kwitondera kuko mushobora kugira ibibazo
akomeza avuga ko hari ibintu bidasobanutse byakozwe na kazungu nk'abantu b'inshuti magara
abenshi bakoresha ibintu bibi ugasanga bibatera n'ibindi bibazo byinshi
akigera mu rwanda yabanje kujya gusura ikigo kirererwamo abana bafite ubumuga bwo kutabona
abaturage bagaragaza ko bishimiye inyubako z amashuri n'isuku izirimo
nuko ujye wumva uri mu ijuru utegeke kandi ucire abagaragu bawe imanza
nyakubahwa perezida nabasabaga ko mwasuzuma icyo kibazo mukazambwira icyo mugitekerezaho n'umwanzuro wanyu
ati binagwaho iyo ahitamo kujya muri havadi cyangwa ahandi bari kumwakira ariko yihitiyemo kujya i rwinkwavu kandi ntacyo bimutwaye
ati bishobotse buri munyarwanda yahinga ibihumyo kuko birwanya imirire mibi byera vuba kandi ku butaka buto
yagize ati nijye mfura iwacu ndamutse nshatse umugabo ntakowe byababaza ababyeyi banjye
byari ku bushake bwe ngo yinjire neza mubyo arimo
basakaga urugo rwe ruherereye mu gace kitwa nakuru bamuta muri yombi
mu gitaramo kimeze nk'ibyo ineza aherutse gukorera huye
harimo imiryango itegamiye kuri leta imiryango ikorera mu baturage n'abakorera sosiyete sivili
ibi bizatuma hamenyekane abiyandikishije mu gihugu no mu mijyi runaka bityo bagenerwe ibiro by'itora
janete yabanje kurwibutsa ko rugize igice kinini cy'abatuye u rwanda
hari amakuru avuga ko bakubitwa bagakoregwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina abandi bakicwa
ikintu cya nyuma wifuza gukora ni ugutandukanya abakumva ku buryo bakwinginga ngo ureke kubivangira mu buzima
ariko ibivugirwa hanze ntibyatuma dutukana ngo natwe tube nkabo
kuyitunganira bavomye ku isoko y'ubuzima babikesha kumva ijambo ryayo ribeshaho
abaturage bibumbiye mu makoperative bahawe imbuto y'imyumbati n'ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubuhinzi
aha yagize ati ba nyir'amazu batamenyesheje iki cyemezo abayacururizamo barahemutse cyane
iyi alubumu izagaragaraho indirimbo ziri mu njyana zitandukanye cyane cyane hipapu
yaravuze ati nshimishwa n'ukuntu ubu nshobora gusomera abandi bibiliya kandi mbere byarangoraga
haravugwa inkuru y'abantu bishyize hamwe bakora amatsinda yo kuririra abapfuye mu gihe cyo gushyingura
aba baturage bishimira ko ku bufatanye n'abajyanama b'ubuzima imyumvire yahindutse
n'inshuti ye bari baraye ijoro ryose binywera urumogi
ibi bihugu bivuga ko uburusiya bwagize uruhare mu iyicwa ry'umutasi wabwo waguye mu bwongereza
badege yari yasobanuye ko kuvogera urugo bigize ibyaha bihanwa n'amategeko ahana y'u rwanda
umwe muri bo yagize atiiyo winjiye mu cyumba bapimiramo ubusugi wumva uhahamutse
ariko biragaragara ko muri iyi minsi aho kugabanuka biyongera
akabafungirana mu byumba birimo gazi akabakorera iyicarubozo bamwe bagasukwaho aside amagufa yabo akayasya mu mashini
yongeyeho ko ari igisubizo cy'abajyaga bajya mu mirimo bahangayitse kubera ingo zabo cyangwa ibindi
hari umukungu mu mudugudu wa okonkwo wari ufite ibigega bitatu binini
gaburira umwana wawe indyo yiganjemo imyunyungugu na vitamine de umurinde kuzagendera imitego
hari ingero nyinshi z'ibintu bifitanye isano no kurwara kanseri
nuko umwami ati uyu ni we mwana wa sacyega wereweho n'umusatsi gutya
ukwanga atiretse aravuga ngo karaba turwane kandi agapfa kaburiwe ni impongo
polisi yagereranyije ubu bwicanyi n'iyicarubozo ryahitanye benshi kuva intambara yatangira mu buyapani
aho bakomeje gushinja uyu munyamakuru gukora ibikorwa bibi byo kugenzura ibikorerwa muri palesitina
avuga ko biteye ipfunwe kuba jenoside yarabaye mu rwanda amahanga arebera
kubera ko wubatse mu mazi uyu muhanda ukunda gufungwa hirindwa ibizazane
iyo ntekereje ibyo nagezeho nshimira imana itanga umugisha umuryango wanjye ndetse n'inshuti bakungahaza ubuzima bwanjye
yagize ati uwo mugororwa arimo arashakishwa mudufashe aboneke asubizwe muri gereza
igihe ugiye guhitamo izina tekereza irizorohera abantu kurivuga kuko uko riborohera kurivuga ari nako badapfa kuryibagirwa
avuga ko igihe cyo kwiyandikisha kidashobora kuzongerwa namba
asanga ikibazo ari ukutumvikana hagati y'izo nzego cyangwa harimo abashaka inyungu zabo bwite
impera z'icyumweru zituma hari ababura serivisi bari bakeneye
ibicumuro byacu byose byashyizwe kuri kirisitu we wabaye incungu yacu n'ubwishingizi bwacu
umwe muri aba baturage avuga ko yangirijwe ibikorwa byinshi yizezwa kuzahabwa ingurane ariko ngo na n'ubu ntakirakorwa
malayika w'imana azitambuka hontiyica abana b'imfura b'abayisiraheli bakijijwe n'amaraso y'umwana w'intama
yashimiye perezida museveni kuko yitanze akaza mu rusengero kandi aba afite imirimo myinshi
gusa aje naramwibwiye kuko mu gitondo yari yaje kuvoma mpita mumenya kuko asa na se cyane
ni byiza gushyiraho ishami ryigisha kuzigisha mu mashuri y'incuke n'ay'ababana n'ubumuga
ibiganiro byabo bizibanda ku bibazo byo gutsura umubano hagati y'ibihugu byombi
aba baturage ntibabyemeye bahise babimenyesha sitasiyo ya polisi ya kanyinya maze ifata iyo modoka n'umushoferi
inzoga ni kimwe mu bintu bishobora kubasenyera bayinyoye cyane kurusha abatware b'ingo
ibanga ngo ryari umuhate no kwereka abantu ko bamwibeshyeho atari umuswa
imana yankoreye ibitangaza kuko mu mezi atatu namaze ku gasozi baranjugunye ntacyo nabaye nkaba ndiho kandi nyishimira
abazi iby'uru rugendo batangaje ko rwari ruteguye neza byose biri ku murongo
sebanani yinjiye mu kibuga asimbuye cyubahiro naho ntwali asimbura uwimana
yanahamije ko ari inshuti ya sugira agira ati sugira ni inshuti yanjye bikomeye
abo ni bamwe mu basanzwe bacururiza izo mbuto mu isoko ry'ibiribwa ry'i musanze
nina akomeza avuga ko gukora cyane no kuryama amasaha make byabanje kubatera ubwoba
yahisemo kuzibera mpagazehe cyangwa bamporiki kandi ariwe nyirabayazana
