ariko nyuma yo kwigishwa no guhugurwa ku buryo bwo kwizigamira ubu mfite icyizere cy'ejo hazaza
ngitangira kuririmba baranshyigikiye cyane ndibuka ko na gitari ya mbere natunze ari data wari wayinguriye
kubera iki tutatangirira ku bizana cyane uwo mwotsi nk'imodoka zirekura iyo myuka mibi
ngo ntibazatandukana muri uyu mwaka nubwo bavugwaho gucana inyuma
n'ibi tuzabyigaho hazanwe udukingirizo dufite impumuro zidatuma hari abanga kudukoresha
ubwo rero ari uko bimeze birumvikana ko jake nziza bamwohereje kure kuko atagikenewe
farawo akuramo impeta ye iriho ikimenyetso ayambika yozefu amwambika n'imyenda myiza n'umukufi wa zahabu
mu ntangiriro yemeye ko yarushijwe ariko nyuma yisubiraho avuga ko amatora yabayemo inenge
aho niho uzasanga yaracecetse cyane adashaka ko muhura kandi ntacyo mwapfuye bikakuyobera
gacinya yaganiriye n'abo mu muryango wa katawuti
ibiganiro ni uburyo buteza imbere ubwumvikane
muri ayo magambo byabagamba yashinje leta y'u rwanda ubwicanyi
iburanishwa ryasubitswe saa sita n'igice kuko uregwa yari kujya ku mashini imuyungururira amaraso kuko arwaye impyiko
yifuza kubona akazi cyangwa umwuga wazamuviramo imibereho ifatika
yagize ati wakoze cyane kubera kwihangana ubugwaneza no gukomeza kunkunda
aba bahanzi barimo samanta bakoranye indirimbo sinkakubure na mukombozi emeranse n'abandi
ibirori byo kwibuka uwo munyamakuru mu ibyumweru bine bishize byabereye imusanze
impinduka zavuye ku myigaragambyo y'abagore zagize akamaro ku bagore no ku bagabo
rusagara na we ashinjwa icyaha cyo gukwirakwiza nkana ibihuha agomesha rubanda anarwangisha ubutegetsi
igikorwa cyabo cya mbere cyari ukurasa buri wese wari uhagaze kuri kontwari
bankirane yashimye aho u rwanda rugeze mu iterambere n'uruhagejeje ariwe perezida kagame
bamukundisha ishuri afunguka mu mutwe ku buryo iyo mbonye ukuntu arikunda numva nshimye abashyizeho iki kigo
twembi dufite impamyabumenyi zo muri havadi mfite imwe we afite ebyiri
mu gihe cyo kuvanwa mu misiri kwegurira abana b'imfura uwiteka na none byarategetswe
ati sinkunda gushyira imbere umushahara akenshi nshyira imbere guharanira ubuzima bwiza bw'abakinnyi
uku kwirinda ni ingenzi mu kutwongerera imbaraga z'ibitekerezo no guhishurirwa iby'umwuka
yasannye megido yari iherereye ku nzira y'amafarasi yavaga i damasiko yerekeza mu misiri
ati mahungu yamaze kwiyita alufonse yishimira kujya asohoka mu bitaro agahura n'abaturage maze na bo baramwishimira cyane
bitera benshi urujijo bamwe bakanavuga ko biba byihishe inyuma y'izindi mbaraga zitazwi
kandi ni ikintu cyakemuka ku buryo bworoshye duhinduye imibereho y'abantu
ariko umwuka wose utavuga yezu utyo ntiwavuye ku mana ahubwo ni umwuka wa nyamurwanyakristu
atangaza ko hari abanyarwanda bahunze basize bakoze jenoside yakorewe abatutsi
abwiriza ubutumwa bwiza yavuze ko igihe cyagenwe gisohoye
muri iki gihe ni mu buhe buryo inteko nyobozi ishaka abayobozi
biratangaje kubona abantu nka bariya bafata umuntu bakamutegeza imbwa ikamurya
izo ni inkweto zo mu bwoko bwa sandali yakoze kandi zikunzwe cyane mu rwanda
undi yagize ati iki ni ikimenyetso cy'uko ayoboye amerika yagwirwa n'akaga
ahita ateguza abantu ko bagiye kubona igikorwa cyo kugerageza kwiyahura gica kuri televiziyo ako kanya
abari mu myigaragambyo baburijemo ibikorwa byinshi byari biteganyijwe n'akanama gashinzwe gutegura amatora
ati inzoga zacu zirushaho kumenyekana no kugurwa ari nyinshi kuko zikunzwe kandi zigera henshi mu gihugu
uyu muhango uzabanzirizwa n'igitaramo ngarukamwaka cyitwa i nyanza twataramye'
kuri benshi kwiyuhagira bikorwa ku mpamvu z'isuku gusa ndetse ingaruka zabaho igihe bidakozwe ntawe uzitindaho
yitezweho kuzafasha ko gahunda ya girinka igenda neza hirindwa ko yabonekamo ibibazo
abaturage rero bamenye uburenganzira bwabo n'aho abatanyuzwe bitabaze inzego zo hejuru
yagize ati mbabazwa n'uko hari igihe umugore wanjye ansuzugura kandi ari jye umutunze
kuba umugabo ari inyanda mu gitanda kandi akagaragaza ubushake buke kubijyanye niyi ngingo birababaza
yagize ati tugomba kwiyizera mu mukino wo kwishyura imbere y'abafana bacu
nahise mbwira pamela gusohora radiyo kuko ari we bari bari kumwe
kuva mu cyiciro cya mbere ku isonga biraha amahirwe kiyovu yo kukigumamo
avugira ahougasanga abamwisanzuraho bamusaba kujya yitonda akumva mbere yo gusubiza
maleziya na lesoto bagize umukaridinali bwa mbere mu mateka ku buyobozi bwa papa faransisi
bashyira mu gaciro ariko hari abarwanashyaka b'intagondwa ku nshuro ya mbere babonetsemo
harimo ingabire mushayidi n'abandi bantu dukunda kandi dufata nk'intwari z'igihugu
byabaye nyuma y'amakosa ya ba myugariro ba kiyovu batavuganye neza n'umunyezamu
yatekerejwe kandi yubakwa n'impuguke izwi ku izina rya ma
bakaba bagarukanye impinduka by'umwihariko muri izi mpera z'umwaka ndetse banabahishiye udushya twinshi
na yo intare ikayirya bugabo ni ko yibwiye mu mutima yigaya
ariko ngo gutera abarwayi ba ubumara bishobora kubagiraho izindi ngaruka mbi
ni akahe karemajambo ka buri zina muri aya kerekana nteko yaryo
iyi gereza isanzwe ifungirwamo abatavuga rumwe na leta bo mu bwoko bw'aba oromo baba bafatiwe mu myigaragambyo
kandi akagira umutuzo kuko ubusanzwe agaragara nk'uwahungabanye kubera ibibazo yahuye na byo
ikindi kandi ngo ashobora guhamwa n'icyaha cyo kwitwaza amafaranga arenze umubare yemerewe kwitwaza
jyewe nibwo mbyumvise kuko nabiherukaga igihe inteko ishinga amategeko yabitoraga ariko bitaremezwa
bamporiki yanditse kuri twita agira ati ibi ntabwo bisaba kwifashisha itegeko
bireba abari batunze inka nyinshi kandi bakomeye ku butegetsi banafite igihagararo cya gitegetsi
hari iteka rya perezida ryemeza burundu ibyemezo ndakuka by'inama nkuru y umuryango
ibaruwa yandikiwe uyunce nayo ngo ntiyafatwa nk'ikimenyetso gifatika cyatuma ashinjwa guteza im
inama iranoga inzoga zirengwa abagabo b'intwali bashyira nzira batura nyankwarara mu muranzi
hazajye habaho ibyemezo biriho amazina y'umugore n'umugabo mu kwandikisha isambu
muri iki kiganiro nta hantu na hamwe humvikana umubwira ko yabyanze nkana
amarira yari ya yandi mvuga nti mana rwose wamfashije ukamvana muri iyi nzu
mu bushinwa amasoko acururizwamo inyamaswa zikiri nzima n'acuruzwamo inyama aramenyerewe
yashimiye cyane intwari zaranzwe n'ubwitange zikarwana inkundura zigatanga ubuzima bwazo kubera gukunda igihugu
nyakwigendera bandushubwenge yashyinguwe iwe muri komine ya nyabihanga mu ntara ya mwaro
iyi ndirimbo yayikoze afatanyije na piyano wamusanze i burundi ari naho yari amaze iminsi aba
kugira ngo ave muri iki kivunge cy'abantu yezu yagiye mu bwato bwa petero
ntabwo guma guma ari kamara kuri jye nyigiyemo byaba ari byiza ariko ntanayigiyemo ntacyo byantwara
uzirengera iyimuka ryawe nutabona ubufasha wakenera muri ako gace
ingingo ya gatanu ivuga ku kwamburwa viza n'uruhushya rwo gutwara ikinyabiziga
ejo prezida museveni yavuze ko uwo mwanzuro wafashwe kubera impamvu z'umutekano
amatara maremare y'ibara ryera cyangwa ry'umuhondo agomba kwatswa nijoro igihe hariho igihu
inshuro nyinshi abantu bakunda ibintu bya huti huti iyo bagiye gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina
hazaba kandi hari ibyo kunywa no kurya kuri buri wese uzabyifuza
butera agaragara muri aya mashusho nk'umuntu mushya mu myambaro igezweho n'imbyino atamenyereweho
ati aha niho byaturutse twiyemeza guhindura izina kugira ngo buri wese ayibonemo
filime yafashwe yerekana abaturage biganjemo abana babuze umwuka bacira ifuro
abagenzi bishyiraga mu matsinda manini ngo bafatanye urugendo kubera umutekano
umwe mu bapasiteri utifuje gutangaza umwirondoro we avuga ko kunywa inzoga ari icyaha
nta kindi yansubije yakoze mu mufuka akuramo ikinini kimwe kitwaga nigaramu ahari niba nibuka neza maze arakimpereza
kuko ushobora guhitamo neza ubuzima bwawe bukaba bwiza kandi bigafasha n'abandi
impamvu nta yindi ni uko banki iyo zituzigamiye zitwungukira make cyane kandi zo zatuguriza tukazungukira menshi cyane
kuko nabibwiwe n'ijambo ry'uwiteka ngo noye kurira aho hantu cyangwa kuhanywera amazi
kagame wacu ni intore izirusha intambwe utamushima ni uko ari indashima
gusabana n'abantu biramugora kuko adakunda kuvuga kandi akikubira utuntu twose akanagirira ishyari abavandimwe be
ubwo yari mu mujyi wa vuladi mu burasirazuba bw'uburusiya bwana putini hari icyo yavuze
izi zose zikaba zizaba ziri kuri alubumu ye nshya yise rap nyayo
ati abashinzwe umutekano b'inshuti zanjye baramburiye menya ko hari umugambi wo kunkuraho no kumfunga
bongeye kumwandikaho inkuru yamwongereye uburakari maze avuga ko agiye kongera guhangana nabo
urugero muzarebe iyo kiyovu yakinnye uburyo abakunzi bayo baba bayogeza
ati''niyo mpamvu nsaba abafite ibitekerezo byubaka n'abakeneye impinduka kunshyigikira
nsengimana utari wasiganwe kubera uburwayi noneho yari yagarutse mu isiganwa
kazitunga ntashobora kwibuka igihe yahuriye n'ababyeyi ba mariya ubwa mbere
agira inama n'abandi yo gutanga imbabazi kandi bagakora ku bagifite imbaraga kugira ngo badaheranwa n'agahinda
abandi ni abishora mu mwuga w'uburaya kubera ingeso cyangwa kubura uburere no kubura ababitaho nk'imfubyi
kayumba yavuze ko kuba abanyamakuru bakennye biterwa n'uko ubukungu bwifashe
ndasaba buruse ngo nige icyiciro cya kabiri cya kaminuza kugira ngo nkore ibyo bwana nwege yari yiteguye
muri uyu mwiherero abenshi mu bakozi bari bashishikariye kumenya iby'iki kiruhuko
kanimba asanga abikorera bafite uruhare runini mu kwihaza mu biribwa kw'abatuye afurika
kuri ibyo ngo hiyongeraho abahabwa ibikoresho bakabyica kandi byari bikiri mu gihe byateganyirijwe kumara
yaje kumbwira ikintu nari nkeneye kumenya igihe yari mu gikoni ategura icyo kurya
ntukumve ko niba washoboye kuganiriza umukobwa ugiye guhita umwegukana
minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga wa sudani y'epfo na we yemeje ayo makuru
biratangaje kubona imyaka itwigisha kwihangana nk'uko ubushobozi bwacu bwo gutegereza bungana
gusa umuryango w'abibumbye uvuga ko uhangayikishijwe n'ikibazo cy'abasambanya abana n'abagore ku ngufu
aha kandi haniyongeraho ibibazo birimo ruswa n'ikimenyane bituma hari abaguririra inkiko bagatsinda imanza
uyu mwaka farije yishyuriye abarokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi batishoboye ubwishingizi mu kwivuza
ejo hazaza h'u rwanda hari mu ntoki z'urubyiruko kandi ntabwo rukwiye kwitinya
habonetse impapuro zerekana ko hari gahunda zakozwe kandi zitarashyizwe mu bikorwa muri icyo kigo
ati mwarimu yaturyamye hagati nyuma y'akanya gato atangira gukorakora mugenzi wanjye
biroroshye cyane wabikoresha telefone yawe iyo ari yo yose
ati mfite intego yo gukomeza guhanga udushya mu byo nkora
sitade nto y'i remera yari itatse muri ayo mabara
ubwo abari baje kuramya babonaga barimo babaturwa mu cyaha no mu buhakanyi indirimbo za dawidi n'iza asafu zaririmbanwe ibyishimo
zimwe muri kiliziya n'insengero byagiye bigaragaza ko bitujuje ibyangombwa cyane cyane iby'isuku
hifashishijwe inyandiko amateka y'itorero ry'igihugu ubona ko kera abanyawanda bagiraga ibikoresho bya gakondo bifashishaga
yagize atiubuzima bwarahindutse ntawe ukimurikisha agatadowa imyotsi yako yaduteraga ibicurane n'izindi ndwara
abo twaganiriye bavuga ko badakeneye guhomba nk'uko bahombejwe n'ibigo by'imari iciriritse
kuri mukangemanyi hiyongeraho icyaha cyo kubiba amacakubiri muri rubanda
amakara yifashishwa n'ingo zitari nke mu rwanda mu guteka
mubonye isomwa ry'urubanza rurebana n'uruganda rwa nyakwigendera mwakumirwa pe
abajijwe kubirebana n'uyu mukobwa yaravuze ati ntabwo ndi buvuge izina rye
yahise azimya telefone ye ku buryo no kugeza ubwo twasozaga iyi nkuru yari atarasubira ku murongo
nk'amahoteli menshi arimo yubakwa ni abanyarwanda bayubaka kuko basobanukiwe ibijyanye no gushora imari mu bukerarugendo
mbona amaboko ye ayakubita nk uko umuntu woga abigenza kugira ngo yihute
umwe mu bamaze koroherwa mu barwayi bo mu mutwe yavuze ko yahimbye izina ry'igitabo yifuza gusohora kandi ko yarihimbye yihereyeho
diyane yagize ati mbabajwe n'urupfu rwa makumbi watabarutse muri iki gitondo
yapfiriye yezu i roma aciwe umutwe kandi mbere yo kwitwa pawulo yahoze yitwa sawuli
aho ngenda inkoni yanjye na yo imfasha kumenya ibiri mu nzira nyuramo
mu bandi bahataniraga iki gihembo cyegukanywe n'uyu mwongerezakazi harimo ibyamamare nka rihana
icyo ndi cyo cyose cyangwa se ibyiringiro byanjye byose mbikesha umumarayika wanjye undinda
kugirango babone igiciro giciriritse ndetse banabone n'umurongo wayo k'uburyo bwisumbuyeho
yaje hano iri joro mu bantu benshi ngo ashaka kwerekana ko atanga abanyagatolika
yatwigishije agira ati utubabarire ibicumuro byacu nk'uko natwe tubabarira abaducumuyeho
umuhanda unyura mu ishyamba rya nyungwe ukunda kugaragaramo impanuka cyane cyane iz'imodoka nini
agakomeza avuga ko ubwo yari atashye avuye kubwiriza yasanze wa mugabo umugore we yitaga nyirarume yinjiye rugo rwe
birazwi neza ko kambanda yagiranye amasezerano n'ubushinjacyaha kugirango abufashe nabwo buzamufashe
ibyiciro by'ubudehe bishya nibitangira gukoreshwa abanyamuryango ba mituweri bazamenyeshwa impinduka zizaba zabayemo
nta gitutu mfite kuko nzakora ibyo nshoboye ibindi nkabiharira imana
nimbivuga gutya abizera ko imana ivuga koko nibo bazabyumva
gusa utabyumva nkanjye ambabarire anyubahire igitekerezo maze nawe ashyire icye ahagaragara
mushake ukuntu mwajya munywa amazi menshi kuko mufite ikibazo cyo kuribwa mu mpyiko muri iyi minsi
igihe cyose utangiye gutekereza k'uwahoze ari umukunzi wawe jya ushaka ikintu kibikwibagiza nko kumva indirimbo
turebye ukuntu barasaga bagambiriye kurasa banki nkuru dutekereza ko ari abajura bashakaga kwiba
turasaba abashinzwe kwegereza abaturage imbuto y'inyongeramusaruro kubikora bakurikije amabwiriza ya minisitiri w'ubuhinzi
avuga ko adakwiriye kugezwa imbere y'urukiko wenyine kandi akurikiranyweho ibyaha afatanyije n'abandi benshi
ubushize nshutinamagara kodo yavuze ko uri umwe muri ba myugariro abonamo ubuhanga
ishuri rya adiriyani niyonshuti yahisemo kurishinga aho avuka i rwamagana
icyo gihe namubabwiye nti ni uhoraho imana yanyu wabeguriye iki gihugu
iyo isari yasumbye isesemi umugabo asubira kucyo yangaga
mwarimu akamwoherereza ibintu byiza yibuka kandi se na nyina nabo bakabyakira
byatwaye umunsi umwe gusa kugirango yohani agire inshuti z'abanyeshuri bigana
umwami salomo yanitaye ku kugira imico myiza kandi itunganye
umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye muri kameruni yaririmbanye imbaraga nyinshi
mu turere twose habaye ibiganiro kuri gahunda ya ndi umunyarwanda kandi mu baturage biracyakomeje
uwiteka yatoranije umuryango wa lewi mu mwanya w'imfura zose za isiraheli
nuko binjira muri uwo mugi rwihishwa maze bakora ibyo bari batumweyo

uyu mugore utagaragaye mu rukiko yaburanye ahakana ibyo ashinjwa anemeza ko habayemo kubogama

aba afite imbaraga zituruka mu mitekerereze zimufasha kwiga no gukina
abaganga b'inzobere bamuvuye batubwiye ko atazongera kubona

abana b'imfura bakomezaga kuba ab'uwiteka maze bakabasha gucungurwa

abo muri uwo mugi bari bagisinziriye umukiza abyuka mu rukerera ajya ahiherereye arasenga

bemeranyijwe kongera guhurira mu bufaransa ubwo nyampinga elisa azaba yagiyeyo
bidutera imbaraga zo kugendera ku mahame yayo no gusohoza neza inshingano ari byo bizana impinduka
bifite akamaro kuba u rwanda ruri mu muryango w'afurika y'uburasirazuba
bigaragara ko hari umuntu wagize atya agatanga amakuru adafite ishingiro
bigatuma umuntu adashimira imana ibyo yamuhaye bifite agaciro gahoraho
bigenda binaniza impyiko umunsi ku munsi ari nako zitakaza ubushobozi
bimaze kuboneka ko amahanga yamaze kwumva no kwemera iriya guverinoma
bimwe byatangiye gusesengura ngo birebe uko abafaransa bamwiyumvamo
birizewe ko ishobora gutuma haboneka inkunga itubutse yo gufasha abana bababaye
bisanzwe bimenyerewe ko hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kugirira umuntu nabi
bishingiye ku byishimo by'abantu ibyo kurya ibyo kunywa n'ibindi
bishobora kongera kuboneka mu gusoza igihembwe cy'imvura kubera imihandagurikire y'ikirere
bitabaye ibyo amahirwe yo kuzaba umukinnyi ukiri muto witwaye neza yazamucika
biterwa n'uko abakobwa ubwabo batazi kwihishira n'iyo babigerageje umubiri wabo urabatamaza
bitwaga abanukamishyo kuko bazanye n'umutware wabo witwaga runukamishyo
biza gutuma shejusa ajya mu bwongereza agumayo atinya ko aramutse agarutse mu gihugu yakwicwa cyangwa agafungwa
bo barapyinagajwe uvuze ngo aba afite ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside cyangwa agashinjwa ko yayikoze
bombi ni abakinnyi beza cyane kandi bakiri bato bo mu mutima w'ubwugarizi mu rwanda
bwari bwo bwa mbere mbyumva ariko si jye warose ngera mu rugo
by umwihariko bibuka abari abayoboke babo abiciwe mu nsengero n'ahandi hatandukanye kandi imvugo yabo ni ntibizongera ukundi
byabagezeho bitewe no kutirinda mu mirire no mu minywere
byabaye ngombwa ko niga vuba kugira ngo ndebe kure nanasobanukirwe ko ntabasha kugenzura ikirere
byaduteye amatsiko yo kumenya niba iyi mvura ifite icyo ivuze mu myemerere ya kiliziya gatolika
byanyorohera kugira icyo mbivugaho kuko ndacyari umusore
byatangiye kugaragara ko ibihugu bitandukanye bifite imibare y'ubukene yiyongera umunsi ku wundi
byose ntibyakozwe ni nayo mpamvu bitashimishije bamwe mu bitabiriye iki gitaramo
duhura n'ibibazo tukibwira ko twabivamo ariko twegereye za banki cyangwa abayobozi bazo
gahunda yo gutuza abaturage mu midugudu ni igikorwa gikomeza
gucengera kw'imizi y'igihumyo biba bigoye cyane
gufunga imishumi y'inkweto ni imvugo izimije yakoresheje ashaka kuvuga guhatana
gukoresha abagenzuzi b'imari mu turere aho gukoresha abakozi b'inzego zirebwa n'iyi gahunda binyuranyije n'itegeko
gutanga izo nkunga ntibizongera kubaho ndetse n'amafaranga yari agitangwa azakoreshwa mu bindi
habayeho impinduka ku bigaragambyaga kuko byahise byakirwa bwangu kandi neza
hakenewe impinduka mu bucuruzi n'ibikorwa by'ubukungu hagati y'imigabane yombi
hamaze kubaho ubwumvikane hagati ya komite n'ufitanye ikibazo na leta
hanafashwe abajura benshi barimo abakora abantu mu mifuka n'abatobora amazu
harandiye cyane nibuka ko data atajya abura imiti mucyumba cye
hari abandi bamushidikanyagaho bibaza niba abanyamerika bayoborwa n'ibyamamare kuri televiziyo inshuro ebyiri zikurikirana
hari abantu basobanura iyo mirongo n'imigenzo ya muhamadi mu buryo butandukanye
hari abantu benshi barokowe nk'uko itangazamakuru ry'aho ryabivuze
hari abatari babagirira icyizere ngo bumve ko iyi mirimo bayikora neza
hari aho abahamagara abagenzi baba batanambaye imyambaro y'ibigo bitwara abagenzi bakorera
hari aho byageze biba ngombwa ko yirwanaho ni uko afata myugariro
hari byinshi bikindemereye mu mutwe nshaka ko mumfasha kubibonera igisubizo
hari imifuka ine y'isukari abaturage bari batwaye yari itarakoreshwa
hari n'urutonde izi nyeshyamba zifite rw'abagomba kwicwa barimo na kayihura
hari ubwo bimbana byinshi ngaha akazi abamfasha nkabahemba nanjye nkagira icyo ninjiza
hari ubwo nigeze mbasaba kugira icyo mumpa ngo mukore mu mutungo wanyu mumfashe
hari urugomero rwa nyabarongo urwa rusizi n'izindi ngomero nto hirya no hino mu turere
hasi murahasanga ibiganiro mihigo yagiranye na niyomugabo mu myaka yashize
hasigaye iminsi mike icyiciro cya mbere cyo kuvoma gazi mu kivu kigatanga umusaruro
hasigaye umukino umwe n'ibirarane kugira ngo shampiyona y'uwo mupira w'intoki irangire
hategerejwe umukino wo kwishyura uzabera mu mujyi wa kigali mu byumweru bibiri biri imbere
havuzwe abagore bagabiye imodoka n'indi mitungo ba pasiteri mu nsengero
hazatoranywa imishinga ine ya mbere buri wose uhembwe miliyoni ebyiri
hejuru ya byose urupfu rwa yezu rwabereyeho gutuma umunezero n'ijuru biba ibyacu
hiyongereyeho abahungu bajya kwiga ipantalo bazifashe mu ntoki cyangwa baraziciye bikabije
i galilaya yezu arababwira ati umwana w'umuntu agiye kuzagambanirwa afatwe n'abantu
i yeruzalemu bibwiraga ko ubwami bw imana bwari bugiye kwigaragaza mu bantu
ibibazo by'iyo kipe nagiye mbyumva n'ubwo ntarabona uko mbiganiraho n'abo bireba
ibintu nibikomeza kumera gutya nibwo abayisilamu bazashobora kurwanya ubupfura buke n'ubuhezanguni bituma bahutaza abantu
ibipimo bisanzwe by'ubushyuhe muri iyi nyanja byiyongereyeho dogere selesiyusi ebyiri
ibyo bituma bumva bakomeye kandi koko baba bakomeye
icyo adusaba ni ukwegera umusaraba tukiyandikisha kuko mu bo yapfiriye turimo
icyo gihe cyose cyo kugeragezwa no gushinyagurirwa kirisitu yakomeje kugaragaza kwihangana no kwiyubahisha
icyo gihugu ubukungu bwacyo bugenda buzahara kubera indwara ya ebola
icyo utambaza ni ukumenya niba wakavomesha ukayageza mu rugo
igamije kureba ko ihame ry'uburinganire n ubwuzuzanye ryubahirizwa neza ku buryo bwose
igihe cyose mwinjiye muri iyi nzu mujye mwumva ko muri iwanyu
igihe utaragera kuri wa murongo ndakwihorera ariko n'uwugeraho ntabwo uzamenya icyagukubise
igihe zakayo yumviraga ijwi ry'umwuka muziranenge yahise aca ukubiri n'ibikorwa bihabanye n'ubunyangamugayo
igira ikipe muri aya marushanwa kandi itagira amashuli abanza
igisigaye ni uko byemezwa n'inama y'abaminisitiri iteganyijwe muri iki cyumweru
igitangaje ni uko hahezwa abagore n'amatungo yo mu rugo uretse injangwe zibikesha kuba zirya imbeba
igitaramo cye kiri burangwe n'urwenya rwinshi abantu batari bamuziho
ijwi ry'umushukanyi ryumvikanye rivuga riti ndaguha ubutware bwose n'ikuzo ryabwo
ijwi ry'uyu mukobwa ukiri muto ryumvikana risebya umugabo ufungiye mucyumba cyijimye
iki gitaramo ntikitabiriwe cyane gusa abakijemo batashye bishimye kuko abari bagitumiwemo bose bari bakitabiriye
iki kinyamakuru cyamaze gutangaza ko gifite amakuru yizewe avuga ko mugeni yabyaye impanga
ikiguzi fatizo cyabyo cyagenwe mu buryo bushyize mu gaciro
ikintu cya mbere na mbere ni uko nivuza cyane cyane ko atari ubwa mbere mvuye mu mva
ikivugwa ko cyateye iyi mpanuka ni umuvuduko mwinshi uyu mushoferi yari afite
ikizagira icyo kimara gisumba ibindi ni ubuhamya bugaragazwa n'imibereho yacu bwite
ikomeje kugaragaza intege nke mu ruhando rw'umuziki ndetse benshi bemeza ko isigaye ku izina gusa
ikoreshwa mu kumenya niba ahagiye kubakwa hashobora kuzibasirwa n'umwuzure
ikura vuba kandi ubutegetsi bw'u rwanda bukibwira ko buzayirengagiza bikarangirira aho
imbere ya kirisitu yamenye ko umutima we wanduye n'imibereho ye idatunganye
imfungwa za politiki zifatwa mu buryo butandukanye n'ubw'izindi zifatwamo
imimerere ya buri muntu igiye itandukana n'iy'uwundi
imirire nk'iyo iremerera impyiko maze urwo ruvange rw'amazi menshi rugaca intege igifu
imisozi ugomba kuzamuka ntikurambira ikibazo ni amabuye yinjira mu nkweto zawe
imyitwarire ye irimo igitsure kandi ihuje n'ubushake bw'imana yateye ubwoba abo bacuruzi b'abariganya
imyobo iyi nzoka yabagamo iracyagaragara mu itongo rya nyagakecuru
inama y'abaminisitiri itaha izasuzuma amategeko azagenga izi nzego nshya zashyizweho
indyo yuzuye iri mu byo umuntu wamaze guhagarika kwikinisha agomba kwibandaho
ingabo z'abafaransa zishinjwa kureka interahamwe zikinjira ahari hahungiye abatutsi zikabica
inkiko zigerageza kurengera abagore bashatse bitemewe n'amategeko muri bimwe na bimwe
inkuru nziza ku bakiliya b'iyi resitora ni uko bongeye gufungura imiryango
inkweto zivugwaho ko zikunze kunuka ni izo gukorana imyitozo ngororamubiri
intumwa zaturutse muri tanzaniya zagaragaje ko polisi yaho yatangiye kujya iherekeza amakamyo agenda nijoro
inzego z'ubuzima zizakomeza kwita ku buzima bw'abanduye iyi ndwara mu bihugu bikennye
iracyahanganye n'ikibazo cy'abantu bayikunda kurenza urugero ku buryo bishobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bwabo
iteka mpora ndi nka mukuru we n'ubwo duhangana buri wese aba ameze nk'uhangana n'umuvandimwe we
iyi alubumu yabo bahisemo kuyimaraho igihe kirekire ngo bayitunganye
iyi sosiyete ikora ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga ihakana byimazeyo ibyaha umuyobozi wayo ashinjwa
iyo bitagenze uko wabikekaga ntawe wishyuza cyangwa utakana
iyo imvura iguye hari inzugi zidakinze neza amazi ntagera mu mpombo
iyo modoka yibwe igihe yicwaga akubiswe ikintu mu mutwe
iyo ndyamye singoheka mba numva mwene mama atengurwa azira inzara kandi twari dufite isambu ababyeyi badusigiye
iyo ngingo ivuga kandi ko ubwo burenganzira butagomba kubangamirwa
iyo umuntu abitsa akanabikuza ni bwo ashobora kubona inguzanyo imufasha kwiteza imbere
iyo umuntu ashatse kubagirira nabi umuriro ubava mu kanwa ukotsa abanzi babo
izo nyo ntizapfaga zitarangije kurya inyama zose ngo hasigare amagufa
jya unyuzamo umuzanire icyo kunywa cyangwa icyo kurya cyoroheje
kandi ngo yaryaga indyo isanzwe kimwe n'abandi banya megizike bose
bavuga ko kera kiyovu yabaga ityaye none umutoza ageze aho akinisha abana bato
kiliziya twayireberaga kure tukumva ko ari iy'abapadiri
ku babikoze ni ibintu byiza cyane mu gihe cyo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina wumva ari byiza cyane
ku mutima naribwiraga nti basi nibananyica mfe maze kumubwira ko mukunda
ku ndiza ahahoze hitwa ubunyatwa ni mu karere ko hagati ya muhanga na shori
ku ngoma ya salomo ifeza zatekerezwaga nk'aho ari ubusa
ku nshuro ya mbere bizihije umunsi mpuzamahanga wabagenewe
kubaho ubuzima burimo umurengwe bibazanira ingaruka ku mubiri no mu bitekerezo
kuborohereza gucengera mu bayobozi no mu bikomangoma byatumye tumenya aho bafite intege nke
kugira ngo abantu babyumve nimubivuge bigere ku mpera z'isi
kuri yutube asobanurira abakunzi be imvo n'imvano y'iyi ndirimbo
kuva ku ipeti rya burigadiye jenerali kugeza ku ipeti rya jenerali majoro bisaba imyaka itatu
kuva mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa mbere ntabwo yagiye ku kazi
kuva ubwo uvugije induru bigashyira kera bati nimwumve induru yabaye impomamunwa
kuzirikana ibikorwa by'indashyikirwa hifashishwa ikoranabuhanga ndetse no guhindura imibereho n'ubukungu
kuzisubukura birerekana intambwe yatewe mu gutsura umubano hagati y'ibihugu byombi
kwibuka abapfuye binyibutsa ko nanjye umunsi umwe nzava kuri iyi si
kwirirwa utanga amafaranga birahenze kurusha kuba ufite ikarita y'ukwezi
kwita ku mugore utwite bituma umwana na nyina bamererwa neza
mba nirinda kuvugwaho ibinyoma byakangiza isura yanjye
mba nitegereza uko avuruganya yahumuza akampa inshyushyu mu cyansi
mbere imwe yategerezaga ko indi yambuka bigatinza urujya n'uruza
mu mwuka umwe twese ari mo twabatirijwe tuba umubiri umwe
mu rwampara hari umugabo witwa karungu ni uko bamubwira ko muka rugarukiramfizi ashaka umushumba umuragirira inka
mu rwanda nta rubuga mpuzamahanga ruhari ibi bigo biciriritse mu ikoranabuhanga bihuriramo
mu bigaragara umugabo nyamugabo ashishikazwa no kugera ku byo yifuje kuva kera agakora uko ashoboye ngo abigereho
mu kigo nigaho nta muntu uhejwe mu isomero ariko abanyeshuri ntibarijyamo
mu kumusenya aba yikijije undi muntu washoboraga kuba ikirangirire cyangwa kototera ingoma
mu minsi ishize havugwaga ko yuliyana akundana n'umuteramakofe witwa evora
mu myaka itanu iri imbere byose bazaba baratangiye kubikorera mu rwanda
mu myigaragambyo iherutse amaduka menshi n'ibikorwa bitandukanye byarakomeje birakora nk'uko bisanzwe
ubwo mperuka isomwa ry'urubanza rw'uyu nyakwigendera narumiwe pe
muri bibiliya haravuga ngo mwirinde inzika kandi bitume urukundo mukundana rwiyongera
muri aba bana harimo abamaze kwigurira amatungo nk'inkwavu
muri iyi minsi yari imaze gutangira ingendo mu buhinde no muri zimbabwe
muri uyu mwaka nta dini ryo hanze ryinjiye mu rwanda
na bo ubwabo bari bafite icyaha cyo kwigwizaho ubukire mu buryo bw'uburiganya bitwikiriye umuhamagaro wabo mutagatifu
na nyuma ntiyigeze ahinduka yamfataga nabi akumva ko kungaburira ari byo ahari bimugira umugore
na nyuma yaho bizakomeza ariko noneho bikorwe kinyamwuga no ku rwego mpuzamahanga
na nyuma yo kubyara nagombaga guca inshuro ngo ndebe ko twaramuka
na we asabwa ko umusoro yakiriye awushyikiriza ubuyobozi bw'imisoro nk'uko itegeko ribiteganya
nabeshye ko bangonze ariko nkabona data ntabwo arimo abyumva neza
nabo batoye ko bigaragambya bagasaba kongererwa imishahara
nabo bakekwaho kwinjiza impunzi mu nyeshyamba bazikuye mu nkambi zo muri uganda
nagize gutya mpura n'umugabo washakaga umuntu wo kumwogereza imodoka
nahamagawe kuri polisi ngo ngire makuru mbaha ku byo namenya
nahise mbyutsa abaturanyi dutangira gushaka amazi n'ibitaka kugira ngo tuzimye uwo muriro
nahise nandika nsaba kwinjiramo ntanga n'ibindi byangombwa byose byari bikenewe
naje hano mpasanga abasirikare bahita bakibaga bampa n'imiti none ndumva meze neza
nakiriwe neza numva birantunguye bituma nsubirayo njya kuzana umugabo wanjye nari nasizeyo
nakoze mu nganzo mbabyinira kinyarwanda bararyoherwa umuco wacu barushaho kuwukunda no kuwubaha
namenye ko umugore umwe muri abo bane ari umupfakazi
narebye mu isakoshi nsangamo amafaranga na telefone ibindi mpita mbijuganya ahantu hameze nk'aho bamena imyanda
nari nkwiye kugira icyo mvuga ariko ndakibura
nashatse abantu banshyirira amabuye ku gikoni kuko igisenge cyari cyagurutse cyagiye
nashimye cyane ubutumwa bwose bugaragaza ko byakiriwe neza n'ibindi bizaza vuba
nasubije ko nahera kuri uwo muvandimwe ariko sinari nzi n'uko namubona
natwe ubwacu tugomba kugira uruhare mu kubungabunga ubusabane bwacu n'imana
navuga ko ari abatoza nka nshimiyimana na mbungo bamfashije bakanzamurira urwego
navuga ko byanteye imbaraga sincike intege kandi ngakora cyane kugira ngo nzagere kure
nazanye igitekerezo kubera amasomo batwigishije ubwo duheruka ku rwibutso
ndababwira ukuri ko mutaje kunshaka kubera ko mwabonye ibimenyetso ahubwo ni uko mwariye mugahaga
ndamutse menye ko umuhungu wanjye ari umutinganyi nashaka icyuma nkamujombagura kugeza apfuye
ndasenga kandi nizera ko imana ariyo inshoboza byose ari yo indwanirira
ndashaka gukomeza amashuri kuko ntekereza ko bizamfasha gukura mu mwuga wanjye no kugera ku byifuzo byanjye
ndi mu myiteguro ngiye kurushaho kwitoza kandi nizeye ko imana izamfasha nkanatsinda
ndifuza gukora cyane maze abanyumva ntibambure cyangwa ngo bankumbure
ndifuza kuba ukwanjye na we akaba ukwe twese tukabaho mu byishimo ntawe ubangamiye ubuzima bw'undi
ndishimye kandi nirerera abana banjye sinkitaye kuri biriya
ngo amaze gukuramo inda eshatu za niyonsenga basezeranye byemewe n'amategeko
ngo abagabo muri izo nzego zifata ibyemezo bagira akamaro kanini kurusha abagore
ngo agiye gutangira gukura imyanda mu ngo z'abaturage
ngo azasaba abayobozi n'abapasiteri kwigisha abaturage guhindura imyumvire
ngo barashaka ko abana bakunda umupira barebeye ku bakinnyi bawugiriyemo ibihe byiza
ngo bishobora kongerera umuntu ibyago byo kurwara kanseri yo mu ibere
ngo byaje kubura biba ngombwa ko bajya mu rwanda kwiba ibyo kurya bafatanyije n'imbonerakure
ngo ibitsina byabo barabyishimiraga bigatuma abandi bagira ipfunwe bakajya kuringaniza ibyabo
ngo imico yabo ibemerera kugira inshoreke hejuru y'abagore bemewe
ngo uko unywa nyinshi niko uba wongera ibyago byo kurwara zimwe muri izo kanseri
ni bamwe mu bahanzi bampemukiye ku munota wa nyuma ntibaboneke kandi bari bafite iyo gahunda
ni bashya muri kigali ndetse n'izina ryabo ntirizwi na benshi mu bakunda umuziki
ni bwo umuturage wari ugiye guhinga umuceri yasanze umurambo we mu gishanga
ni kenshi yumvaga bavuga ko iki gihugu gifite abakobwa beza ariko atarabibonera
ni nde uba wababwiye ngo muze kundibatira urugo
ni nko kwemeza ko icyo imana yaremye yasanze ari cyiza
ni ubwa mbere mbyaje umugore akabyara abana bane inshuro imwe
ni ugutegura imbangukiragutabara n'amarimbi ngo kuko abantu barimo banywa inzoga nk'abari mu marushanwa
ni ukwishyira hamwe birashoboka ko mubigiramo uruhare biciye mu makoperative murimo
ni umukinnyi umwanditsi n'umuhanga mu kuyobora filime kandi akaba n'impirimbanyi y'amahoro
ni umukobwa wafashije benshi mu bahanzi bakomeye bamaze iminsi baza kuririmbira mu rwanda
ni umuntu ushyira amazi abantu be kugira ngo bakomeza akazi kabo
ni umupira umwe gusa bashunga yafashe wari utewe na nshuti dominiko saviyo
ni umwe mu bahanzi bakunzwe mu bufaransa muri iyi minsi
ni umwe mu bakobwa bashyira imbaraga nyinshi mu iterambere ry'umuziki nyarwanda
ni umwe mu baza ku isonga bashinjwa urupfu rwa tomasi sankara
nibanze cyane ku gukomera no ku kwigirira icyizere
nibo batanze ubuhamya nka bamwe mubarokokeye muri iki kigo
nibuka ni uko nigeze kumara imyaka ibiri ndya ubugari saa sita na nimugoroba ku buryo nabuhuzwe
nibutse ko mfitanye gahunda nawe ariko numva namuhakanira kuko ntashakaga kongera
nifuzaga gusangira na kazitunga ejo kandi ambwiye ko azaba ari mu mujyi
nimuntege amatwi nifuje mu mutima kubaka inzu isanduku y isezerano rya yehova izaruhukiramo
nitubigira ibyacu nta kabuza indwara zo kugwingira zizacika
niwe watumye amatora ya mbere agirwa impfabusa kuko yaranzwemwo amakosa menshi n'ibindi bitatunganijwe neza
niyo iguye ndakomeza ngahendahenda mu minota mike igahaguruka ngakomeza ibyanjye
nk'uko akunda ijambo yego ni nako yanga gukorera kuri zeru
no kuba iyo kamyo itarahiriye hagati y'amazu ni amahirwe
nta mwete muke mujya mugira mu mikorere yanyu
ntagutinda fata utuntu twawe twingenzi tuve hano byihutirwa
ntakunze kwiyemeza ikintu na kimwe ku buryo azwiho ako kantu
ntangira kwibaza nti ese ubundi kera u rwanda ntabwo rwanganaga gutya
ntibazi ko nta rwibutso na rumwe rutarimo amagufwa y'abatutsi n'ay'abahutu
ntibiramenyekana niba ibibazo by'amikoro byarabonewe umuti ku buryo bahembera igihe bakanagura abakinnyi bakomeye
ntibyanshobokeye kuko mudasobwa yanjye yari yazimye maze ngezweho baransimbuka birambabaza cyane
ntushobora kumenya igihe bizarangirira bityo nanze gutuma ugira umunsi mubi
nubwo naba nari umubaji cyangwa umudozi w'inkweto sinabihagarika ngo ni uko mbaye umuhanzi
numva ko umugore natekerezaga ko ari umuforomo ahubwo ari umuganga
numvaga mfite isoni zo kumureba mu maso bituma nkomeza kureba hasi
numvise ko sawuli yenda gutera i keyila no kuyirimbura abampora
nyuma naje kumenya ko nari mfite ibikomere ku mutima nari maranye igihe kirekire
nzagwiza urubyaro rw'umugaragu wanjye dawudi n'abalevi bankorera
nzapfa nishimye kubera ko hari icyo namariye abaturage banjye
nzi ko untega amatwi kandi udashaka guhungabanya amarangamutima yanjye
nzi neza ko ibyo tuzageraho byose muri iki cyumweru tuzaba tubikesha akazi gakomeye yakoze
nzi undi muntu byabayeho mu minsi mike ishize
n'abanyarwanda bari bafite ijambo bari abo muri ngoma na matyazo maze bakanyereka ko ntacyo nshoboye
n'umushoferi ugerageje guhagarika iyi systeme ihita imurega bityo bikagabanya impanuka
perezida w'inteko ishinga amategeko yatoboye inzu ye
referendumu ku itegeko nshinga ry'abanyarwanda ni igikorwa cyerekana demokarasi nyayo
rutahizamu rooney yinjiye mu kibuga asimbuye kandi ikipe igaragaza ko imukeneye
saa kumi z'ejo wabonaga hanze hari abantu batabarika
si ibanga nta n'ubwo biteye isoni kuburyo icyo gihe cyiza kigeze nabyihererana
si kenshi ibibazo bishingiye ku mwajwi bikomera
si ukubimenya gusa ahubwo byakagombye gutuma umuntu akura mu buryo bw'umwuka
sinari kumwibagirwa kuko yanshenguye umutima kabiri kandi sinshobora na rimwe kumubabarira
sinigeze mba intyoza haba mu rugo haba ku kazi
sinshaka kubura urumuri rwiza rwo mu gitondo
tuba twigize abanyantege nke nyamara twahawe ububasha butwemerera gutegeka ikintu cyose kikatwumvira
turasaba ko iryo tsinda rigenzura ryabyitondera kuko insengero zubahirije ibyo mwasabye ari nke cyane
tutarakora ubushakashatsi twumvaga nta muntu n'umwe wayihanganira ariko twabonye abayishyigikiye
tuzakomereza no mu zindi nkambi kandi nta mwanya tugomba gupfusha ubusa
twabashije gukusanya inkunga dufasha umuryango w'abana batandatu b'imfubyi bibana
twariye imbwa nyinshi zishyushye uyumunsi none sinshaka kuzongera kubona indi mbwa ishyushye igihe cyose nkiriho
twe miss rwanda ntitukiyibona nk'urwego runaka ahubwo tuyibona nk'akazi umuntu akora yanasinya imihigo
twe turavuga tuti nagende umuryango we ufite inshingano zo kumwitaho
u rwanda rwagombaga guhabwa inyandiko z'ibisaba kugira ngo rwitegure icyo rusubiza'
ubu abo bana bameze neza gusa baracyari mu bitaro kugira ngo bakomeze gukurikiranwa n'abaganga
ubu inda yose tuvuga ko ishobora kugira ibibazo cyane cyane nko mu gihe cyo kubyara
ubu muri ubwoko bw imana ariko mbere mwari abantu batari baragiriwe imbabazi
ubu ngo bagiye gupimwa ngo barebe niba nta bibazo by'ubuhumekero baba bafite
ubuhamya bwinshi bwerekana ko hari bimwe mu bikoresho byakoreshejwe jenoside byatanzwe n'u bufaransa
ubukonje bukabije bwo muri firigo nabwo bwica udukoko dutera umunuko mu nkweto
ubundi abagabo baba bashaka kureba imiterere yawe myiza wambaye ubusa
ubundi se abatambyi ntiboherezaga iteka abantu bo gutata ibikorwa bye byose
uburyo iyo referandumu yagenze byangije isura y'u rwanda ku rwego mpuzamahanga
ubushinjacyaha bwo bwakomeje gusaba ko igihano yari yakatiwe n'urukiko rukuru cyagumaho
ubwo yezu yari amaze kubambwa nibwo nikodemu yibutse inyigisho yumviye kuri uwo musozi
ubwo bageragezaga kuyihagarika babatera ibyuka biryana mu maso abigaragambyaga na bo babateye amabuye n'amacupa
ujya kumera nk'indirimbo kubera injyana izanwa n'imikarago ijya kureshya
uko amazi arushaho gukonja ni ko igifu kirushaho kumererwa nabi
uko asa bitandukanye n'uko yasaga umwaka washize igihe yamurikaga alubumu
uko binjiye baririmba ni nako basohotse
ukwizera ufite mu mutima wawe muri iryo sengesho uvugirwa niko gutuma ukira
umugabo ni we mutware w'umuryango kandi imibanire myiza mu rugo ishingira ku mana
umugabo wa nikuze bivugwa ko yishwe ari umurobyi ngo yaba aba mu bubiligi
umugabo we yifotozanya n'abandi bagore ntacyo bimubwiye
umugore witwa kiyange yemeye kwitanga nk'intwari ngo apfire nyiratunga
umuntu afata udufaranga twe amaze gukora firimi ntanabashe guhemba abo yakinishije
umuntu ananirwa kwituma kuko aba afite imyanda myinshi mu mubiri bigatera impyiko kudakora neza bityo zikarwara
umuntu nava mu kazi nk'aka azajya yongera ashake izindi nshuti nshya kuko izo yahoranye atazibaniye neza
umuntu yakibaza icyo bitwaye byabarumwanzi kuba bamporiki ari inkomamashyi cyane cyane ko badasangiye ishyaka
umunyamerika w'umuririmbyi akaba n'umwanditsi w'indirimbo yitabye imana kuri iyi tariki
umutambyi yakiraga amafaranga y'incungu iyo abana bazanwaga kumurikirwa uwiteka
umutoza w'umupira w'amaguru w'umwongereza yitabye imana
umuyobozi uhagarariye loni mu burundi yatangaje ko iyo myigaragambyo ishingiye ku mpamvu za politiki
umwe muri bo ubwo yari abambwe ku musaraba yakomeje kwiheba no kurebana
umwunganira we yavuze ko nta kuntu umukiriya we yari kugira imyitwarire mibi mu butumwa yari arimo
unkoresha ni we wanshoye kuko yandangiye igaraje njya kugishyirishamo anambwira ko yakishyuye
urubanza rwayo rwageze mu ijuru rwarazamutse rugera mu bicu byo mu kirere
uruhare rwa mesiya mu byerekeye gutanga igitambo cy'incungu ni ntagereranywa
usanga abapasiteri bamwe barabisimbuje kwigwizaho ubutunzi n'icyubahiro ndetse rimwe na rimwe bakanabirwaniramo
uwamukubise na we azicwe n'umwicanyi uhorera amaraso y uwishwe namubona azamwice
uwizera ashobora kunguka ibyiringiro by'agakiza ke kandi akamenya ko yakijijwe
uyu mugoroba ni bwo biteganyijwe ko umukobwa wa mbere asezererwa muri iri rushanwa
uyu muryango wabaga muri iyi nzu imeze itya mu mujyi wa kigali
uyu musore aherutse gushyira ahagaragara amashusho y'indirimbo ye yise biransetsa'
uyu mwaka imana yaduhaye abapadiri barindwi bashya bunganira abababanjirije nisingizwe iteka
uyu mwaka hamaze gupfa abasirikare barindwi mu bagiye mu butumwa bwo kwimakaza amahoro muri mali
uyu mwana akeneye gukura tumufashe ntakomeze kugwingira
uyu mwana niyumva hari irindi hohoterwa akorewe ageze ikibazo kuri polisi igikemure
we n'umukunzi we hitayezu basezeranye imbere y'imana bambikana impeta y'urudashira
we yasanze ku kibuga cy'indege abantu bake bari baje kumwakira
wenda azanemera asabe imbabazi abo arimbura igitondo n'ikigoroba hirya no hino mu bihugu baturanye
wibuke ko ntashobora kuba nyoko ariko nshobora kuzaba inshuti yawe magara
wowe n'ababyeyi bawe ni iki buri wese yamenyeye ku mahitamo mwakoze
yabifashe nk'ibisanzwe ndetse ngo yumvaga azahabwa imbabazi indirimbo ze nshya zigacurangwa nk'ibisanzwe

aba babyeyi bavuze ko abantu benshi badasobanukiwe n'ibigize indyo ikwiye
aba bacuruzi bavuga ko ubusanzwe bari bafite abakiliya ariko bagiye bakendera kubera ivumbi
aba baganga bazabikorera muri kaminuza yigisha iby'ubuvuzi
aba bagore bigaragambyaga bari bafite ibyapa byanditseho ngo  wakumva umeze ute bagukanze ubugabo
aba bahanzi barimo goreti bakoranye indirimbo sinkakubure
aba bahanzi bataramye imbonankubone bacurangirwa n'abanyamuziki babizobereyemo barimo mihigo ukomoka mu rwanda
aba bajura bazibaga ku minara ya tigo iba mu murenge wa kimisagara
aba bakangurambaga bagiye bari mu bimina byifashishwa mu korohereza abaturage gutanga aya mafaranga
aba bakinnyi biyongeraho mutuyimana witabye imana azize urupfu rutunguranye
aba bakobwa banyise umuhutu kuko mu kiganiro twari twagiranye nari nababwiye ko mpungutse mvuye muri zayire
aba bakozi basuye abagizwe incike na jenoside yakorewe abatutsi batuye mu mudugudu wa nyamivumu mu kagari ka mushirarungu
aba bakurikiye ubutumwa bwibanze ku kurwanya ihohoterwa rigira ingaruka ku muryango nyarwanda bwatambukijwe mu ikinamico
aba bane bafashwe aho bafungiye bemera uruhare rwabo mu rupfu rwa se bakanabisabira imbabazi
aba banyerondo barinda ibishingwe byavuye kuri iyo nyubako aho bimenwa mu karere ka gasabo
aba bavanywe mu cyobo giherereye mu kigo cya gisirikare cy'i kanombe
aba barwayi baravurwa baragaburirwa ndetse hari nabo tugurira ibyo bibinda buri munsi
aba barwaza ngo bakeka ko bazize imyanzuro yari yafatiwe abakozi b'ibitaro bakererwa
aba basore baba mu gihugu cya uganda bamaze imyaka irenga icumi barahahungiye
aba basore barwaniye muri aka kabari bakoresheje amacupa n'ibirahuri by'inzoga
aba basore batanu bafashwe n'imodoka ya gisivile yari iherekejwe n'iya polisi
aba basore bazwiho kugira ijwi ryiza cyane muri iyo njyana yabo
aba basore bishimirwaga cyane n'intiti zo muri kaminuza kubera uburyo bitwaraga ku rubyiniro
aba baturage bavuga ko aho iyi mihanda ica batagomba kuhishyuza kuko iyo imihanda izabafasha guhahirana
bahise babimenyesha sitation ya polisi ya kanyinya maze ifata iyo modoka n'umushoferi
aba baturage bishimira ko ku bufatanye n'abajyanama b'ubuzima imyumvire yahindutse
aba bayobozi bose bahungiye kuri sitasiyo ya polisi ya nalufenya iherereye mu karere ka jinja
aba bombi bamaze gusezerana mu murenge hakurikiyeho umuhango wo gusaba no gukwa
aba bombi bakoranye imyaka itanu ku buryo bizeranaga ukwezi kwashira uyu mushoferi ntahembwe akumva nta kibazo

aba bombi bazaririmbira ku nkombe z'inyanja y'abahinde
aba nabo ariko nta bukwe cyangwa indi mihango yo gusezerana bigeze bakora
aba ni karangwa na bamporiki umuyobozi wa komisiyo ishinzwe itorero ry'igihugu
aba ni abantu batandukanye baramukiye mu myigaragambyo kuri uyu wa kane
aba uko ari bane baraganiriye bahuza urugwiro birangira bakoze urubuga bahuriraho
ababajijwe muri ubu bushakashatsi babarizwa mu byiciro by'ubudehe bitandukanye
ababandwaga babikoraga nijoro rimwe na rimwe bambaye ubusa babyina indirimbo z'imandwa
ababikora bamenye ko batiza umurindi malariya  kandi ko babangamira gahunda ya leta yo kuyirwanya

abaganiriye na yo bayibwiye ko uyu muryango watsuye umubano n'indi miryango itandukanye
abageze aho karegeya yapfiriye bavuga ko abamwishe bamunigishije imigozi yo muri iyi hoteli

abagore barindwi bazarongorwa n'umugabo umwe bamubwire bati tuzigaburira tuniyambike

abahanga bavuga ko gukosa ari ibisanzwe ariko ko kongera gukora iryo kosa aribyo bibi

abajyanama ni mvano gafora mutangana na twagirayezu
abakandida bemerewe kwiyamamariza mu rwanda no mu ifasi ya z'amabasade z'u rwanda bamenyesheje ubuyobozi

abakiriya bagezwaho ibyo baguze aho baherereye haba mu rugo cyangwa ku kazi
abakobwa bo mu karere ka muhanga ngo bagiye gushyiraho umugoroba wabo bazajya baganiriramo iby'ubuzima bw'imyororokere

abamamaye mu rwanda ni cari na nina melodi n'abandi
abamarayika bita ku mwana w'imana wari arambaraye hasi nk'ugiye gupfa
abami bo ku isi bose bashakaga kureba salomo kugira ngo bumve ubwenge bw'imana

abana barambikaga ibiganza hasi babyubitse bakagenda baririmba babara ibiganza uwo barangirijeho akacyubura bakongera kugisorezaho akakivanamo
abana batangiye kumenya ubwenge hari ibintu bimwe na bimwe baba bakwiye kumenya

abana b'incuke bahabwa amasomo asanzwe bakagira n'umwanya wo gutozwa ijambo ry'imana
abandi bapfiriye mu mamodoka yabo mu mihanda no muri za parikingi byo munsi y'ubutaka
abandi barimo n'abanyamakuru basabye ko ibyo malema yavuze yabihanirwa bikabera n'abandi urugero
abandi bashinjwa icyo gitekerezo ni abasilikare bakuru bamaze iminsi bafungirwa icyo cyaha
abandi bati byaba byiza hatagize abongera kwimurwa baterekwa aho bajya gutura mu buryo bukozwe neza
abandi bavugaga ko hakwiye gushakwa ubundi buryo bwo gufasha abo bakinnyi bagakomeza gutera imbere

abantu bitabiriye urugendo rw'impinduka rwari ruyobowe na maritini
abantu ntibahuriza ku gihe byamara ngo wizere uwo muhuriye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga

abantu bane barimo umwongereza barafunzwe abandi barahanwa mbere yo gusubizwa mu bihugu byabo
abantu bari buzuye ku rusengero babuze aho binjirira abenshi bisubirira aho bari baturutse
abantu barishimiye bongeye kubababona hano mu bubiligi bakikijwe n'intore n'ababyinnyi batoza babereye u rwanda
abantu batandukanye bakomeye ku isi bandikiye ubutumwa bwo kwihanganisha umuryango w'uyu mugore
abantu batandukanye bamaganye iyicwa rye bagaragaye bafite ibyapa byamagana ubwicanyi'

abantu bavuka gutya bitirirwa ibimera n'inyamaswa byakuze muri ubu buryo
abantu benshi bazi ko nyirinkwaya ari umuganga w'abagore gusa
abantu bo mu bice byinshi by'ubwami bwa isirayeli babonaga uburebure bw'uwo musozi
abantu bo muri icyo gihugu bagize urugomo bakajya bambura bakanagirira nabi abakene n'indushyi
abantu mutajya inama ku bintu byubaka cyangwa ngo bagire ikindi bongera ku buzima bwawe nta mpamvu yo kubana nabo
abantu mwese muhawe ikaze kandi turabibutsa ko iki gitaramo gikomeza kugeza igihe abakitabiriye baza kunanirirwa
abanyacyangugu ntibaterwa ipfunwe no kwitwa abashi nabo ubwabo usanga babyiyita
abanyagasani banatora umunyagasani witanze kurusha abandi mu rwego rwo kurushaho gushyigikira abitanga
abanyamakuru bamubajije icyo ateganya gukora ku ibura ry'amazu y'abantu baciriritse cyane cyane mu mijyi
abanyamategeko bo muri nigeriya biyemeje gutanga umusanzu wabo ngo igihugu gitere imbere
abanyamideli batandukanye barimo n'abasanzwe bazwi mu rwanda bahaswe ibibazo n'itsinda ryaturutse muri kenya
abanyamideli bo mu mujyi wa kampala nabo bakereye kwitabira iki gitaramo
abanyamuryango ba koperative ibyiza biri imbere bavuga ko babuze isoko rihagije ry'imbabura bakora
abanyapalesitina bane barishwe mu myigaragambyo yabaye mu minsi ibiri ishize
abanyapolitiki b'u bufaransa bubaha ibikorwa bye mu gihe yamaze ku isi
abanyarwanda baba mu bubiligi bari mu bagiye kwakira perezida wa repubulika y'u rwanda
abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga tuzabagarura ku gicumbi cy'umuco muri rwanda deyi
abanyarwanda baratera bambukira ku cyambu cya nyamwiza batungukira mu gihugu cya bugabo
abanyarwanda barwana inkundura batwika urugerero rw'abanyabungo ariko isayo ntiyatuma bafata kanywilili
abanyarwanda basigaye basambanya inka bakarya imbwa kuva navuka ni ubwa mbere mbyumvise muri uru rwanda ni amahano
abanyarwanda bazajya bamara igihe gito ku mupaka cyangwa ku kibuga cy'indege igihe binjira mu rwanda
abanyarwanda bose bumve ko bafite inshingano zo gusindagiza abageze mu za bukuru
abanyarwanda muri gahunda yo kugira ubuzima buzira umuze bakangurirwa kurya indyo yuzuye
abanyeshuri bagaragarijwe ko ikigamijwe atari ibihembo kuko bose ntako batagize
abanyeshuri biga umuziki ku nyundo babanje kubasusurutsa mu ndirimbo zitandukanye zaririmbanwaga ubuhanga n'amajwi atunganye
abanyeshuri bize ku nyundo ku nshuro ya mbere bakoreye ibitaramo muri kanada
abanyeshuri bo mu gihugu cya koreya y'epfo bigabije imihanda bakora imyigaragambyo yo kwimakaza demokarasi
abanyeshuri n'abayobozi b'iyi kaminuza bazaganira na perezida kagame aho u rwanda rugeze mu kwihaza mu biribwa
abapolisi basanze bobo aryamye hasi afite umwobo w'amasasu mu gahanga hagati
abapolisi basatse iyo nzu kugira ngo bamenye neza ko izo inkweto zibwe zitarimo
abarangije icyiciro rusange batatsinze bazakomereza mu ishuri ryisumbuye ry'imyuga na ryo riri muri gereza
abaregwa bose uko ari batatu bahurira ku cyaha cyo kugambirira guteza imvururu
abari baturiye inkengero basabwe kwimuka ngo batazahitanwa n'indi myuzure mugihe yaramuka yongeye kubaho
abari batuye mu murenge wa muyira ahahoze ari muri santire ya gati na bo barishwe
abari hafi yayo bavuze ko abagwiriwe n'inkuta barimo abafundi n'abayede bayikoragaho
abari inshuti za gasakure bavuga ko yari umuganga mwiza akaba inzobere mu kuvura umutima akanigisha
abari mu isoko basanzwe bazi gasongo bati uyu mudozi w'inkweto yagize amahirwe
abari mu myigaragambyo baburijemo ibikorwa byinshi byari biteganyijwe n'akanama gashinzwe gutegura amatora
abari muri iyi ndege ngo nta kibazo bagize uretse umupilote wavuwe ibikomere byoroheje
abarimu bo muri kaminuza batangaga bagenzi babo b'abatutsi ngo bicwe
abaririmbyi babiri bateranye amacupa n'ibirahure mu kabari bapfa rihana
abaririmbyi bakunzwe mu gihugu barimo kabaganza n'abandi bahanzi naho abavugabutumwa bakomeye barimo pasiteri senga
abarokotse ntibaheranwe n'agahinda kuko imana ibazi haracyari ibyiringiro byo kubaho ejo hazaza
abarwanashyaka ba besijye babatesha umutwe bakirirwa babirukankana  bakabakomeretsa ndetse bakanamugazwa
abarwayi bajye bakoresha izo nzira zose zabashyiriweho mu gihe bahawe serivisi mbi
abasaza warabafungishije abandi ubaheza ishyanga usigarana insoresore zikishakisha zifitiye ubwoba ngo utazazirukana
abasenateri na komisiyo y'ubumwe n'ubwiyunge bishimiye intambwe imaze guterwa mu bumwe n'ubwiyunge muri rusange
abashakashatsi basanga kwigisha abaganga no gushora imari mu mavuriro ari intwaro yo kugabanya umubare w'abagore bapfa babyara
abashinzwe kurinda iri shyamba ryo muri sibuya basanze aba bahigi aho bapfiriye
abashinzwe kuvugama abasare n aberekeza bo mu nyanja bose bararohamye
abashinzwe umutekano bamaze kumuhagurutsa anashize igihunga yari afite yahise afata indangururamajwi aravuga
abashoramari mu by'ubwubatsi n'abanyabugeni bagaragaje ko banejejwe n'iki gikorwa kandi ko biteguye ku kibyaza umusaruro
abasiganwa basigaje kuzenguruka inshuro ebyiri kandi kugeza ubu bose bari kumwe mu kivunge
abasirikare babwo bashinjwa kwigisha interahamwe uburyo zifashishije mu kubika amakuru ajyanye na lisiti z'abatutsi bishwe
abasirikire b'inkotanyi bahise bahatera igisasu cyo mu bwoko bwa gerenade nticyagira uwo kica ariko gisakambura inzu yo kwa nduhungirehe
abasore batatu bakurikiranyweho kubaga imbwa bakazirya bakanazigaburira abaturage
abasore bayise batya bitewe n'uko usanga abakobwa benshi bayitwara baba ari beza
abatabazi basenye ubwo bwiherero bwari bwuzuyeho amaraso bakoresheje inyundo kugira ngo bakuremo iyo nzoka
abatabona bishyize hamwe barasaba abatanga serivisi z'ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga kubibuka
abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi hamwe n'amashyirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za politiki bifatanyije n'abandi muri iyo myigaragambyo
abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bamaganye bikomeye iyo referandumu igamije guhindura itegeko nshinga
abategereje kubonana na we usanga biremyemo udutsiko bibaza niba ari bubakemurire ibibazo
abategetsi banyuzwe n ibisubizo yabahaye maze bemera ko umurimo ukomeza nta nkomyi
abategetsi bavuga ko ntabimenyetso bigaragaza ko hari ibindi bintu byangiritse kuri urwo rugomero
abateguye imyigaragambyo bakomeje gusaba abarundi kurwanya manda ya gatatu ya perezida nkurunziza
abatinganyi bagerageza guharanira uburenganzira bwabo ariko bakazitirwa hanakoreshwa imbaraga za polisi
abatowe mu kagari ka gasharu ni babiri aribo uwamahoro na bamporiki
abatoza b'amakipe y'umupira w'amaguru mu cyiciro cyambere hano mu rwanda bagiye guhagarika imirimo yabo
abatsinze ijonjora rya mbere ryo mu rwanda bashyirwa ku rubuga rw'iri rushanwa
abaturage bagomba kumva ko bahagarariwe n'abategetsi mu cyubahiro no mu bwisanzure
abaturage barasabwa kugirira ibikoresho byo kumeza isuku no kugira imisirani isukuye kandi ipfundikirwa
abaturage ba libiya bumviye abanzi b'igihugu bemera gufatanya nabo kurwanya umuyobozi wari warabahaye kubaho neza bigenga
abaturage bamuguye gitumo yuriye ipoto arimo afungura ibyuma bahita bamufata bamushyikiriza ubuyobozi
abaturage bari ahabereye iyi mpanuka bavuze ko iyi modoka yari itwawe n'umushoferi wasinze
abaturage basabwe kumvira abayobozi babo bakabashyigikira mu bikorwa biganisha ku iterambere n'imibereho myiza
abaturage baturiye icyicaro cya polisi na bo bahize bategekwa kuguma mu nzu no gufunga amadirishya yose
abaturage bavuga ko abafatiwe mu bikorwa byo kubicuruza cyangwa kubinywa bakwiye kujya bahanwa by'intangarugero
abaturage bavuga ko uyu mutwe witwaje intwaro uhatinze kandi abawugize bakaba bavuga ikinyarwanda
abaturage bibumbiye mu makoperative bahawe imbuto y'imyumbati n'ikigo cy'igihugu gishinzwe ubuhinzi
abaturage bigaragambije guhera ku wa gatatu w'iki cyumweru binubira ko babeshywe na leta
abaturage bo basanga ari igisubizo ku buzima bwabo nk'uko bamwe babitangarije kigali tudeyi
abaturage rero bamenye uburenganzira bwabo n'aho abatanyuzwe bitabaze inzego zo hejuru
abatutsi bahungiye kuri kiliziya ya mukarange no mu nkengero zayo nabo barishwe barashira
abatwumva twemeza ibintu bimeze nk'ibyateguwe n'abatazi gusoma no kwandika babona intege nke zacu aho ziherereye
abavaga mu itorero kandi babaga bahawe ubutumwa butandukanye burimo guhindura imyumvire no kugirira akamaro aho batuye
abavandimwe na bashiki banjye bo mu itorero siko bamfata
abavugabutumwa bakomeye n'abaririmbyi ni bo bafatanyije n'abari aho mu kuramya imana
abaye undi mu bayobozi b'inzego zo hasi wishwe muri iyi minsi
abayihakana n'abayipfobya bakwiye kwamaganirwa kure kandi ntaho bazahungira ukuri kugaragazwa n'amateka
abayoboke b'ishyaka bamushyigikiye bahise bakorera imyigaragambyo mu mujyi
abayobozi b'ibitaro byo muri uganda batangiye gutekereza uburyo bazajya bashyingura imirambo iba yatereranywe na beneyo ntibaze kuyitwara
abayobozi n'abashinzwe umutekano bakoranye inama n'abaturage yo kubahumuriza mu gihe hagishakishwa abo bagizi ba nabi
abazayitabira bazungurana ibitekerezo ku ngamba zo kuzana impinduka n'icyakorwa ngo zisigasirwe
abazi iby'uru rugendo batangaje ko rwari ruteguye neza byose biri ku murongo
abazitabira iki gitaramo bazabona alubumu nshya y'iyo korali izaba iriho indirimbo umunani
akunze gukura abakinnyi muri afurika no ku yindi migabane akabajyana mu ikipe ye
abenshi bagumye imuhira imigi minini nka kinshasa yari itekanye kurusha uko byahoze
abenshi bari bamenyereye kogeshereza imodoka aho bakunze kwita mu binamba'
abenshi bavuga ko itangazamakuru ryagize uruhare muri jenoside
abenshi mu banywi b'inzoga barwara igifu bakunze guterwa na zo
abicwa n'inkota bapfa neza kuruta abicwa n'inzarakuko bo bapfa urupfu rw'agashinyaguro babitewe no kubura umusaruro mu mirima
abicwaga icyo gihe bari abatutsi kandi umugambi bagosora yari yaravugiye ahagaragara wari urimo ushyirwa mu bikorwa
abigaragambyaga bavuze ko iyo noti izatuma amadolari abura cyangwa agata agaciro
abisubiramo cyane ashimangira ko nyina ari intwari avuga ati ndagukunda mama
abitabira izi nama iteka babona agashya mu tuba duherutse kuzanywa ku isoko ku isi
abo twubakiye bose bagiye banahabwa ibikoresho byo mu rugo amatungo magufi n'amaremare
abo bafashwe ni nyiransengiyumva uwizeyimana nyirankiranuye na mukandahiro
abo bagabo bushaku na ruharamanzi baruzuraga bikabije kandi bakamenya gusetsa
abo baguzi bavuga ko ibyo bicuruzwa bikunze ku boneka nijoro
abo bahanzi n'ukunze kubakorera inyinshi mu ndirimbo zabo bageze i buruseli
abo bakozi barimo mpabwanamaguru na twahirwa bombi bakurikiranyweho icyaha kimwe
abo bakozi bashinzwe kwandika mu bitabo byabugenewe abana bavutse no kwandukura abantu bapfuye
abo bamutura niba bamfashaga tukamuvuza agakira kuko ibyo akora birambabaza
abo bana bari baragowe twahoraga dutongana ku buryo nabo bari bazi ko ari ibicibwa
abo bantu bafatiwe ahantu hatandukanye ho mu ntara ya limpopo ihana imbibi n'igihugu cya botswana
abo bantu bicishaga bugufi kandi barakundaga mu buryo bw'umwuka
abo banyampinga bahembwe hakurikijwe amatsinda atatu bagabanyijwemo bakigera muri iryo rushanwa ry'ubwiza
abo baririmbyi baherutse gusohora videwo yo gusaba imbabazi babicishije ku mbugankoranyambuga
abo basore bari mu maboko ya polisi ikorera mu karere ka rutsiro
abo bavugabutumwa bazengurutse tubyiniro twinshi two muri kigali
abo bayobozi bo muri isiraheli ntibari biteguye kuvuga nka yohani ngo akwiriye gukuzwa naho jye nkwiriye gucishwa bugufi
abo bayobozi ngo bagomba gukorana n'inama njyanama guhera ku kagari kugeza ku karere
abo bose ntibigeze batekereza ko iyi ngoma bakoreye cyane ishobora kubahinduka
abo bose uko ari icumi bafashwe mu bihe bitandukanye bashyikirijwe urwego rw'igihugu rw'ubugenzacyaha
abo icyenda bakomeje guhigwa bukware biracyekwa ko bidegembya muri bimwe mu bihugu byo muri afurika y'iburasirazuba
abo ni bamwe mu basanzwe bacururiza izo mbuto mu isoko ry'ibiribwa ry'i musanze
abo ni nka gashongayire bizimana bahati tonzi kamanzi n'abandi benshi
abo twaganiriye bavuga ko badakeneye guhomba nkuko bahombejwe n'ibigo by'imari iciriritse
abo twaguze baraje ngo dukore ihererekanya ry'ubutaka
aborozi b'inkoko mu rwanda barabibona nk'igisubizo kuko iryabafashaga kubona inkoko rya rubirizi ritari rigihagije
abumvise ibyo yakoze bazanywe no kumwumva no gukizwa indwara zabo
abunganira abaregwa mu by'amategeko bavuze ko yagiye gusaba uburenganzira bwo kwinjira mu kindi gihugu muri ambasade ya kongo bakabumwima
abunganizi ba kenyata basabye igihe gihagije cyo gusuzuma ibimenyetso by'ubushinjacyaha
abwira nyina ati ibi byo kugaburirwa nk'umwana kandi mfite umuheto wanjye simbishaka
abwiriza ubutumwa bwiza yavuze ko igihe cyagenwe gisohoye
ab'inkwakuzi bize amayeri yo kwirwaza igifu n'ibindi bisaba kwitabwaho bidasanzwe
ab'inkwakuzi bahise bazinga utwangushye bajya gushaka ahandi bakorera nko mu nkundamahoro
adama yibukije leta y'u burundi ko ifite inshingano zo kubungabunga umutekano w'abantu
yavugiye ku rwibutso ko kwibuka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ari inshingano zacu nk'abanyarwanda
adutera anyuze mu ntege nke z'imico yacu kuko aba ashaka kunyeganyeza ukwizera kwacu
afunganywe n'abanditsi b'ikinyamakuru batatu barimo byarabahatumusime na kintu
afurika ifite abakinnyi bakina kuri buri mwanya muri shampiyona y'u bwongereza uretse mu izamu
agaciro ko gucungurwa kwacu ntigasobanutse kugeza igihe tuzahagararana n'uwaducunguye imbere y'intebe y'imana
agakomeza avuga ko ubwo yari atashye avuye kubwiriza yasanze wa mugabo yinjiye urugo rwe
agira ati uburozi bwe ntawabuhamya kuko byemezwa na muganga kandi ntawe araroga ngo apfe
agira ati ntibyemewe niba umuntu yaraciririye imbwa agomba kuyifungirana ku buryo itarya abantu
agira ati nyuma yo gukora iyo nyandiko mpimbano basaba amafaranga baje kugira ibyago maze ifatwa batarayakira
agira ati ni impano nahawe n'umuganga utuye mu mudugudu nyobora
agira ati gusezerana bifitiye akamaro abakobwa n'abasore naho jyewe ndashaje
agira ati ababyeyi bagomba kumenya ko kwigisha abana ubuzima bw'imyororokere ari inshingano zabo
agira ati aho nshobora kumujyana nibura byansaba gukora ibirometero hafi icumi
agira ati bafite inyota yo kumenya iby'ubuzima bw'imyororokere bivuze ko batabiganirizwaho n'ababyeyi babo
agira ati guhera ku wa mbere w'icyumweru gitaha tuzatangira gukurikirana ko ibibazo twafatiye umwanzuro byakemutse
agira ati ibi bifatwa nk'icyaha cyo kunyereza umutungo niyo mpamvu bagomba kubihanirwa
agira ati muri jye numvaga nshaka kuvuga k'urukundo hagati y'abantu babiri
agira ati nageze hano mfite imyaka itandatu ariko nkambakamba kuko nari naramugaye amaguru yombi
agira ati nahuraga kenshi n'abantu bambwira ko kwiga itangazamakuru ari ukwibeshya
agira ati ndabona hari itandukaniriro cyane kuko iyi ni inyubako igeretse
agira ati ndaho ntaho ncumbitse iyo umuntu anyemereye arancumbikira yakenera kuhagurisha akamvanamo ni uko bimeze
agira ati ninjiye mu itorero metodisite nshyingirwa ariko aho ndigereyemo rwose narigiriyemo ibihe byiza mba n'umwarimukazi
agira ati rwiyemezamirimo wese ugiye gukorana n'amakoperative agomba kumenya niba yanditse
agira ati sinajyaga menya ko nshaka kwituma byaba ibyoroshye cyangwa ibikomeye byarizanaga igihe bishakiye
agira ati twabahuguye ku buryo izo ndyo zose zigomba kuboneka iwabo mu ngo
agira ati u rwanda rufite icyerekezo cyo kuva mu bihugu bikennye
agira ati ubu ndabara amafaranga ibihumbi umunani nzakura muri ziriya nkwavu enye zanjye
hari igihe mbyuka numva ntameze neza hanyuma nabonana n'abandi nkamererwa neza
agira ati nakomeje kubona ibimenyetso byerekana ko aka gace karimo ikibazo gikomeye
agira ati gutura mu midugudu byatumye twegerezwa ibikorwa remezo ndetse binadufasha kwicungira umutekano
agira ati igihugu cya suwedi cyemera ko kwigisha abantu amahoro ari uburyo bumwe bwo gutyaza ubwenge
agira ati ndifuza gufashwa kubona inguzanyo nkagura moto nkazajya nkora nishyura buhoro buhoro
agira ibanga nta muntu aba ashaka kubwira ibintu bye
agira ibitekerezo byubaka akanababazwa cyane no kubona hari ikintu atakoze uko bikwiye
agira inama n'abandi yo gutanga imbabazi kandi bakita ku bagifite imbaraga kugira ngo badaheranwa n'agahinda
agira ngo akangure abigishwa be yayikoresheje nk'imfashanyigisho agira ati mbese ntimuvuga ngo harabura amezi ane mugasarura
agiye gusubiza ibyo bibazo perezida kagame yagize ati mfite impungenge kuri iyo ngingo uzanye
agomba rero kugura izo ntwaro azarwanisha umuntu wese uzashyira agatoki hejuru
aha hafite amateka muri nyamure abatutsi babanje kwirwanaho bahangana n'interahamwe zashakaga kubica
aha ngo nibwo inyanja y'umukara yahindutse injanja y'umunyu bitewe no kwivanga kw'ayo mazi
aha twakongeraho ko abantu bamwe bagira ibyago by'uko umwijima wabo wangizwa n'inzoga kurusha abandi
aha rugagi yari yambaye impeta imwe kuri buri kiganza
aha diyane rwigara yerekanye inyandiko igaragaza ko yarekuye ubwenegihugu bw'u bubiligi yari asanganywe
aha faranswaze yagize ati ba nyir'amazu batamenyesheje iki cyemezo abayacururizamo barahemutse cyane
aha mukurarinda yagaragaje ko kuvuga amazina y'aba bapolisi ari ukubangamira no kwica iperereza
aha abakinnyi ba gasogi bishimiraga igitego cyari gitsinzwe na ndacyayisenga
aha abana bari bateze amatwi ubutumwa bahabwaga na nyampinga mutesi
aha bagaragarizwaga ibitabo by'imishinga ishyirwa mu bikorwa n'abafungiye muri gereza ya nyanza
aha batahaga ku mugaragaro ibiro bya gasutamo byo ku rusumo bihuriweho n'ibihugu byombi
aha bisa n'aka wa mugani ngo ushaka gusimbuka neza arabanza agasubira inyuma
aha hantu haramfasha kubera ko ariho honyine nshobora kugura ibiryo kuri make
aha haragaragara bamwe mu bigaragambya bicajwe n'abamanitse amaboko batakambira abasirikare
aha havugwa imyumvire y'ababikora n'imihindagurikire y'ikirere ku buhinzi itera amakenga y'igihombo
aha kandi hanavugwamo ibibazo birimo ruswa n'ikimenyane bituma hari abaguririra inkiko bagatsinda imanza
aha ni igihe adiriyani yaririmbanaga na liliyane kabaganza mu rwanda
aha ni mu muhanda uva mu masangano y'umuhanda wo ku kacyiru umanuka ujya mu mujyi unyuze ku kimicanga
aha niho urugamba rwabohoye igihugu cyacu rwatangiriye bucyeye twumva ngo abahungu b'inkotanyi bafashe ruhengeri
aha uba ubivanze cyane ni aha bipfira ntahandi ariko ndibwira ko bizagenda bikosoka
aha urukiko rwanzuye ko ibimenyetso byose byemewe mu rukiko byaba ibishinja cyangwa ibishinjura
ahabu yubatse ibicaniro byinshi by'abapagani ku tununga twinshi
ahamya ko azagaruka afite ingamba nshya zo gutsinda ibitego kurusha guha imipira bagenzi be
ahamya ko umurwayi w'impyiko yakira ari uko abonye impyiko yindi
ahandi nko muri kenya usanga habaho n'amahugurwa y'abayobozi bakuru ngo bumve ko bagomba guha agaciro abamenyekanishabikorwa
ahashyinguye umurambo we hararinzwe bikomeye ku buryo byateye abantu urujijo
ahenshi mu bice byo mu cyaro uhasanga abana basa nabi
aherutse gutangaza ko yambitswe impeta y'urukundo n'umwe mu bashinze sinapucati
ahita ahindukira ankubita inkoni mu mutwe maze nkomereka ahantu nsanganywe inkozu ikomeye
ahamed yaravuze ati ari umuto n'umukuru twese yaduteye isoni
aho bashinja uyu munyamakuru gukora ibikorwa bibi byo kugenzura ibikorerwa muri palestine
aho bavoma naho ni kure kubera ko bakora urugendo rw'ibirometero bibiri n'igice
aho muri afurika y'epfo kandi ni na ho koloneli karegeya yahotorewe
aho ngenda inkoni yanjye na yo imfasha kumenya ibiri mu nzira nyuramo
aho ngo ni na ho hazamenyekanira ibyifuzo byabo n'izindi ntege nke bafite
aho ni ho abarobyi bahera bavuga ko abayobozi babo babigenderaho kugira ngo babapyinagaze
aho ni nko gusiba mu itegekonshinga umubare wa manda umukuru w'igihugu ashobora kukiyobora

aya mababi ashobora gukoreshwa ibintu bitandukanye nk'imigina y'ibihumyo

aya mafaranga bayambuye uwabakoreye indirimbo yitwa sinzahinduka bakoranye n'undi muhanzi
aya mafoto yafashwe mu myaka itandukanye bikaba bigaragara ko adasaza
aya magambo akoreshwa n'abaraperi usanga atishimirwa n'abantu bavuga ko hipapu ari injyana y'ibirara

aya mahugurwa yari agamije kubahugura ku byerekeranye no gucunga umutekano mu nsengero

aya makosa akunze kugaragara ku bayobozi b'imidugudu ndetse n'utugari hirya no hino mu gihugu
aya makosa yayakoraga kenshi nkamubwira nti hari umunsi umwe tuzagira dutya tukayapfa

aya ni amwe mu mafoto agaragara ku rukuta rwa fasibuku ya mukarurangwa korodine

azamubona habitegeko ntamuzi natamureka ngo yisahurire nawe azamwirenza mu gihe gitoya
azi gukunda kuvuga no kwemeza ibyo bigatuma abakobwa bamukunda cyane
azi ubwenge kandi yumvikana n'abandi n'ukwemera kwe ntikujegajega

ba myugariro ni sibomana abuba musa mohamedi nizigiyimana karimu haruna shakava

buriya ingo nyinshi zipfira mu ntangiriro hahandi umuntu ahitamo umuntu bazabana ndetse n'impamvu bagiye kubana

burya nabayeho nkubona nk'igitangaza kuko hari abarota inzozi bakanazikabya
agaragara muri aya mashusho nk'umuntu mushya mu myambaro igezweho n'imbyino atamenyereweho
buvuga ko iyi nzu izwi igaragaza amateka y'abadage mu rwanda
buzamfasha kwirinda abagabo badushukisha amafaranga bityo sinzatwara inda itateganyijwe
bwagaragaje ko uduce tuzibasirwa cyane ari utwo mu mugabane wa afurika na aziya
bwana munyabagisha yari amaze kubibaza dogiteri nkiko nsengimana
yasabye imbabazi avuga ko yicuza icyatumye akora ibyo bintu
bwana mugabe avuga ko yari yagiye i dubayi ku mpamvu zerekeye umuryango we
bwana niyonsenga asobanura ko kuruwa ruje y'u rwanda yabafashije iha abatishoboye amatungo magufi
bwana nkusi yavuze ko kubona ubwunganizi biri mu burenganzira bw'uwasezerewe mu ngabo witwa dukuzumuremyi
bwari ubwa mbere kuri benshi babona umuhanzi uririmba ibicurangisho bitanga umudiho mu ndirimbo ari inkweto
bwari ubwa mbere umusemburo wa insuline ukoreshwa mu kuvura indwara ya diyabete ku muntu
bwasabye gukorerwa ubuvugizi abanyeshuri bakabona ibiryamirwa imyenda n'ibiribwa bihagije
bwerekanye kandi ibyiza by'uburyo gakondo bwo kwiyakana no kubara hakoreshejwe indangaminsi
bwira abagize umuryango wawe n inshuti ko biteganyijwe kuri iyo tariki
bya bisamagwe na byo bimaze kubona ukuntu ingeragere ibicikiye mu modoka ntibyakomeje guhiga byahamye aho byumiwe
byaba bibaye bimwe mu dushya two kwandikwa muri icyo kinyamakuru
byabaye ngombwa ko hitabazwa polisi kuko rurangirwa yavugaga ko irushanwa rigomba kuba
byabaye nyuma y'amakosa ya ba myugariro ba kiyovu siporo batavuganye neza n'umunyezamu
byabaye nyuma y'uko amennye amabanga ya amerika avuga ko itata abantu ku giti cyabo na leta z'ibindi bihugu
byagaragaye ko abasirikare bashishikariye gutera inkunga iki kigega
byageze aho rwema aha uwo mukobwa imfunguzo z'icyumba yari burarermo ngo abe agiye maze aze kumusangamo
byageze aho atangiza ikipe y'umupira igizwe n'abo bana yakuye mu muhanda
byagira izihe ngaruka ku mubano mfitanye na yehova cyangwa ku mutimanama wange
byakabaye byiza umuntu afunzwe mu gihe bigaragaye ko hari ibimenyetso bihagije bimuhamya icyaha
byakomeje gutyo ariko sinzi ukuntu nagize ntya mbona umuzungu w'umukerarugendo wari wambaye ikabutura ahetse urukapu runini ndamukurikira
byakozwe kugira ngo bamamaze ibikorwa by'ikigo kibaga amasura kikayaha uburanga ba nyirayo bifuza kugira
byanyibagije agahinda natewe no kuba imfubyi maze numva ndashaka ko ubuzima busigaye nzabumarana na musaza wanjye
byanyobeye peeee mfite umukobwa nkunda byo gupfa ariko sinzi icyo gukora kuko we atanyiyumvamo
byaranshenguye cyane kubona ankorera ibintu nk'inyo kandi azi ko mfite inshuti yitwa joriji
byari bigoye cyane ni urugendo rwamvunnye rwanavunnye benshi mu bamfashije ndetse rwavunnye n'igihugu
byari byinteye ubwoba kuko nari nzi ko muri iyo minsi yari afite intege nke
byari byitezwe ko minisitiri binagwaho ashobora gusimburwa mbere y'iyi nama y'abaminisitiri yaraye ibaye
byari byiza nyuma ya sa sita z'ijoro ubwo muka data yari ageze mu rugo
byari ibihe biteye ubwoba kuko ntiyumvishaga ukuntu ngiye kuba imfubyi
byari ku bushake bwe ngo yinjire neza mubyo arimo neza
byari kuba biteye isoni kubona umutegetsi wo mu bayuda yashyikiranye akanasabana n'umwigisha utazwi neza
byari mu rwego rwo kugirango azagaragare muri filime nshya izasohoka muri gashyantare
byari mu rwego rwo kurushaho kunoza serivisi bahabwa no kubasobanurira ibijyanye n'izo konti nshya

byerekana imibanire iri hagati ya repubulika y'u rwanda n'ikigega mpuzamahanga gitsura amajyambere ida
byibuze mu gishanga ho iyo izuba rivuye uravomera kandi ugasarura ibigori byeze neza
byongeye kandi yanakoze uburiganya mu kubona imfunguzo afungura atabiherewe uruhushya n'inzego zari zarifunze
byukusenge yakinnye inshuro umunani mu mateka ye
byukusenge atuye mu kagari ka sereri avuga ko yishyujwe amafaranga atazi uko yayita
by'umwihariko iyi twasabwe kuyakira tukiri mu myiteguro y'iyabereye i durubani muri afurika y'epfo
by'umwihariko kuri uwo munsi ngo azaba afite ubutumwa buteye butyo
by'umwihariko ngo akurikirana ibyo perezida kagame avuga kandi azi u rwanda nk'igihugu gifite ubuyobozi bwiza
kazabulanka ni umujyi wa kabiri mu bunini muri maroke nyuma y'umurwa mukuru rabate
katarina n'inshuti ye bari baraye ijoro ryose binywera marijuan
karoli basakaga urugo rwe ruherereye mu gace kitwa naguru bakamuta muri yombi
nkwaya yashimiye abapolisi b'abanyarwanda bambitswe imidari ku bwitange bagaragaje

karabutoni avuga ko umukinnyi wa filime afataho urugero ari niyitegeka banakinana muri filime seburikoko
cyane peee uko byagenda kose nzabiharanira mu bikorwa nshyizemo imbaraga zanjye zose
cyangwa ngo ugire icyo umutwara kuko ubu menye neza ko unyizera
cyaraziraga guheza umuntu kubera uko areshya uko asa n'ibindi nk'ibyo

daleri wari umuhuza yabasabye ko buri wese avuga bwa nyuma maze hakamenyekana umwanzuro w'inama
dashimu yiyongereye ku bahanzi basanzwe baririmba muri iyo njyana mu rwanda
data sawuli yantoje gusabana n'abandi nkabakunda nkabitaho nkaniyubaha
data azatangira ikiruhuko cy'izabukuru nyuma y'imyaka hafi mirongo itatu amaze akora
data yabayeho imyaka mirongo urwenda ntabwo yigeze arya indyo yuzuye ibinure
data yahise amubwira ati niba mudashaka kundinda nimunsubize iwanjye abe ariho nzagwa maze nabyo arabyanga
davidi kameroni nawe yumvikanye avuga ko ibyo bihugu byarenzwe na ruswa
dawudi yaje kubona ko nta mpamvu yari afite yo gutinya imana
depite bamporiki ni umwe mu bahanzi nyarwanda bifuza iterambere rya filime binyuze mu kugira ubumenyi nyabwo
depite bamporiki yasabye abaturage kuba intwari n'intangarugero mu kubaka umuryango n'iterambere ry'igihugu
depite begumisa safari yatanze urugero rw'ahantu abayobozi bashyiraho umunsi wo gukemura ibibazo by'abaturage
depite kankera ati na bibiliya iravuga ngo umugore afite inshingano zo kubaha umugabo
depite kayiranga yagejeje ku nteko rusange raporo ku mushinga w'itegeko rigena ibyaha n'ibihano muri rusange
depite nyandwi yabaye umukozi mu nzego za leta kuva kera
dayamondi yabyaranye n'umunyamideri hamisa mabeto uri mu bahungabanya zari bamwotsa igitutu
diyane ashinjwa kwangisha abaturage ubutegetsi buriho no gukwirakwiza ibihuha
yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo yaririmbanye na bebe kulu
ni indirimbo nshya yaririmbyemo
dogiteri birungi yibutsa ko hari impfu zitabarwa muri zo harimo iz'abafata ibiyobyabwenge byinshi cyangwa ibinini basinzira ntibakanguke
dogiteri nkunda yavuze ko umubare wabo ugenda uhinduka umunsi ku wundi
dola yagize ati ni inshingano zanjye guharanira icyubahiro cya yezu
turumpu acuruza muri amerika akanatanga ibiganiro kuri televiziyo
dore abakinnyi kuri sitade ya belo horizonto mu mikino y'ijonjora ry'igikombe cy'isi
dore uwiteka ni we utegeka azaca inzu nini mo ibyuho naho into ayisenya
dore bimwe mu byo wakora bigasohora imyanda mu mubiri wawe ndetse n'impyiko zikongera gukora neza
dore ibyakozwe mu rwego rwo kugoboka abibasiwe n'ibyo biza n'ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana nabyo
dore incamake y'ibyaranze inzira y'urukundo rwa pulatini na diyane
dore kikinariho nta cyo cyamaze cyacyimara ubu umuriro umaze kugitwika kigashya
dore mu mashusho uburyo abanyarwanda baba mu bubiligi bakiranye ubwuzu n'urugwiro perezida kagame
dore nawe muri cya gihe zitwikiraga ijoro zigatera u rwanda muribuka ko hashyizweho za bariyeri zo kuzikumira
dore ngiye kugukongeza kandi umuriro wawe uzatwika igiti kibisi cyose
dore tuvuga ko abihanganye ari bo bahirwa mbese mwumvise ibyo kwihangana kwa yobu
habineza yiyamamarije mu murenge wa kanjongo w'akarere ka nyamasheke hafi y'ikiyaga cya kivu
kayondo avuga ko ahanini biterwa n'imyotsi cyane cyane ku bantu batekera mu nzu bakanayiraramo
kayumba yavuze ko kuba abanyamakuru bakennye biterwa n'uko ubukungu bwifashe
mugabo yavuze ko kwiyongera kw'iyi ndwara mu gihugu biterwa no kudakoresha neza inzitiramubu
ndayambaje avuga ko bigoye guhindura abakinywera itabi mu ruhame
nkurunziza avuga ko igomba no kugera mu bigo bisanzwe bikoresha inkwi nyinshi
rugwizangoga ati porositate ishobora kubyimba bidatewe na kanseri ahubwo bitewe n'ubundi bubyimba
dirimu boyizi bo bavuga ko bataririmbye iyi ndirimbo bashaka gushotorana
dufite kugeza ku munsi w'ejo imibare y'abanduye koronavirusi mu rwanda
dufitimana yavuze ko imurikagurisha yagiyemo i dubayi umwaka ushize ryatumye ibikorerwa mu rwanda bikundwa
dukunze kuvuga ko ukwemera kurangwa n'ibikorwa kandi ko ukwemera kutagira ibikorwa kuba kwarapfuye
dusaba abaturage guhindura bene iyo myumvire kuko urwego bagezeho mu isuku ni rwiza
dusabeyezu yakomeje agira ati hari imiti bahabwa ifasha mu gukuraho ibyo bimenyetso

dushaka ko ibyo bandika bamenya kubirinda bafashijwe n'inzego zibishinzwe kugira ngo birengerwe binabatunge
ejo bundi namubajije impamvu atakirwana ansubiza ko nta mbaraga akigira nka mbere
ejo dufite amatora atandatu adutegereje kandi tugomba hose guhatana cyane
ejo hazaza h'u rwanda hari mu ntoki z'urubyiruko kandi ntabwo rukwiye kwitinya

ejo mu gitondo undi muntu muri kigali ashobora kwandika ibintu nk'ibyo

uwimana yagize ati iki kimpoteri batwegereje ni imbogamizi kuko woza amasahani ugasanga yuzuyeho isazi
eliya yari yaratekereje ko ari we wenyine usenga imana nyakuri muri isirayeli
ela na we yavuze ko ashaka gukora imibonanompuzabitsina kurusha ibindi byose bibanezeza baherwa muri iyi nzu
ema korodina yongera gushimangira ko atari ikibazo cy'ubushobozi cyangwa gupfobya abatunganya indirimbo nk'uko byatangiye kuvugwa
emerita yaravuze ati waba muto cyangwa mukuru nkugiriye inama yo kwifata kuko nagarukiye kure
endoneziya ikunze kwibasirwa n'inkubi z'imiyaga bitewe n'uko iri mu karere kagwiriyemo ibirunga n'imitingito
erike umuririmbyi w'umunyamerika wamenyekanye muri iryo itsinda nibwo yavutse
sugira aracyashidikanywaho kandi anahabwa amahirwe make n'umutoza
ese byari bikwiye ko reyo siporo ihakana gahunda ireba abanyarwanda itanabanje gukora ubugororangingo
ese hari ibimenyetso byerekana ko bobo yashoboraga kuba ari wishe mariya
ese iki si cyo gihe cyo kurangurura amajwi yacu tukabasaba kureka kureba agatotsi kari mu jisho rya mugenzi wabo
ese iyo bamaze kwinjira muri pariki bamenya gute aho inyamanswa nk'inkende ziherereye
ese mpemukire databuja njye ndyamana n'umugore we mu gihe yagiye mu kazi
ese ni iki cyakwereka ko impyiko zawe zidakora neza cyangwa zamaze kwangirika bikomeye
ese ubona hari icyo ukwiriye guhindura niba ari ko bimeze izi nama zikurikira zagufasha
ese waba utega amatwi igihe umukobwa utereta arimo kuvuga ndetse ugakora n'ikimenyetso ko wabyumvise nko kuzunguza umutwe
etiyopiya ivuga ko nta mugambi ifite wo gukoresha amazi y'uruzi rwa nili mu kuvomera ibihingwa
everina we yagize ati nanjye mpawe agaciro kuko nafatwaga nk'indaya mu mategeko kandi dusazanye

farawo akuramo impeta ye iriho ikimenyetso ayambika yozefu amwambika n'imyenda myiza n'umukufi wa zahabu

fagasoni yakoreye byinshi iyi kipe yahoze atoza harimo n'uruhare yagize mu kuzana uyu umutoza

furanke iyo ageze mu rwanda akenshi araragira akanakama inka

uyu muhanzi yaririmbanye n'abana bo muri uganda
gabore yavuze ko impamvu ituma agumana n'abo bagabo ari uko atigeze areka kuba umukatolika mu mutima we
gaburira umwana wawe indyo yiganjemo imyunyungugu na vitamine de umurinde kuzagendera imitego cyangwa kuvunika amagufa
irene kamanzi ni umuririmbyikazi uzwi cyane mu ndirimbo zihimbaza imana
uyu ni gacinya ubanza i bumoso aganira n'abo mu muryango wa katawuti muri iyi foto

gahima yavuze ko ikigo kizashaka umunyamategeko uzacyunganira mu kurengera inyungu zacyo
gahunda itahiwe ni ugushinga amatsinda mu bigo by'amashuri yisumbuye atandukanye
gahunda ya leta yo gushishikariza urubyiruko kwiga imyuga ni nk'umuti wo guhashya ubushomeri mu rubyiruko

gahunda y'ubwishingizi bw'ubuzima yagize uruhare rufatika muri izi ntambwe zose
gakwaya n'usabimana bavuze ko gufuha ari ibintu bisanzwe ku bantu bakundana
gasangwa yagize ati umuturanyi nibwo yari akimara kumbwira ko habura igihe gitoya bakatwica
gasengayire yagize ati ubutegetsi bushyashya bwaraje butwitaho kimwe n'abandi kuko nta witwaga umutwa wagiraga inka
gasigwa abonye atonnye naho muganza atonnye cyane ishyari riramushengura akeka ko bazamugabira n'ibyo arimo
gatete mukama wo mu karere ka nyagatare mu ntara y'iburasirazuba ni umuhinzi ntangarugero
gatete akaba ari we wanatangije iri tsinda mbere y'uko hinjizwamo abandi
gerageza kubona kimwe mu bintu uwo mwashakanye akora neza umushimire unamushishikarize kugikomeza

gusa abamwishe birakekwa ko ari abantu bari basanzwe baziranye
gusa koko hari abanyapolitiki bavuga ko ngomba kuba ndi umunyagasuzuguro
gusa umuryango w'abibumbye uvuga ko uhangayikishijwe ikibazo cy'abasambanya abana n'abagore ku ngufu
gusa hari aho bivugwa ko abaturage bakumirwa mu kubaza ibibazo byabo bityo perezida ntabimenye
gusa icyo nabasaba n'ubwo nabatsinze bazanshyigikire kugira ngo musanze ikomeze gutera imbere
gusa icyo twishimiye kurusha ibindi ni iyo tike kuko tugiye gukaza imyiteguro
gusa iyi gahunda yaje kuyihindura mu gice cya kabiri ubwo yari amaze kwinjiza nyandwi asimbuye manishimwe
gusa ku bushake bw'umucuruzi ashobora kurenza ku yagenwe n'itegeko
gusa naje kujya mu ngendo ngarutse ambwira ko natinze akayijyana ahandi ntabizi
gusa nanone ngo abagize uwo mutwe barashyirwa mu majwi
gusa ntibikwiye ko abakunzi bacika intege gutya kuko turacyafite imikino imbere
gusa polisi y'u rwanda yamaganiye kure aya makuru yise ibihuha

gusa uru ruzinduko ruzaba amerika itarahitamo umudemokarates uzaba umunyamabanga wa leta ushinzwe ubucuruzi
gusa utabyumva nkanjye ambabarire anyubahire igitekerezo maze nawe ashyire icye ahagaragara
gusa uyu mwirondoro utandukanye n'uwo akiniraho mu ikipe ya kiyovu
gusa yakomeje agira ati ariko ntiturakemura ikibazo cy'abanyarwanda bajya muri afurika y'epfo
gusaba imbabazi uterekana icyo uzisabira ni ukubakira ku kinyoma
gusabana n'abantu biramugora kuko adakunda kuvuga kandi akikubira utuntu twose akanagirira ishyari abavandimwe be
gushaka inkunga bifasha igihugu mu buryo bw'iterambere ubukungu ndetse igihugu cyikazamuka muruhando mpuzamahanga
gushora imari mu burezi ni inkunga ikomeye kiliziya gatolika itera umuryango nyarwanda yunganira leta y'u rwanda
gushyira ahagaragara ukuri ku byabaye muri jenoside ni kimwe mu byo gacaca yari igamije
gusuzugura abandi rwose si ibintu byanjye biramutse binambayeho inshuro imwe nahita njya gusaba penetensiya
guverineri bosenibamwe yashimiye igikorwa cyo kwereka abaturage ibyiza bya pariki
guverineri bosenibamwe yavuze ko ubukungu bw'igihugu bukwiye gushingira ku bumenyi hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga
guverineri mureshyankwano avuga ko abona ababyeyi baratangiye kumva akamaro ko kuboneza urubyaro
guverineri mureshyankwano atekereza ko atari ngombwa kwifashisha itegeko rihana ababyeyi batita ku bana babo
